story:
Decidable, the unbiased and anonymous decision making app.


Helping organizations and companies avoid the pitfalls of group think, peer influence and outside pressures



Working together to eliminate Hunger and Poverty. Changing The World One Great Decision At A Time.  


Have an Idea create a project and manage it on Decidable.  For example do you build a new well for the town or build a school?  Do you build a new aquaponics farm to feed a remote village.  Who do you want as the organization president or to head up the new division or project.  How should you utilize your organizations limited funding.  All of these and more can be a project that is defined, debated, and voted on via Decidable.net utilize the Delphi anonymous decision making process.  The tool allows your group to avoid group think, group pressure or influence that can lead to bad decisions.

Some of the great Advantages from using the Delphi method for decision making are:
  1. Motivates people to participate over a long period of time and to reveal their true beliefs.
  2. Able to aggregate information automatically and instantly incorporate new information in the forecast.
  3. Participants do not have to be selected and recruited manually by a facilitator. They themselves decide whether to participate if they think their private information is not yet incorporated in the forecast.
  4. Participants reveal their reasoning which allows for the group to form a clear understanding of a members point of view.
  5. It is easier to maintain confidentiality which encourages more participation and ideas.
  6. Quicker decisions that benefit from the wisdom of the crowd.

The Delphi method is a fantastic for Non profit world changing decisions, political and social decisions, but can really shine with business decisions.  For example the Delphi method was developed for forecasting which is useful for determining where your market or industry maybe heading.  


Once you have the project created it is time to add criteria, debate, and discuss the issues. 


Finally members rank / place the weight on each criteria or option that they feel are worthy.  Then one of the group administrators will end the round.  This process may take one or several rounds of voting with the top items remaining at the end of each round until all voting is completed.  Your group decides how many rounds exist for voting on each project and can always control when the voting is completed.   Then you can scope out and manage the projects from within decidable or manage them outside of decidable.

The Impact

Together we each can take small actions that have major and profound impacts around the world:


  • Decidable will also educate and assist other communities around the world to enable better food production, distribution, and eliminate poverty and hunger. 
  • Providing Aquaponics solutions, renewable energy solutions, gray water systems, micro loans, and much more to change the world as we now it.
  • Our ultimate goal is to help establish and create sustainable resource based communities around the world.  The communities will be sustainable, utilizing the world's resources more effectively. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are starting Decidable and need your help.

  • $2,000 will go to setting up the organization (ideally a 501c3)  However, this will be the first decision for our strategy team members to help us with.   Do we take some of our funds and set up a non profit or some other organization model.  Do we even setup in the United States or are there better locations?
  • $20,000 will go toward developing and funding poverty eliminating projects working with and training other non profits to leverage the tool with their projects that target poverty.
  • $20,000 will go toward developing and funding hunger eliminating projects working with and training other non profits to leverage the tool to assist with their projects that target hunger.
  • Remaining funds will go to maintaining and running the Decidable web application and developing on going marketing for the tool and projects.
  • We have some great perks that allow you to become a part of the revolution that is Decidable.net 
  • Become a Decidable Co Founder and help us set our strategic team and set direction for the rest of 2014 and beyond.
  • Become a Decidable Poverty Sniper and have input into Decidable's poverty elimination group.
  • Become a Decidable Hunger Sniper and have input into Decidable's Hunger eradication group.
  • Become a Decidable Advocate and receive an all inclusive access pass to the Decidable Application for you and your entire organization / cause or group for an entire year.
  • If we do not reach our entire goal the funds available will go to maintaining The website and spreading our message of Eliminating Poverty, Hunger and Money!!

PERKS
For a $50 Donation Recieve a Decidable T Shirt


Other Ways You Can Help

Our goal is to no longer need money and thus there are ways you can help that do not require money:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign use the Indiegogo share tools and make some social network noise!
  • Looking for graphic artist to design T-shirt, as well as, web graphic artist to assist with website. 
  • Looking for Beta Testers and Non profits to work and collaborate with.
  • We are looking for volunteers to help with the website, campaigning, implement solutions, setting up and become a part of a resource community.
  • We would also welcome any donation or or ability to utilize any land for growing of food, establishing a community, etc...

More About Us:

  • We are a small but growing group of enlighten human beings.
  • Decidable realizes that everyone and everything in the world is connected.
  • There is no longer a reason for others to suffer.  What is needed is a resource based economy and humans to come together and work together for a great good and cause.

  Decidable is a web application that will be useful for all organizations to provide easy group decisions that will change the world.  Decidable utilizes a Delphi anonymous decision making process.  This process allows for groups to make quick world changing decisions without the typical group think issues or politics that get in the way of real change. 

  Another feature will be an anonymous yet membership controlled forum.  You can have open groups that anyone may join or only members may access.  However, all discussions, and voting can occur anonymously.  

  Everyone gets a voice in the decision, but there are still some controls in place and ability for the group to manage and control who has access to the group information, as well as, who gets a vote. While we believe that having a completely open group leveraging the wisdom of the crowd is best we have designed Decidable to accommodate all levels of access that are required for quick decisions. 

  Decidable's Delphi process allows decisions to be made without the normal bias or group think that can occur from certain group influences.  This allows for producing optimal and quick decisions even for extremely challenging decisions.  Everyone will have the ability to run  Free open groups on Decidable.  However, if you require a closed or membership required group these will be available, but will incur a monthly fee per closed group for 100 members.  Additional members over 100 will be available. Monthly Fee and additional member fees will be determined and voted on by the decidable Strategy group after this campaign is completed.

                                                    Tweet about Decidable

  Decidable is a web 
application that will be useful for all organizations to provide easy 
group decisions that will change the world.  Decidable utilizes a Delphi
 anonymous decision making process.  This process allows for groups to 
make quick world changing decisions without the typical group think 
issues or politics that get in the way of real change.    
Another feature will be an anonymous yet membership controlled forum.  
You can have open groups that anyone may join or only members may 
access.  However, all discussions, and voting can occur anonymously.    
 Everyone gets a voice in the decision, but there are still some 
controls in place and ability for the group to manage and control who 
has access to the group information, as well as, who gets a vote. While 
we believe that having a completely open group leveraging the wisdom of 
the crowd is best we have designed Decidable to accommodate all levels 
of access that are required for quick decisions.    
Decidable's Delphi process allows decisions to be made without the 
normal bias or group think that can occur from certain group 
influences.  This allows for producing optimal and quick decisions even 
for extremely challenging decisions.  Everyone will have the ability to 
run  Free open groups on Decidable.  However, if you require a closed or
 membership required group these will be available, but will incur a 
monthly fee per closed group for 100 members.  Additional members over 
100 will be available. Monthly Fee and additional member fees will be 
determined and voted on by the decidable Strategy group after this 
campaign is completed.                                                     Tweet about Decidable

story:
bluelight  is a Virtual Stage Piano based on physical modeling technology that will leave you in awe. From realistic and powerful acoustic and electric piano sounds, to warm and engulfing Strings and Pads, to precise and penetrating analog synth sounds. The 88 keys hammer action keyboard will allow you to perform with all of the nuance and dynamics of an acoustic piano.

 

 

 

The color touch-screen display, supported by multifunctional retro-illuminated buttons, allows for a simple and intuitive navigation of the keyboards functions; for quick, secure and precise management during live performances.

 

Three sliders allow for the control of various layered or split sounds. Pitch and Modulation wheels are also retro-illuminated to ensure visibility on the darkest of stages.

 


The piano, which is almost entirely in aluminum and carbon fiber for a total weight just over 10kg (22lbs), ensures extreme stability and robustness while also ensuring hassle-free transportation. Precise and minimalistic design, dials, buttons, sliders and aluminum wheels on an electric-blue tinted case on the top side, and classic carbon fiber texture on the underside give the piano a hi-tech and modern aspect.                                                                                
                                            More than just an instrument
 

 

 

Why go for a bluelight ?

  • bluelight is equipped with great and powerful sounds.

  • You won’t have to change hardware every time that there is a software update for new timbres and sounds.

  • The hardware is robust and reliable, and made of high quality materials.
  • It is light and easy to transport: almost half the weight of it’s competitors
  • It’s captivating, with an innovative and modern look. 

 

 

For Indiegogo backers

 

  • Exclusive to Indiegogo backers bluelight  will NOT be available to buy at launch.
  • Unique advantages only for buyers of Indiegogo. 
  • Perks include shipping for Europe, US and Canada.
  • Standard manufacturer warranty will apply.


    •  

Features

 

 

 

 

 

 

Five short sound examples

 

Why we are asking for your help on Indiegogo

 

We believe Indiegogo to be the most appropriate and efficient means to tackle the noteworthy investment that is necessary for large-scale production. We have invested heavily through personal means in the research and development behind the product, from the software to minute hardware details, with many repeated tests and modifications, in order to obtain a high quality product. Further investments are required in order to proceed in establishing and maintaining high production standards, which are difficult for a small company to sustain. With your help we will be able to increase production levels and orders with suppliers, thereby resulting in an improved price/performance and stable production schedule. You would thereby be providing a crucial hand to a company that is ready to act on its’ many ideas.

 

You can be proud… every time that you see an innovative product developed by EUKLAVIER, because it will be thanks to you that the product exists.

 

Perks for our supporters

Support us at any of the unique levels below. Select your level of support from the sidebar at the top right of this page.

 

 

 

 

 

Production Timeline

  • NOVEMBER: Final selection for hardware components and initiation of thorough software testing with user interface.

  • DECEMBER: Completion of assembly of hardware prototypes.

  • JANUARY 2015: Final/Integrated hardware testing (temperature, wear and tear, etc) as well as final software tests and quality control.

  • FEBRUARY 2015: Begin production of first batch exclusively for Pioneer Pianists Indiegogo and personalized matriculation numbers.

  • MARCH 2015: Assembly and packaging first batch of bluelight pianos

  • APRIL 2015: Shipment of first batch of bluelight pianos for Pioneer Pianists.

  • MAY 2015: Shipment of bluelight  batch for Early Pianists

  • JUNE 2015: Begin of large-scale production for traditional commercialization

FAQ

 

What’s in the box?

 

The box contains: 1 bluelight stage piano, 1 sustain pedal with jack cable, 1 international AC/DC power adapter, 1 power cord for power adapter, 1 quick-start guide. The complete manual will be available from the download section of our home page.

 

Is my bluelight covered by a guarantee?

Your bluelight is provided with a 1 year guarantee.

 

 

Purchase and Shipment 

When will I receive my product? 

 

Your product, t-shirt or piano, will be shipped in the month reported in the Perk you have selected. You will receive email confirmation upon shipment, with details regarding the courier, tracking number as well as estimated delivery date.

Where do you ship?

We ship anywhere in the world that can be shipped to with international courier (with the exception of countries under embargo for this type of product).

Is the cost of shipment included?

Shipping costs are included for Europe, USA and Canada.

For all other countries, an additional shipping fee of $150 will be requested (the purchaser will be responsible for any potential import duties or taxes applicable in their country).

story:
It's a first-of-its-kind, revolutionary and convenient "Buy Local" mobile platform that rewards consumers for acts of kindness.

Consumers will save up to 20% per purchase using the SpendingShift app. Allow us to assist you in this effortless shifting of funds you are already spending: we will guide a percentage of  each purchase to an array of charities, causes, and Community Ambassadors.

You can use the app like a credit card to pay for goods and services at participating merchants. Simply by buying through SpendingShift, you will be saving money for yourself as well as generate additional funds for the charity of your choice.  It's easy, costs nothing, and is an incredible opportunity to change the way we spend!



  1. Help Bruno Serato 2011 CNN Hero, feed millions of under-privileged children starting in America and around the world. (SpendingShift Invitation Code: CATERINA)
  2. Drew Logan fitness guru to Hollywood, died three times in one night but God sent him back to save lives.  He is Cedar-Sinai's Sudden Cardiac Arrest spokesperson. (SpendingShift Invitation Code: HEART)

More than 80% of the people we surveyed would actively contribute to grassroots charities and causes--if they had the money.  Imagine giving money to your favorite charities or causes by simply spending smarter with SpendingShift, while saving money yourself. 

Take it one step further and become an "Ambassador" and you too will be earning enough to promote your community full-time and make a personal difference.

Take a look at our Calculator to better understand how much you could contribute to these causes via SpendingShift!



SpendingShift is part of the "Buy Local" movement that is sweeping across American and the world.  We are a member of 120+ networks of community leaders, 30,000+ business owners, and everyday people who want to make a difference. Together, this movement works to move the economic power back into the hands of local businesses, and works to help communities bind together.


As consumers, we spend trillions of dollars each year. An average consumer spends about $70/day.

With so much money disappearing from our pockets, how much could we contribute to charity if only a small percentage of that was redirected?


Smartphones and Tablets are now a popular and easy way to make purchases on many different platforms. Notice how everyone is looking down nowadays? Why not utilize this trend to help others?



We're creating a platform that will redirect a portion of those trillions back into your hands. Start small by shifting $5/day to support local businesses. Have lunch at your favorite cafe and spend no more than you usually would--and let SpendingShift show you your impact.






Simply pay with your phone at your favorite local businesses on the things you already spend money on.  

                        


Every Voucher you buy will generate funds for local charities as well as funds for SpendingShift Ambassadors, people like you, to help them do good.  


Not only will you be helping people with your spending--you'll also save, by taking advantage of the discounts offered by our awesome merchants. You also get the satisfaction that your personal spending generates funds for other Community Ambassadors so they can do MORE.  


And the best part is: it's FREE to join and FREE to use!

Simply put, we call our members Ambassadors.  Ambassadors are people who want turn their every-day spending into acts of kindness and who get others to do the same. Ultimately, enabling individuals to collectively make a difference. 




Community Ambassadors get rewarded for every act of kindness that they have inspired others to do.  They will get an alert telling them each time something good happens.  With immediate positive feedback, we'll all be inspired to do more.

       

                         


More Info


                             CALCULATE NOW


        




Anything and everything imaginable, from your favorite restaurants to bars to auto repair shops.




Bruno Serato

Help Bruno Serato, 2011 CNN Hero, feed Millions of kids.  Many restaurants across the United States, and around the world, want to help Bruno feed the under-privileged kids in their own communities, but lack the funding.  With the funding from this campaign, we can help Bruno and give money to the above restaurants, so they can start NOW.  After that, SpendingShift’s perpetual funding-raising platform will maintain the kindness sharing, for the long haul.  

When the economy crashed, Bruno’s fine-dining restaurant business like many others fell by 40-50%, however, due to the bad economy the under-privileged kids doubled.  Keeping the restaurant open and meeting financial obligations were a challenge, let alone feeding the 300-600 children every night.  It was a decision whether to risk losing the restaurant or cut-back on feeding the kids.  “God told me to keep feeding the kids,” so he took out a 2nd mortgage on his home.  

There are so many worthy causes for SpendingShift to support, but having the fortunate opportunity to spend time with Bruno and see what he and his dedicated staffs do, we decided to put Bruno’s initiative as one our 2 “Flagship” campaigns to rally support and get funding.   


Drew Logan 

Celebrity Trainer, Fitness & Nutrition Expert, Athlete, 3-Time Sudden Cardiac Arrest Survivor, and Spokesperson.


Every year, nearly 7,000 healthy kids (K-12) die from Sudden Cardiac Arrest (SCA), and this toll is rising annually. However, there are no federal government mandates that requires life-saving defibrillation devices in schools nationwide, like there are  for Fire Extinguishers. Interestingly though, do you know how many deaths have occurred due to school fires in the past half century? Zero! None! Not a single one! That's right... yet tax payers are paying millions every year for extinguishers and inspections.

While SCA is the leading cause of deaths in children K-12 by an overwhelming margin, most school boards, and councils, cite the cost of Automatic External Defibrillator (AED's) as the reason for not demanding they be installed as prevalently as the obviously obsolete fire extinguishers.

With SpendingShift's help, and your use in your daily purchasing, my "Angel Hearts" Initiative will receive helpful funds every time you purchase using your smartphone APP. Together we can make the financial obstacles of the schools boards a non-issue by providing AED's to them for free...everywhere there are children! Kids deserve a chance at a full life!

Please support SpendingShift and help us save lives!

-Drew Logan

Drew Logan was 30 years old and in the best shape of his life.  So why did he suddenly die--three times in one night?  New research may finally be unlocking the answers to the mystery of sudden cardiac arrest... (Read full story)

Sign Up


"My fellow Americans: Ask not what your country can do for you—ask what you can do for your country"  President JFK

It's only a cliche if you don't act on it.  Never before in the history of mankind has it been easier for an individual to make a difference. 

At SpendingShift, We are ordinary people just like you who believe that we must ACT and not talk or point fingers.  We are doing this not for ourselves but for our children and grand-children.  If you are not happy with the current situation, take action: otherwise, nothing will change. Start now to make it a meaningful Holiday & New Year!

Together we'll spread an "epidemic of kindness" that will transcend races and borders. 



        

100% of proceeds will go to:

  • Put Americans back to work by supporting small business success and sustainability.
  • Improve local communities with our "Buy Local" initiatives. 
  • Hire community leaders as SpendingShift Community Directors situated in major cities: Detroit, Buffalo, Miami, Los Angeles, San Diego, Orange County, Miami, Cleveland, Memphis, etc...
  • Help support Chef Bruno Serato's Foundation "Caterina's Club" (that has already fed nearly 1 million starving children) as he takes on child hunger on a national and global level! 
  • Help support Drew Logan's "Angel Hearts" Initiative of getting life-saving Automatic External Defibrillators in every school, boys & girls home, daycare, and anywhere children are present.
  • Help fund countless other causes, charities, and initiatives


Back our campaign!

By backing our campaign, you're telling us that our idea is a good one— good enough to put your hard-earned money behind it. Please look to the right of the page to see our assortment of Perks; rewards that will be sent to you for a certain amount of donation. We appreciate every dollar!

Share our campaign!

The only way we'll reach our goal is if the word gets out about it. It may seem like an insignificant thing, but sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn and all of the other awesome spots on the web, is priceless to us.

Be a SpendingShift Ambassador!

Get your Invitation Code and help us to spread the word about SpendingShift while earning special rewards.  ACT NOW!



Thanks for looking.

If you love SpendingShift, or just love to see the entrepreneurial spirit thrive, please help us get this amazing project off the ground.

Every $1 helps, and telling people helps too. We need the swipe of YOUR finger now.

Thank you for checking out SpendingShift. We're transforming spending into acts of kindness with your help.

story:
Our Story

Hi my name is Darrell Sveistrup,

I am the director of True Solutions Limited in New Zealand

We are a software company that is working with mobile phone software.


We are look for funding to increase our service to a wider market,

adding additional mobile phone operating systems to our product.

And increasing the features supported.


The product

The product is simple is a service that does backups of information on your phone:

   * Contacts phone numbers

   * Call log history

   * Text messages sent/received


This is a real time service and will back up the data over 3g/wifi as the data changes

So no need to plug in cable when you get home


You can then view your information via your account on our website
We are targeting Google Android, Windows Mobile, Nokia Symbian and Blackberry Rim phones
(Sorry iPhone is to restrictive at present, may look at in future)

We currently have Google Android application ready released (1st Dec 2011)
Down load and try from Android app store: https://market.android.com/details?id=ts.truesh...

And we are close with a product for Nokia Symbian
With Blackberry and Windows mobile in near future. (1/2 Quarter of 2012)

One product fits all ?

We not under the misconception that one product will suite all, the service is designed so that you can select what option you want enabled, So you not paying for a feature you don't want.
So if you just want to safe guard your contact that all you need to pay for.
Or you need your call logs for billing then just turn that feature on.

Why the product is needed

If you have a active social life or many business contacts on your phone,
then you need to back the data up just like you would your computer.
The phone's are getting cheaper and cheaper and we can just buy a new phone if its damaged or lost.
Its the information that is on the phone that has the biggest impact to us if lost.

People have spent 100's of dollars on getting a phone repaired (more than phone is worth in some cases)
just so that can get contact information back. And this can take a long time and is not always able to be fixed.

The Campaign Impact

If our campaign is successful it will mean that we safe guard more people's phones from losing information.


If we are unsuccessful with our campaign, we will still strive to add additional features to our product.

We have had good feedback from people about the service and will continue development.

We would use sales of current product to generate funding for additional features and other platforms.


How we will use the funding

The funding will be for the development and testing of application's to work on the other mobile phone platforms.

And to increase the features available from the website


We plan to split the funding in the following way:

  20% spent on improvements to the web-portal better features and usability

  35% spent on development and testing of the application for Blackberry rim

  35% spent on development and testing of the application for Nokia Symbian

  10% spent of improvements to the Google Android application


What You Get

We will be grateful for any assistance people want to make to the project,
In return will offer you the application for your nominated mobile phone platform when ready.
And offer more features to those that contribute higher amount.

Other Ways You Can Help

The more people that use the service the better we can make the product.

So if you like the product then please tell other people about it.


Also please tell us what features you would like to see

We have many idea for additional features and would like to hear what people would like to see first.


Thanks you

Thank you for reading,

We hope that you can help by showing interested in our product.

And remember, If you have a 3 year old child in the house, and a toilet then your phone is at risk ;-)

And increasing the features supported.
The product

The product is simple is a service that does backups of information on your phone:
   * Contacts phone numbers
   * Call log history
   * Text messages sent/received

This is a real time service and will back up the data over 3g/wifi as the data changes
So no need to plug in cable when you get home
You can then view your information via your account on our websiteWe are targeting Google Android, Windows Mobile, Nokia Symbian and Blackberry Rim phones(Sorry iPhone is to restrictive at present, may look at in future)We currently have Google Android application ready released (1st Dec 2011)Down load and try from Android app store: https://market.android.com/details?id=ts.truesh...And we are close with a product for Nokia SymbianWith Blackberry and Windows mobile in near future. (1/2 Quarter of 2012)One product fits all ?
We not under the misconception that one product will suite all, the service is designed so that you can select what option you want enabled, So you not paying for a feature you don't want.So if you just want to safe guard your contact that all you need to pay for.Or you need your call logs for billing then just turn that feature on.Why the product is needed
If you have a active social life or many business contacts on your phone,then you need to back the data up just like you would your computer.The phone's are getting cheaper and cheaper and we can just buy a new phone if its damaged or lost.Its the information that is on the phone that has the biggest impact to us if lost.People have spent 100's of dollars on getting a phone repaired (more than phone is worth in some cases)just so that can get contact information back. And this can take a long time and is not always able to be fixed.

The Campaign Impact
If our campaign is successful it will mean that we safe guard more people's phones from losing information.

If we are unsuccessful with our campaign, we will still strive to add additional features to our product.
We have had good feedback from people about the service and will continue development.
We would use sales of current product to generate funding for additional features and other platforms.


How we will use the funding
The funding will be for the development and testing of application's to work on the other mobile phone platforms.And to increase the features available from the website

We plan to split the funding in the following way:
  20% spent on improvements to the web-portal better features and usability
  35% spent on development and testing of the application for Blackberry rim
  35% spent on development and testing of the application for Nokia Symbian
  10% spent of improvements to the Google Android application

What You GetWe will be grateful for any assistance people want to make to the project,In return will offer you the application for your nominated mobile phone platform when ready.And offer more features to those that contribute higher amount.

Other Ways You Can Help
The more people that use the service the better we can make the product.
So if you like the product then please tell other people about it.

Also please tell us what features you would like to see
We have many idea for additional features and would like to hear what people would like to see first. 

Thanks you

Thank you for reading,
We hope that you can help by showing interested in our product.
And remember, If you have a 3 year old child in the house, and a toilet then your phone is at risk ;-)

story:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Important Notice：

Because indiegogo update their payment system and no support china get usd money.Unfortunately that i start my project with usd money,so my project will be close at 31,21,2019 and after you can't buy on indiegogo.

If you still want buy cooling mod,please send me email i will tell you money and pay with paypal.My email is smufeng@gmail.com，my paypal is same.Then i will to study work website and add paypal buy function make you can buy on my website with yourself.

I will also try to start new same project but use hkd to get money(this will not effect your payment,you still can use you like to pay like usd or others),but i can't know if i can make it for sure,so now is suggest you ask me with email and pay with paypal if you want buy.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Why Make A Third Cooling Mod

GPD Win2 is the best Win10 handheld game console you can get right now. The official default thermal design power is 7w TDP, but if you want to get the best performance of Win2, you need use 12w TDP to run it. But CPU will be very hot when use 12w TDP, so I redesigned a cooling module to replace the original cooling module, make you can run for a long time with 12w TPD, and CPU also can get very low temperature.Also you can get lower back shell temperature that make your game feel better.


PS: All test is use aida64 software,if you use conductonaut will get better result.

 

Gaming upgrades with higher TDP

When Win2 running the official 7w TDP, you can't use the GPU and CPU 100%, which means you can't play all of its performance. And when you use 10w+ TDP, you will get 100% GPU performance than can get  5~10 fps boost for your game. Of course, you also can run with 12w TDP to get 100% performance GPU and CPU, but after testing, for most games, this can't get fps upgrade. So we recommend use 10w TDP to play game that can get same game effects but longer game time.

 

About Support And Order Setting

Because win2 have many version but indiegogo functional limit, so after you pay you need login my website to set some information so can get right item. Like your win2 version, which shell do you want get, and you also can view your shipping information.

It should be reminded that SSD Cooling Kit is a separate product, which is not included in the default Copper Nylon Shell, You need to purchase it separately.

My website is https://gpd.kntropy.net, the default user name is your indiegogo email, default password is your email+first order id(support my project). For example, if your email is example@gmail.com and you support my project first order no is 110, your username is example@gmail.com and passowrd is example@gmail.com110.

Because i need to synchronize data, I suggest you login to my website the next day or the third day after you purchase, because I will synchronize the system data every night, this time you should can login. If you still can't login or have any problem please send me email and i will help you, my email is smufeng@gmail.com.

 

About Three Back Shell

We provide three different shells, all shell use nylon and have the same performance and only have different appearances. If you don't login to my website and choose the shell skin, I will ship it to you randomly.

In the order shown below, the skin is original, leather, woollen. Need to be reminded that the woollen feel is best and very very good, but it is easier to get dirty.

 

I have also support 2280 shell,it can make you use 2280 SSD for win2,the shell is 3D print with nylon,and you need buy adapter to use,the adapter link is on below.The 3D file i have also public on my website,you can download and print with your self.

Riser PCI-e x1 to NGFF M2 Key B NVMe SSD Adapter

GPD Win2 2280 Shell STL File

The 2280 install simple is below，first you need cut adapter so can enter the slot，then you need use double-sided tape to fix the adapter.

 

Installation Tutorial

The installation tutorial is relatively long and has been made into a PDF. Because I don't know other languages, I only provide both Chinese and English versions. If users are willing to help, I can provide word source files for translation.

The installation tutorial shows a version with SSD cooling mod. SSD cooling mod needs to be purchased separately. If you do not purchase, you do not need to perform the SSD installation steps. The other parts are the same.

The accessories may change in subsequent shipments, please understand.And because the liquid metal thermal paste will corrode the aluminum, do not apply it in the copper and aluminum contact position, only for the CPU position.

English PDF Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ni7r8ROlPdFRSii4SWXtwPp66zZsfmA5/view?usp=sharing

Chinese PDF Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XRsJOpXAjXfnQKwdla3ZUONUJHbXZ5a3/view?usp=sharing

 

Mod Shell Install Demonstration

 
I have found some problems with the installation of people's shells. If the shell is not perfect after installation, for example, the USB is not fully stuck in the slot, you can try the installation as follows.
 
First, as in the video, press the grounding pad to ensure that the USB can snap into the slot. After confirming that the USB is properly installed in the buckle,make sure that the buckles on the back of the case are in the correct position. And then confirm that the SSD cooling switch is installed properly. Finally, press the front of the casing to ensure that all the buckles of the casing are properly engaged to complete the installation.

 

Only Buy Cooling Mod User Help

For those user who only buy cooling mod, here are some tips for installing mod. First of all, you need to sharpen the position of the yellow frame below, and otherwise you can not install the mod, also pay attention to the red frame position needs more sanding. Then there are some information below that will allow you to better polish the case to install the mod.

If you have a table saw in your home, you can cut the red frame directly according to the picture below, so that you only need lite polish it and can install the mod perfectly. After cutting, please trim the matching 304 upper cover according to the cutting shape.

In addition, be sure to open the second cooling hole, otherwise it will affect the effect. At the same time, in order to make it easier for you to polish, I made a 1:1 shell polishing diagram. You can download the file and print it out at the end of the text. Then stick it on the outer casing and align it, so it will be much easier to polish and the position will not be too much deviation.

Finally, it is recommended that the screws in the following positions should not be installed, because the screws will increase the height by 0.5mm, which means that if you install the screws in these positions, you need to grind 0.5mm. Therefore, it is recommended not to install, or directly grind the screw position according to the following figure, so that no large-area grinding is required. If you have tools, you can cut the part directly according to the suggestions above.

Polishing Map File Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YcAB6hlMK58ueDbMHHdVAMXt6nwf6Vfu/view?usp=sharing

 

Thanks To

To begin with, we thank all gamers who join in this crowdfunding campaign. It is your continuous support that allows my ideas to be realized and more people to get it.

In the end, this is my first attempt at crowdfunding, so there are still many places that I don't understand. I hope that everyone can be more tolerant and understanding.

story:
Has it ever occurred to you that with this super big TV screen, you use it only for watching one sport match, or even only for attending a long and boring con-call?
Don’t waste your huge TV screen!!

Designed in Japan 
Made in Taiwan

  • Wanna take a break during a long boring con-call?

  • Wanna track match scores of each sport game?
     

  • Wanna workout with TV fitness trainers and also watch episodes?
     

  • Wanna watch different channels simultaneously on 1 screen with your kids?




【Ultrawide monitors】 and 【Multitasking function】 have become a trend in monitor industry. People always try to consume lots of information in a short period of time. But sometimes in an unimportant meeting, you can actually go to check the stock market or watch live game streaming.



MultiView Media Hub allows you to change different split-screen modes freely with 4 video input sources. You can switch the modes and choose the sources of your own free will! Let you enjoy a more efficient High Definition Resolution MultiViewer!


The highest resolution MultiView Media Hub.
With this 4K60HZ MultiView Media Hub, you can watch at most 4 images from different video input sources all at the same time on your screen. It makes each inch of your screen utilized in an efficient way!


Work Hard, Play Hard in an Efficient Way.
Feel free to watch whatever you want in con-call. You can also watch different movies with your partner separately on the same screen. It ensures that each second of your time is being used wisely.










 







▶ Choose one of the split-screen modes on app


▶ Choose source & resolution


▶ My favorite mode setting


▶ IR learning setting






The 2 in 1 device.
Smart IR Hub + Quad View (Media Hub)















Asako / Marketing
As a member of developing 4K60Hz MultiView Media Hub, our marketing team actually plans to launch it on online shopping platform at this December, but considering that we love this product soooooo much so that we want to establish a fund raising project of its own! And also provide an Christmas deal for you lucky users! Let me share with you a little secret...the price on Amazon would be about USD$600 (add some revenue share of shopping platform. haha). Anyway, I want to say “You guys are so damn lucky!”

Bonnie / Sales
Finally our little baby is going to be launched on Indiegogo. Can’t wait to see it on market! Hope you guys love it as we do!

Lai / UI&UX Design
We have tried very hard to do many different efforts to make product’s layouts and functions combined in a more user-friendly way. After our team run through countless meetings, 4K60Hz MultiView Media Hub finally comes in a perfect layout design with a fantastic user experience! Hope you enjoy using our product, which might give you a little comfort in this dark period.

Our RDs are too busy at their work now so we do not have their voices here… sorry!


After overcoming all difficulties in trial run, we finally work out some sample devices that are able to be used in real life. Therefore, we really need your support to make it on market, moreover, to help people adapt to the new post-pandemic reality. Let more and more people have some fun while working from home or merely staying at home with family.

The images we used in our video and marketing campaign come from Pexels, Giphy and Freepik. If any infringement occurs, please report it to us, and we will try solving the problem immediately. Thanks for your support and understanding.

story:
"If you want to write consistently, track your progress and eventually hit the finish line, TRM is the way to go."

- Victor R.

 

"I use it. I like it! I come back day after day. It's a comfortable fit for me. I will be first in line for the mobile app."

- Farley S.


"TheRightMargin's tone is encouraging. These writing projects are not about beating yourself up. And we're here to help."

- Ryan R.

 

Where do you fit?

Types of projects on TheRightMargin today

 

What is TheRightMargin?

We are a writing web app (yep, that means we're on the cloud) that is changing how people write. Gone are the days of word processors that simply put a piece of paper on a screen. Say hello to a completely fresh approach to getting your writing done...

 

A Beautiful and Clean Writing Interface

Step into the future of writing with our fresh design.

 

Start with your Goals First

Every project setup experience smartly breaks down ambitious writing goals into actionable milestones and tasks.

                           

One of the number one reasons people don't finish their work is because they don't know what to do next. Our goal-driven project setup helps you break down your large, undefinable writing goals into smaller, more achievable steps. This process sets you up for success and it's proven that people with written goals are more likely to achieve them.

 

The All-in-one Writing Workspace 

Write alongside your plan to always know what’s next.

Switching between writing and planning tools interrupts your flow so our all-in-one workspace protects your context from distractions. Within your timeline, you can add notes, outlines, research and other supplementary bits of information for any particular project. When your writing lives next to your plan, you’ll always know what you’ve accomplished and what’s left to do—making your writing journey more achievable and enjoyable.

 

Smart Guidance to Get Unstuck and Finish

For particular tasks and goals, TheRightMargin smartly suggests tips on how to move forward. Our experience is like a coach who has your back and wants you to succeed. But this is just a first pass. Help us build AI behind the guidance and suggestions to make the experience even more useful.

With your backing, we could learn which advice performs best, use the best expertise to train the tool, and help every writer on TheRightMargin write better tasks that have the best chance of being completed.

 

Seamlessly Work on Multiple Writing Projects

TheRightMargin easily accommodates the writer who has many types of writing projects.

While most writing tools throw you into a blank document, we take a more holistic approach. Our elegant projects page will keep you focused on your upcoming milestones and even remind you if you've missed a few (because hey, we're only human). It's perfect for the busy writer working on multiple, different pieces with different requirements and deadlines. We use it ourselves to manage everything we write and plan to write.

 

Catch Up Easily

We get it. Life gets in the way. Progress is #winning in our books so we make it easy to change your plan as you go along so you can continue to accomplish without feeling lost or behind.

 

Guided, Customized Writing Plans

Our goal is to help you break down your writing project into achievable steps. But sometimes, you just don’t know where to begin. So we built Smart Projects: Guided writing plans focused on specific types of writing that help you start and finish your project.

Each Smart Project contains customizable milestones and tasks with smart tips to guide you throughout. We offer smart projects for blogging, expository essays, letters to Congress, novels, and short stories - and we’re adding more all the time based on your feedback. With your support, we can build a greater library of subjects, work with experts to offer customized plans, and help expand your writing horizons to keep you engaged on the page.

Some examples:

 

Get Involved and Affect Change with our Advocacy tool

"My Letter to Congress" Smart Project

 

Build your Blog with Expert Guidance

"My Blog Post" Smart Project

 

Follow Through on Inspiration and Finish your Creative Writing

"My Short Story" Smart Project

 

Write More in Less Time with our Built-in Timer

Timed writing exercises are an incredible tactic for breaking through writing blocks, and meeting your writing goals. But most tools recommend you go elsewhere to find them. Not us. To help keep you focused, and on track toward finishing, we built a timer into TheRightMargin. Use the timer to write more words in less time, increase your writing output, and break through writer's block.

 

...but wait, there's more.

 

The World's Largest Slack Writing Community

We call it the Writer Hangout.

Writing can be a lonely endeavor - so having a community really helps. We've created a Slack community for writers to meet other writers of all types, to get further help, encouragement, and resources beyond our site. And, our dedicated #therightmargin channel is a great way to share ideas, feedback about TheRightMargin, and talk to our dedicated writer support team. Every sign up to TheRightMargin automatically gets an invite to this awesome community.

        

 

 

Our Timeline to Build the Future of Writing

 

With your help, we can build a mobile experience, expand our reach, make our tool smarter and become the new way to write.

As a thank you for your support, please consider checking out our perks!

Reward Tiers

 

Testimonials: What are users saying?

              

                 

 

Who are we?

 

We're all writers, building a better world for writers.

 

 

 

A Quick Story...

The idea behind TheRightMargin was started by Shivani Bhargava in 2014. Though she comes from a health tech background, Shivani began fiddling with some ideas to make writing easier because she was sick of the status quo writing tools available to her for her professional and personal writing. It felt silly to Shivani that with the technology available to us today, we were all stuck typing on a flat, 2-D piece of paper that's just been put on a screen. And though tools like MS Word and Google Docs have had their time, it was time to move the act of writing into the future.

Her vision is to build the most intelligent writing experience in the world so that the momentum and morale blockers people feel today don't stand in the way of expression, communication and innovation tomorrow. 

 

The Crux

Imagine being able to stay as inspired, motivated and accomplished from beginning to end on any writing project. Imagine improving the quality of your writing by tailored guidance and resources when and if you need them--based on what you're writing about. This isn't a writing coach. Or a class. It's a smart writing tool that aims to take a lot of burden off your shoulders so you can focus on producing great and inspiring content.

We already have an awesome goal-driven writing tool available for anyone to use. Help us take the next level up in our technology. Help us make it smarter and more seamless. 

 

FAQs

Can I try out TheRightMargin? Are you already available online?

Yes. Sign up for a free 14-day trial anytime and get the full TRM experience! No credit card is required to sign up.

Is TheRightMargin available on my mobile device?

It’s on our roadmap and your contribution will make it happen sooner! Let us know what you’d like to see by filling out this short survey here.

Where is my writing saved?

Your writing is saved to the cloud. Every time your writing autosaves, our database will capture your latest edits and we save the 10 latest drafts in our database for an extra layer of protection. We use Heroku as our database service currently.

Can anyone see my writing?

No. TheRightMargin is your personal writing and planning workspace, so everything you write is private. Our entire site is secured with SSL to protect your data. The only exceptions to this are if you choose to share your credentials with people and/or if our customer support team dives into the database to assist you with an issue.

What does AI for writing mean?

Artificial Intelligence is intelligence exhibited by machines. In some simple ways, TheRightMargin is already artificially intelligent because of smart keyword recognition that happens in the back end when serving up ‘smart tips’ for tasks or when it calculates the math in helping you break down your goals for project setup.

However, we’d like to make this much more robust. A level up would be to use Natural Language Processing (NLP) to feed TheRightMargin with more data on writer goals, pain points, tips and guidance so that the tailored guidance on the app is even better and helpful.

So imagine indicating to TheRightMargin your goals, your challenges and the specifics about a particular project and it serving up to you the best ways to get unblocked, to get the notes/research/information you need to write, to plan and to achieve your writing goals.

Another level up would be to move writing off a web application completely. We want to move writing into the future and it’s possible that someone a few years from now would be working with VR/AR tech instead of laptops and phones. In summary, we want TheRightMargin to take all the wondrous benefits that cutting edge AI technology can offer us to improve how we write on a daily basis.

Do you offer academic pricing?

Please get in touch at support@therightmargin.com. We always want to encourage and support academic writing and would love to pilot it with your academic organization.

What’s the difference between the subscriptions?

There is no difference in features or experience. There is simply a discount for committing to a longer membership. Committing to your writing for a full year is a better deal than paying for a quarter or going month-to-month.

How do I cancel my subscription?

With one click from your account page. If you suspend/cancel a subscription plan, you’ll have access to your workspace until your current billing cycle runs out. You won’t be charged unless you choose to reactivate your subscription or choose another plan.

How do I get my writing out once my subscription isn't active?

Even if you don't have an active subscription, you won't be locked out of your projects dashboard and account settings. You should be able to export all your writing through your projects dashboard. And if you run into any difficulties, just hit us up at support@therightmargin.com. We'll help you out!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

No worries. You can visit us, help spread the word and help us expand our reach.

  1. Go sign up and try us out for yourself. Start a new project (maybe that short story idea you’ve had percolating for awhile) or plan out the rest of an existing one (cheers to you and your progress so far!) We’d love to hear from you about your experience using TheRightMargin for your latest writing project.
  2. Help us spread the word. Know a few friends who are interested in writing, creativity, productivity and tech? Let them know about us, we might be the one they’ve been waiting to meet! See the social links at the top of the page? We’d really appreciate a shout-out or two!
  3. Introduce us to someone. Meeting new friends, talking about writing and learning from the community is our jam. If something about us tickled your fancy and brought to mind writers or influencers you know would want to get in touch, we’d be flattered to get an introduction. Connect with us anytime at support@therightmargin.com.

If you got this far and are reading every word, you are amazing. Just thought we'd let you know. Thanks for reading about our mission!
story_txt:
"If you want to write consistently, track your progress and eventually hit the finish line, TRM is the way to go."
- Victor R.
 
"I use it. I like it! I come back day after day. It's a comfortable fit for me. I will be first in line for the mobile app."
- Farley S.

"TheRightMargin's tone is encouraging. These writing projects are not about beating yourself up. And we're here to help."
- Ryan R.
 
Where do you fit?
Types of projects on TheRightMargin today

 
What is TheRightMargin?
We are a writing web app (yep, that means we're on the cloud) that is changing how people write. Gone are the days of word processors that simply put a piece of paper on a screen. Say hello to a completely fresh approach to getting your writing done...
 
A Beautiful and Clean Writing Interface
Step into the future of writing with our fresh design.

 
Start with your Goals First
Every project setup experience smartly breaks down ambitious writing goals into actionable milestones and tasks.
                           
One of the number one reasons people don't finish their work is because they don't know what to do next. Our goal-driven project setup helps you break down your large, undefinable writing goals into smaller, more achievable steps. This process sets you up for success and it's proven that people with written goals are more likely to achieve them.
 
The All-in-one Writing Workspace 
Write alongside your plan to always know what’s next.

Switching between writing and planning tools interrupts your flow so our all-in-one workspace protects your context from distractions. Within your timeline, you can add notes, outlines, research and other supplementary bits of information for any particular project. When your writing lives next to your plan, you’ll always know what you’ve accomplished and what’s left to do—making your writing journey more achievable and enjoyable.

 
Smart Guidance to Get Unstuck and Finish
For particular tasks and goals, TheRightMargin smartly suggests tips on how to move forward. Our experience is like a coach who has your back and wants you to succeed. But this is just a first pass. Help us build AI behind the guidance and suggestions to make the experience even more useful.
With your backing, we could learn which advice performs best, use the best expertise to train the tool, and help every writer on TheRightMargin write better tasks that have the best chance of being completed.

 
Seamlessly Work on Multiple Writing Projects
TheRightMargin easily accommodates the writer who has many types of writing projects.

While most writing tools throw you into a blank document, we take a more holistic approach. Our elegant projects page will keep you focused on your upcoming milestones and even remind you if you've missed a few (because hey, we're only human). It's perfect for the busy writer working on multiple, different pieces with different requirements and deadlines. We use it ourselves to manage everything we write and plan to write.
 
Catch Up Easily
We get it. Life gets in the way. Progress is #winning in our books so we make it easy to change your plan as you go along so you can continue to accomplish without feeling lost or behind.

 
Guided, Customized Writing Plans
Our goal is to help you break down your writing project into achievable steps. But sometimes, you just don’t know where to begin. So we built Smart Projects: Guided writing plans focused on specific types of writing that help you start and finish your project.
Each Smart Project contains customizable milestones and tasks with smart tips to guide you throughout. We offer smart projects for blogging, expository essays, letters to Congress, novels, and short stories - and we’re adding more all the time based on your feedback. With your support, we can build a greater library of subjects, work with experts to offer customized plans, and help expand your writing horizons to keep you engaged on the page.
Some examples:
 
Get Involved and Affect Change with our Advocacy tool
"My Letter to Congress" Smart Project

 
Build your Blog with Expert Guidance
"My Blog Post" Smart Project

 
Follow Through on Inspiration and Finish your Creative Writing
"My Short Story" Smart Project

 
Write More in Less Time with our Built-in Timer


Timed writing exercises are an incredible tactic for breaking through writing blocks, and meeting your writing goals. But most tools recommend you go elsewhere to find them. Not us. To help keep you focused, and on track toward finishing, we built a timer into TheRightMargin. Use the timer to write more words in less time, increase your writing output, and break through writer's block.
 
...but wait, there's more.
 

The World's Largest Slack Writing Community
We call it the Writer Hangout.
Writing can be a lonely endeavor - so having a community really helps. We've created a Slack community for writers to meet other writers of all types, to get further help, encouragement, and resources beyond our site. And, our dedicated #therightmargin channel is a great way to share ideas, feedback about TheRightMargin, and talk to our dedicated writer support team. Every sign up to TheRightMargin automatically gets an invite to this awesome community.
        
 

 
Our Timeline to Build the Future of Writing

 
With your help, we can build a mobile experience, expand our reach, make our tool smarter and become the new way to write.
As a thank you for your support, please consider checking out our perks!
Reward Tiers


 
Testimonials: What are users saying?
              
                 
 
Who are we?
 
We're all writers, building a better world for writers.
 

 
 
A Quick Story...
The idea behind TheRightMargin was started by Shivani Bhargava in 2014. Though she comes from a health tech background, Shivani began fiddling with some ideas to make writing easier because she was sick of the status quo writing tools available to her for her professional and personal writing. It felt silly to Shivani that with the technology available to us today, we were all stuck typing on a flat, 2-D piece of paper that's just been put on a screen. And though tools like MS Word and Google Docs have had their time, it was time to move the act of writing into the future.
Her vision is to build the most intelligent writing experience in the world so that the momentum and morale blockers people feel today don't stand in the way of expression, communication and innovation tomorrow. 
 
The Crux
Imagine being able to stay as inspired, motivated and accomplished from beginning to end on any writing project. Imagine improving the quality of your writing by tailored guidance and resources when and if you need them--based on what you're writing about. This isn't a writing coach. Or a class. It's a smart writing tool that aims to take a lot of burden off your shoulders so you can focus on producing great and inspiring content.
We already have an awesome goal-driven writing tool available for anyone to use. Help us take the next level up in our technology. Help us make it smarter and more seamless. 
 
FAQs
Can I try out TheRightMargin? Are you already available online?
Yes. Sign up for a free 14-day trial anytime and get the full TRM experience! No credit card is required to sign up.
Is TheRightMargin available on my mobile device?
It’s on our roadmap and your contribution will make it happen sooner! Let us know what you’d like to see by filling out this short survey here.

So imagine indicating to TheRightMargin your goals, your challenges and the specifics about a particular project and it serving up to you the best ways to get unblocked, to get the notes/research/information you need to write, to plan and to achieve your writing goals.
Another level up would be to move writing off a web application completely. We want to move writing into the future and it’s possible that someone a few years from now would be working with VR/AR tech instead of laptops and phones. In summary, we want TheRightMargin to take all the wondrous benefits that cutting edge AI technology can offer us to improve how we write on a daily basis.

And if you run into any difficulties, just hit us up at support@therightmargin.com. We'll help you out!

Go sign up and try us out for yourself. story:
The first batch production has been completed.

The finished product is waiting for shipment.

Too many tasks on a single screen may drive you crazy!

Our work is inseparable from the computer, programming, animation production, stocks, presentations, video editing… and many other tasks. A single screen may not meet all your needs and affect your work efficiency.

It is not that your computer is not powerful enough, but that everyone has to do a lot of tasks. You need multiple screens on your computer to build your own mobile workstation in a simple and convenient way.

OFIYAA is a multifunctional and portable dual screen laptop monitor that allows you to quickly build a personal mobile workstation and work anywhere efficiently. Turning one computer into three, you can view the content on three screens at the same time, which can increase your productivity by up to 50% and realize efficient multitasking.

Equipped with 2 x TYPE-C, 1 x USB, and 1 x HDMI port  to connect other peripherals such as cameras, video devices, Android phones, etc., you can set up your own mobile workstation to start working efficiently no matter where you are.

When we work daily on our computer, switching between windows and applications may take about 10 seconds every five minutes. Sometimes it leads to file errors and data confusion. The traditional split-screen setup is complicated, and the cost of additional monitors is also high.

OFIYAA is a versatile, easy-to-use and affordable mobile dual-screen monitor!

It provides you with more space to operate on your computer and can greatly increase your productivity without the cost of additional monitors.

Just plug in the USB-C cable and start working right away!

OFIYAA can be combined with the laptop screen in a variety of content display modes. You can choose to display the same content or different content on the three screens. And you can also display content from the external video input devices. It is compact and convenient to present any image you want on the screens, which can meet a variety of display needs in your life. 

Support for Mac/Windows/Android/Chrome/Linux.

OFIYAA monitor fits laptops with screens ranging from 13 inches to16.9 inches( laptop width≤44cm/15.7 inches, laptop height≥21cm/8.2 inches),  the clamp can go to 40cm/15.7 inches in width and a fixed height of 21cm/8.2 inches.
And each screen of OFIYAA monitor can be individually adjusted to set the display parameters. It uses 11.6 inches, 16:9 FHD high-definition display with a resolution of 1080P/60HZ (1920*1080P).

Each screen has a parameter setting function. You can set the parameters according to your preference to meet the needs of different jobs on the screen. The main adjustable parameters are brightness, color, scene mode, DCR, sharpness, hue, saturation, backlight, color temperature, language setting, aspect, auto powerdown, wide dynamic mode , volume adjustment and total 30 parameter setting options.

OFIYAA has a brightness of 220CD/㎡, a matte WLED backlight, and an IPS panel with wide viewing angle technology, so you can clearly watch the screen content from multiple angles without distortion. The screen has an Energy Star rating, which can prolong the battery consumption of the laptop. The single screen power is high efficiency 5W, energy saving, and durable, even if it is powered by a laptop computer, it can guarantee long-term use.

OFIYAA has a full rotation angle of 202°, so you can choose the best viewing angle in any situation, and multiple people can watch at the same time from different angles.

OFIYAA is made of high quality industrial materials and can withstand the wear and tear of carrying with the laptop computers. It has passed 10,000+ times of repeated folding fatigue tests and can be used for at least 5 years or longer.

OFIYAA's weight is only 2.93lb, and the size is 315*215*39MM, which is convenient to carry, and you can set up your personal workstation at any time in a backpack. Fortunately, when you are at home or need to go out to work, the lightness and practicality of an extra monitor will provide enormous help.

OFIYAA can not only connect to a computer, but also a mobile phone through Type-C to realize the conversion of mobile phone mode/computer mode, so that the mobile phone can become a computer in a few seconds. After connection, the content displayed by the mobile phone can be projected on the screen, or the mobile phone can be used as a microcomputer to operate on the screen like a computer. Currently, this function supports Huawei EMUI and Samsung DEX.

Each screen of OFIYAA is equipped with 2 x TYPE-C, 1 x USB, and 1 x HDMI port.

TYPE-C : Digital visual & power supply.
HDMI: Video input port. Also desktop host/laptop/mini PC/set-top box/game console with HDMI output port can be directly connected to screens.And a 5V/2A mobile phone power supply can light up the screen.
USB: External extension port. It supports mouse, keyboard, camera, game console, hard disk, camera, etc.
If your laptop doesn't have TYPE-C and HDMI port, an adapter can help to connect. And a 5V/2A mobile phone power supply can light up the screen.

OFIYAA surpasses the functions of two monitors, and the crowdfunding price is lower than other display devices. The 1 + 1 screen combination is more powerful than any monitor. This cost-effective mobile workstation will become an indispensable multifunctional display device in your life.

Reviewers Love It...

The first batch production has been completed.

The finished product is waiting for shipment.

 

​

With the development of intelligent technology today, how to improve the quality of human life and office efficiency with the help of various devices is the direction of our continuous research and development. Hope our products can change our life, make our life, and work more simple and convenient! In the future, we will launch more intelligent display products!

Founded in 2015, OFIYAA has been committed to the research and development of digital display equipment products and has accumulated rich experience in LED display and lighting fields. Before the crowd-funding of this product, we have gone through 4 generations of product testing and perfection before bringing this project to you. 

OFIYAA has two independent R&D centers, one in Canada and the other in Shenzhen, China, each equipped with a testing laboratory. We have factories in Taiwan, design teams, and sales offices in Korea, Japan, Germany, and the United Kingdom.

Our products have completed functional testing, and many users have expeirneced the product. Now we are ready for mass production. After the crowdfunding is over, we will complete the delivery as soon as possible, and we will update the production progress at any time so that you can receive and experience our products as soon as possible!
