3. GiziMax
3.1   GiziMax 130 Basic*: US $4150          Build Height = 130mm (5.5in)​          Build Area = 200mm x 113mm (7.87in x 4.44in)          5L resin included in price, super speed add-on not included.3.2  GiziMax 430 Basic*: US $4450         Build Height = 430mm (16.92in)         Build Area = 200mm x 113mm (7.87in x 4.44in)         11L resin included in price, super speed add-on not included.3.3  GiziMax 800 Basic*: US $4950        Build Height = 800mm (31.49in)        Build Area = 200mm x 113mm (7.87in x 4.44in)        ​20L resin included in price, super speed add-on not included.3.4 Wide Vat! GiziMax Ultimate: US $11775 - The all-inclusive GiziMax deal!        Build Height = 800mm (31.49in)        Build Area = 400mm x 225mm (15.7in x 8.8in)        79L resin included in price, super speed add-on and much more included        (see description in perks)*The default build plate size of these printers will allow you to print 200mm x 113mm. After the campaign you will be able to get a different vat + build plate as an extraThere are too many awesome options to mention them all in this campaign. Please email info@gizmo3Dprinters.com.au for a personal Gizmo 3D Printer recommendation tailored to your individual needs.

10 reasons why you need to be first in line to get this innovative 3D printer in your life:
1. Reliability
We don’t believe in dressing our machines up in fancy clothes. Instead, the Gizmo 3D printer is proud to show you what it's made of - quality parts that scream reliability!
One of the main reasons people get frustrated with other 3D printers is that they are constantly having to replace low quality parts. You won’t find this with the Gizmo 3D; our machines are built to last, and it shows.
2. The ground-breaking super speed add-on (prints up to 3mm per minute/7 inches per hour)
Our world famous super speed add-on (patent pending) fits on all 3 of our machines and allows you to print more than one item at a time at super speed. Unlike 3D printers with extruders that print only a section of a layer of the object at a time, our technology enables you to print the whole layer at once, giving you great results in record time. In addition, the add-on allows you to print numerous objects in the time it takes for other printers to process one.
Conditions apply: Continuous printing comes with certain limitations. It does not handle flat surfaces which are parallel to the build plate, and needs a certain wall thickness to print perfectly. This can be solved using standard printing.




Castle by boldmachines and X-wing by DavidHanwell


Click here to see a real-time super speed print job.3. Impressive high resolution capability, whenever you need it
Users can look forward to printing high resolution results that wow even the most discerning of tastes. What’s more, these results are achievable using our standard machines and do not require the super speed add-on.
At CES 2016, we put our results to the test, handing out magnifying glasses to visitors and asking them to examine our 3D prints. These impartial observers were more than impressed, and we were the only company to do this.
The XY resolution of our machines is between 36 and 200 micron, while the calculated Z resolution is 0.07 micron. We have experimented successfully with different lenses, boosting this resolution even more for very small and detailed prints, and can now print with an XY resolution of 20 micron, using the add-on.


Open Source Ring by DjSplitterPro,  Smoking man by fredini, Eiffel Tower by B9Creations, Pendant by 3DShook
 and Rook by alfred_g_c

4. Competitive pricing
Our standard Gizmo 3D machine (without the super speed add-on) is available to buy on IndieGoGo from only $2950 throughout March. By jumping the queue and becoming one of our first 30 backers, you will save a further $200; the best deal you will ever find on this incredible printer.
The super speed add-on is available for purchase anytime at only $2600, representing our commitment to delivering the best add-ons at the most reasonable prices.
5. Different materials to suit your projects and budget
Our machines are compatible with Fun To Do Resin, which is affordable and widely available in many countries. Included in the prices of our machines is enough Fun To Do resin for you to dive straight in and start printing right away. We are currently testing more brands of resin so that we may be able to recommend resin types to you to suit your individual needs. These include resin from pro3dcure, Monocure and Vitang.
6. Consistent Results, Remote Repeatability
Every time you run a print job, the software will create a .gizmo file containing all the configuration details needed to repeat the same job, with the same results, time and time again, on any Gizmo printer.

Need consistent results remotely? No problem! Simply send the .gizmo file to another Gizmo 3D printer, anywhere in the world, and sit back and relax, safe in the knowledge that it will print exactly the same on the other side. The receiver won’t have to slice the object again, or add any supports – they will just need to hit ‘print’. Think of the Gizmo 3D Printer as your personal teleportation device, bringing you the future, today.
7. Innovative software features
Our 3D Printer Software, Gizmetor, includes features never before seen anywhere in the 3D printing world, including full layer manipulation, which is the ability to select a particular layer within a print job, and specify how you would like it printed (i.e. hollow, solid, detailed or faster). The machines are highly configurable, allowing you to easily switch between ultra-detailed high res prints and super speed prints with ease.

Coming soon: A full list of the software features that you can look forward to.8. Expandable
Each machine is built in such a way that it grows with the user and their needs. If your situation changes and you find you need a bigger vat, this is not a problem; you can simply purchase the add-on. With other 3D printers, such an upgrade would require the purchase of a whole new machine.
9. Made for users, by users
We’re all about the user, and do everything we can to deliver you the best experience possible. This is because we are just like you; we love 3D printing!
However, we also aim to provide users with as much flexibility, capability and functionality as possible, giving you the ability to configure the printer in any way you see fit. While this is surely enough to raise the pulses of experienced users or those with some mid-level 3D printing know-how, it could leave absolute beginners feeling a little overwhelmed. Don’t be disheartened; enjoy the experience, progress along the learning curve, and invest some time and effort in developing your skills... believe us, it’s worth it!




10. Top Down System = Guaranteed Reduction in Downtime and Costs
Our top down system means that the vat doesn’t need to be emptied between prints because the unwanted hardened chunks of resin sink to the bottom. This means users can start printing as soon as the previous print is complete, saving even more time in between already super fast prints. Have you experienced all the hassle and inconvenience of a bottom up printer? Not even an issue with the Gizmo 3D.
The Advantages of a Top Down System

The build plate doesn’t need to be removed from the printer to remove the printed object. Users simply need to scrape the finished print off the plate and start printing again immediately.
When the print job is done, the printed object sits on top of the build plate, rather than hanging off the bottom.  This means less supports are needed than with bottom up printers, which reduces resin wastage and cleaning time.
Users can pause the printing process and add metal bits such as screws and bolts to their 3D object if they like. We don’t believe it can be done easily with bottom up machines.
Users will experience less downtime because they can calibrate far more easily than they would be able to with bottom up DLP printers.
Bottom up printers normally need a silicone layer which must be replaced regularly. With Gizmo 3D Printers, no replacement parts are required during the printing process because we print directly onto the resin.
If that’s not enough reasons to get you jumping for joy,  click here to check out our 101 (good!) reasons to get hold of a Gizmo 3D printer! 
Patent pending

The patent pending covers the way we do super speed printing.  We use multiple image sources to produce a single image.  The image sources are aligned using mechanical and digital means.  The patent pending also covers stitching multiple images sources together using mechanical and digital means to form a bigger printing area.Stretch goals
We are so happy to be at the stage where we can finally reveal our stretch goals (all thanks to our wonderful backers). 

Vastly improved user experienceWe want to provide a breath of fresh air in the market and give the long-suffering members of the 3D printing community the experience they deserve. Why? Because we too know how it feels to wake up, run downstairs and find a failed print waiting for us!We are Kobus and Michelle du Toit; a husband and wife team and the proud owners of this tiny but potent Australian startup. Gizmo 3D Printers exists because of low quality 3D printers and the frustrations they cause. Kobus experienced these frustrations himself until one day he decided ‘no more’, and set out to build a 3D printer that offered the best experience possible to users. Together, our dream is to overhaul the 3D printing market, putting users first and giving them an outstanding experience at a competitive price.


The technical details that us Geeks love:All of our printers can print either at a standard speed (also known as sequential printing) or continuously. Sequential printing is used for highly detailed prints, such as jewellery and other more intricate projects.
When printing continuously without our super speed add-on, Gizmo 3D printers can achieve speeds of between 0.5mm to 1mm per minute, depending on the size of the projection area. The bigger the area, the slower the printing time. Users will be able to print continuously from 70mm x 39mm at 1mm per minute to 160mm x 90mm at 0.5mm per minute on any of our machines.
Please note: Continuous printing does have its limitations. The top left corner is the weakest spot in the projection area, so the bigger the area, the less power the machine will be able to wield. This may mean that you will not be able to use some areas of the build plate when printing continuously.
Most of the time, you will need to set a hollow value of between 0.1 and 0.3, using the software. If you require extra strength within the printed object, you can add a honeycomb structure. This will give you a wall thickness of between 0.5mm and 1mm, providing additional strength and structural integrity.
Slower printing provides you with thicker walls, adding further strength to the object. To give you an idea of what you can expect, we are currently printing a skull hollow at 0.5mm per minute, with walls that are just over 1.7mm thick.
Need to print surfaces parallel to the build plate? Simply print the object an angle, or switch over to standard printing mode.
You can configure the software to swap between continuous and standard printing modes quickly and easily between layers when printing an object. Switching between modes in this way will not affect the quality of the print job, as evidenced by the picture of The Eiffel Tower model, below, which was printed with 85 overrides and included 6 to 8 periods of continuous printing.


Eiffel Tower by B9Creations

Slower printing might be best for more detailed projects, but you can still get great results in an ultra-quick time with our super speed add-on (US $2600). With this add-on, an area of 110mm x 62mm can be printed at 3mm per minute, with results that are unmatched by our competitors in the market. Of course, as you increase the size of your projection area, the speed of your print job decreases. When printing continuously, your projection width can be a maximum of 325mm and you can print at a speed of 0.5mm per minute.
The super speed add-on is a second projector, with rails, brackets and electronics which combine images perfectly. It also includes a remote handset to control the electronics, an IR extender, multiple power cables for both projectors, multiple HDMI cables, and multiple adapters to plug all the cables into the electronics. The add-on is highly effective, reducing the display time needed to produce sequential prints by up to half. (Please note, this is half the display time, not half the total print time).

How do Gizmo 3D Printers compare to other 3D printers?
The Gizmo 3D Printer is unique. Ours is the only top down resin-based 3D printer of its kind, giving you a raft of advantages over other 3D printing methods available on the market. Take a look at our handy table outlining some general dimensions and stats to compare:



What we need & what you will receive


We need your help in making Gizmo even more amazing and in bringing this incredible machine to market. We ask you to contribute whatever you can to our Indiegogo funding campaign, as we aim to raise the $95,000 we need to take Gizmo 3D to the next level. The more we raise; the farther we can push the Gizmo 3D envelope!
We will use the funding we receive to enhance the unique and cutting edge capabilities of Gizmo, as well as developing the Gizmo Share Library. Through this library, Gizmo 3D Printer users will be able to share object files, tutorials and user experiences, as well as rating our equipment and even donating towards other projects.We also aim to develop our resources and streamline our manufacturing process, allowing us to dramatically improve our time-to-delivery (currently 4-6 months per customer order). In addition to this, we will enter into partnerships with resin manufacturers in an effort to create a variety of materials (i.e transparent, flexible and different coloured materials) for the Gizmo machine. With these materials – and the support that we will be able to offer – the potential for our customers’ projects is limitless. We’ve come this far, but, with your help, we can go so much further. What we have created up to now is really only a fraction of what is possible. Go ahead and become part of something truly amazing!
The impact
This technology is the magic ingredient required to advance 
manufacturing in a multitude of different and diverse industries. 
However, being a start-up, we don’t have the funding required to get the
 word out there! Every day that goes past is another day that a company 
could have benefited from this tech, yet they simply were not aware of 
it. Instead, they are losing time and money that we could be saving for 
them!

Industries that could be benefitting from this technology today 
include medicine, dentistry, aviation, military, creative, fashion and 
education, to name just a few. The time and money that they can save 
using this technology can be better spent on finding cures, funding 
studies, educating young minds and developing other technologies which 
benefit us all in the long run. 
“My wife and I run a business teaching technology to children. We use the 3D printer when we’re teaching children 3D design. We help them print out 3D prints of their objects. When you are teaching children, they don’t have a lot of patience for 3 hour print jobs so the super speed is a very nice feature for us.”-  Kent Kuhler, Entrepreneur/Engineer, Desert Community Robotics.“As I use very thin-walled (20 mils) egg-shells for casting ear plugs, your super speed 3D-printers would work perfect. My vision is to also offer instant manufacturing of the ear plugs similar to all these express photo shops in the past: "Get your photos within an hour!"- Tony Levander, CEO/Owner, ILICON AB
“I can see it being really good to use among students like me in Universities because it’s so reliable and tough. I look forward to using it for prototyping of my university projects.”- Jacob Murray, QUT Student“ As a Research Assistant at McMaster University, managing the 3D printing technology of our lab is one of my primary responsibilities. The ratio of "amount of different printers we have" vs. "printer innovation" is pretty poor. Every printer on the market seems like a "Version 2.0" of the printer before it.  Half the purpose of our lab is to teach about machines, and the other half is to pump out quality and consistent prints. If every printer we have works almost exactly the same as the one beside it; slow, inconsistent, limited in design, or completely closed box, I've often wondered why we bother with so many different "run of the mill" printers.
That's why I'm so excited about the Gizmo 3D.Finally a printer that breaks the mould and doesn't copy it's competition!The whole purpose of 3D printing is re-invention and innovation.”- James Hutton, Research Assistant, McMaster University
Testimonials
This technology is so advanced that there are people who find it hard to believe that it exists. We don’t expect you to just take our word for it, so here’s some testimonials from our beta testers, and more people who have seen these machines in action themselves:Beta testers: (In addition to the videos at the top of the campaign)
“The Gizmo 3D sets itself apart in a few areas.  It’s much faster than the regular FDM machines whilst not compromising on the output quality.  Its robust parts means that it is very reliable in terms of its printing with repeatable results.  This in itself, allows you to fine tune very quickly – you can adjust for very quick printing for prototyping or slow down and attain a quality finish similar to mass manufactured parts.  In some prints, it rivals our polyjet machine whilst being more reliable.  It’s a lot simpler to operate compared to other laser SLS machines – the top down action means that there’s no complicated peeling required and you don’t have to worry about uncured debris blocking the print.  Just stir and print. “- Kin Ly FBE FabLab, University of New South Wales CES 2016 attendees:










Our vision and mission
Vision Statement:To keep on delivering an innovative, top-quality product that the 3D printing community can believe in, while keeping our pricing competitive and giving our customers the printing experience they deserve.Mission Statement:Our mission is to connect the global 3D printing community with innovative, high-quality 3D printers and accessories, allowing them to pursue their passion at a price they can afford.We strive to make 3D printing fast, fun and efficient for our users, and the starting point is what we hope to be a successful Indiegogo campaign. With this funding, we will have the opportunity to grow our organisation and to reach our full potential.
Risks and Challenges
Continuing to reduce production issuesWe have already completed a small production run of 4 beta machines and a pre-production run of 15 printers, so we know that we can deliver. Our suppliers are already in place, we have our shipment channels, our TNT accounts and DHL accounts all set up and already in operation. We have already sent printers to locations all over the globe, including France, Vietnam, Taiwan, multiple USA cities, Canada and Australia.
The initial teething troubles and issues we experienced were all dealt with accordingly, and the experience we gained during those production runs prepared us well for the upcoming Indiegogo production run. With all this in place, we are certain that we won’t let our backers down.
Delayed shipping & damaged goodsCurrently, shipping times are between 4 and 6 months. The printers will be shipped from Vietnam in wooden crates, which have been specifically designed to prevent damage in transit. Easing the learning curve for backersThis is cutting edge technology, and as such, there will always be something of a learning curve for users to get to grips with.
We have a panel of reputable beta testers, who have provided us with feedback regarding this. We will make this information available to the public via tutorials, a quick-start guide and a more detailed handbook, as well as using their feedback to further hone our products and enhance the experience for the end user.
Building our inventoryWe are actively looking for debt funding that will allow us to build more 3D printers that can be ordered from our website immediately after the campaign is completed.
JealousyUsers of our machines may be subjected to jealousy in the workplace. This is natural. Our advice in dealing with this is as follows; give away 3D prints as gifts and peace offerings. You will be printing them so fast and so cheaply anyway, using our affordable resin.
What do the T-shirt rewards look like?The T-shirt features a cheeky illustration of the scientific proof that the top down method is better than the bottom up method:
Other ways you can help
Spread the word!Every day that passes by is a huge loss to many industries and organisations that could be benefitting from this technology. You can help to put this right by spreading the word about this breakthrough technology. Don’t let the world miss out any longer; use word of mouth, social media, blog platforms and whatever you can to get the word out there. Every effort helps and is very much appreciated!FAQ
Have a question? If the info below doesn't answer your question, you can ask the project creator directly or email info@gizmo3Dprinters.com.au.____________________________________________________________________________
What color is the included resin?It is the red that you see being used in most of our 3D print photos.Can you tell me the technical differences between the GiziMate 130 and the GiziPro 130?
The GiziPro can be upgraded by the user to add a vat that will allow prints that are 390mm tall where the tallest vat that can be installed in the GiziMate is a 260mm tall vat.
The GiziPro is taller so you can move the projector assembly further away from the vat .  This means you don't need to lower the wide vat that much to get to the 400mm wide projection area.  With the GiziMate you need to lower the wide vat to the bottom to achieve the 400mm wide projection area.  This means the GiziPro can print taller objects when using the wide vat compared to the GiziMate.
Why do the GiziMate 130 Basic, GiziPro 130 Basic and GiziMax 130 Basic all come with the same build volume? I don't see what the advantage is of purchasing the more expensive ones. It seems the Pro and Max should come with a larger build plate as standard.It is because our machines grows with the user, so when you purchase a machine, it comes with the standard sized vat and build plate and when you want to scale to make bigger prints, you can just buy the larger vat and build plate that you need. The advantage is - if you have the bigger machine already, you can upgrade to the bigger vat and build plate anytime when you have the money to do so.Why is the GiziMate 390 Basic the only one where the Indiegogo price is the same as the MSRP ($4100)? All the others have a special Indiegogo launch price, why not this one?It does  have a special Indiegogo launch price, you just picked up a mistake we made with the MSRP price - it should have been listed as MSRP $4550. Because someone has already backed it, that figure cant be changed in the perks. The price of the printer is correct though.Why is shipping not included in the price?Global shipping prices vary. It is much cheaper for the user to handle this on a country-by-country basis.How much is the international shipping cost?The price of shipping varies depending on what country you live in. Unfortunately, international shipping is far from simple; different countries levy different taxes and charges against shipping. Because of this, we ask that the buyer assumes responsibility for such charges when ordering a Gizmo 3D printer.
When will my Gizmo 3D Printer arrive?Your printer will arrive between 4 and 6 months after the Indiegogo campaign ends on 31 March 2016 (unless otherwise specified in the perks section).Can I use third party resins with the Gizmo 3D Printer?In theory, any DLP compatible resin will work. However, we can only guarantee that resins we have personally tested will work with our machines. Can you print a sample of my own file?At this time we are very busy on getting the Gizmo 3D Printer out the door so we are currently unable to provide individual samples.  We are working on this and will post updates via the Indiegogo page when we are able to offer this service. 
Will Gizmo 3D Printers offer a warranty or support?At the moment we are unable to provide specific details in terms of warranty and support, but we are in the process of developing this. However, we can guarantee that the printer you will receive will be in full working order, and we can tell you that we are planning to take extra special care of the supporters who have been with us from the beginning.
Do you have plans for making a bigger printer?This is part of our long term aim, although nothing concrete has been designed as yet.
What comes with my Gizmo 3D Printer?The Gizmo 3D Printer comes with enough resin to get you started and a hand pump to use when pumping out resin from your vat when you want to switch resins.

story:
Click here for English version

 

Über uns

 

Wir -Tobias Hamacher und Felix Neumair- bilden das Team von:

 

PRESTIGE PHONE

prestigephone.de

 

Im Folgenden stellen wir uns kurz vor:

Tobias Hamacher:

- 18-jähriger Abiturient

- erste Erfahrung in der Selbstständigkeit , speziell im Bereich 3D-Druck

- wohnhaft in Brühl bei Köln

- überzeugt durch seine IT-Kenntnisse und seine Affinität für Technik

 

Felix Neumair:

- 18-jähriger Wirtschafts-Abiturient

- ebenfalls wohnhaft in Brühl

- besitzt fundierte Kenntnisse im kaufmännischen Bereich

 

Wir kennen uns aus unserer gemeinsamen Schulzeit und haben uns stets über mögliche Geschäftsideen ausgetauscht, wobei wir schließlich beide sehr von der Idee des PRESTIGE PHONE im exklusiven Gold und Silber Design angetan waren. Aus anfänglichen Ideen und ersten realistischen Plänen wurde schnell eine ernsthafte Unternehmung, welche nun unter dem Namen PRESTIGE PHONE bekannt ist.

 

Nachdem die anfänglichen Formalitäten, wie z.B. die Eintragung ins Steuerregister, die Anmeldung des Gewerbes und Ausarbeitung von internen Verträgen mit vollem Ehrgeiz erledigt waren, ging es an die Recherche nach spezialisierten Händlern und Auftragsfertiger, die die essentiellen Komponenten zeitnah und in höchstmöglicher Qualität liefern können. Nach andauernden Telefonaten und Preisverhandlungen nahm der Traum von unserem PRESTIGE PHONE immer mehr Form an.

 

Unsere Kernkompetenzen umfassen die Veredelung des iPhone sowie dessen Vertrieb unter der Eigenmarke PRESTIGE PHONE.

 

 

 

 

Wir verwenden ausschließlich neue, hochwertige Komponenten und Materialien als Ausgangsbasis, um technische Komplikationen von Anfang an zu vermeiden, wodurch wir ebenfalls ein hohes Maß an Qualität gewährleisten.

 

 

Kollektion

 

 

 

Der Anlass für unser Crowdfunding-Projekt

 

Wir sammeln Kapital über Indiegogo, damit wir unser PRESTIGE PHONE fertigen können. Dieses bieten wir in den Varianten Gold und Silber an. Das PRESTIGE PHONE 4S basiert auf dem iPhone 4S. Der Nachfolger, das Apple iPhone 5, dient wiederum als Grundlage für unser PRESTIGE PHONE 5.

 

Damit wir die Produkte zu einem angemessenen Preis anbieten können, versuchen wir in einer Größenordnung zu fertigen, welche bessere Konditionen ermöglicht.

 

Wir als Jungunternehmer investieren so gut es geht eigenes Kapital um das Unternehmen voran zu bringen, jedoch ist uns bewusst, dass unser Ziel lediglich durch zusätzliches Fremdkapital realistisch umsetzbar ist.

 

Wir bitten Sie, uns zu unterstützen, damit wir langfristig erfolgreich handeln können und eine finanzielle Stütze für unsere Studiengänge schaffen.

 

 

 

 

Unsere Perks für Sie

 

 Wir haben uns für die folgenden Perks entschieden:

 

  1. Vielen Dank für eine kleine Spende und ihre Unterstützung.
  2. Sie erhalten für 8 € einen Designer Flaschenöffner aus Aluminium, schwarz eloxiert, mit edler PRESTIGE PHONE Lasergravur. Geeignet für jeden Schlüsselbund.
  3. Sie erhalten für 12 € zwei Designer Flaschenöffner aus Aluminium, schwarz eloxiert, mit edler PRESTIGE PHONE Lasergravur. Geeignet für jeden Schlüsselbund.
  4. Für die ersten 5 Unterstützer bieten wir das PRESTIGE PHONE 4S mit 16 GB Speicher im Silber Design zum einmaligen Preis von 689 € an. ( Sonst 749 € )
  5. Für die ersten 5 Unterstützer bieten wir das PRESTIGE PHONE 4S mit 16 GB Speicher im Gold Design zum einmaligen Preis von 799 € an. ( Sonst 919 € )
  6. Für die ersten 5 Unterstützer bieten wir das PRESTIGE PHONE 5 mit 16 GB Speicher im Silber Design zum einmaligen Preis von 939 € an. ( Sonst 999 € )
  7. Für die ersten 5 Unterstützer bieten wir das PRESTIGE PHONE 5 mit 16 GB Speicher im Gold Design zum einmaligen Preis von 969 € an. ( Sonst 1049 € )

 

 

 

FAQ

 

In welchen Speichergrößen gibt es das PRESTIGE PHONE ?

Das PRESTIGE PHONE 4S gibt es lediglich in der 16GB Variante. Allerdings ist das PRESTIGE PHONE 5 in den Speichergrößen 16GB, 32GB und 64GB erhältlich. Der Aufpreis für die 32GB Ausführung beträgt 110 € und für die 64GB Ausführung 220 €.

 

Ist der im PRESTIGE PHONE 4S Gold verarbeitete Mittelrahmen aus echtem Gold und wie verhält sich goldene Display ?

Die verarbeiteten Komponenten des Mittelrahmens sind mit 24-karätigem Gold galvanisiert. Das goldene Display ist während des Gebrauchs völlig farbneutral und beeinträchtigt in keinerlei Weise die Funktionalität.

 

Ist der im PRESTIGEPHONE 4S Silber verarbeitet Mittelrahmen aus echtem Silber ?

Der Mittelrahmen dieses Modells wurde von Hand geschliffen und aufpoliert, entspricht jedoch in seiner Ursprungsform den Materialien des Apple iPhone 4S und ist folglich aus hochwertigem Edelstahl.

 

Warum gibt es keine Bilder vom PRESTIGE PHONE 5 ?

Da sich das PRESTIGE PHONE 5 noch in einen frühen Entwicklungsstatus befindet, sind hierzu noch keine öffentlichen Bilder publiziert. In Kürze folgen erste Impressionen.

 

Warum ist ein schwarzer Punkt neben der Kamera bei dem PRESTIGE PHONE 4S in Silber zu sehen ?

Da es sich hierbei um einen Prototyp handelt, ist dieser Punkt zwecks Versuchen entstanden. Bei der Verkaufsware ist dieser Punkt selbstverständlich nicht vorhanden.

Warum ist das Display des PRESTIGE PHONE 4S Silber nicht silber ?
Auf Grund von der Opazität von Silber ist dies technisch nicht möglich.

Ist eine persönliche Gravur möglich ?

Zurzeit ist eine persönliche Gravur, wie z.B. der eigene Name noch nicht möglich. Falls es in naher Zukunft doch möglich ist und genauere Konditionen feststehen, teilen wir dies öffentlich mit.

 

Wie lauten die Allgemeine Geschäftsbedingungen ?

Unser AGB finden sie auf prestigephone.de/agb.html sowie die der Indiegogo, Inc. auf indiegogo.com/partners/terms .

 

An wen muss ich mich bei Fragen wenden?

Sie können gerne Kontakt zu uns über folgende E-Mail-Adresse aufnehmen:

info@prestigephone.de

           

 

Vielen Dank für Ihre Unterstützung

 

Wir bedanken uns für Ihre Aufmerksamkeit und Interesse an unserem Projekt.

 

Wir würden uns außerdem sehr freuen, wenn Sie unsere anderen Internetpräsenzen besuchen:

 

- Homepage:  http://prestigephone.de 

- Facebook:    http://www.facebook.com/prestigephone.de

 

 

Mit freundlichen Grüßen


Felix Neumair & Tobias Hamacher 

 

© Hamacher, Tobias Manuel & Neumair, Felix GbR  

 

 

 

 

About us

 

We - Tobias Hamacher and Felix Neumair - are the head of:

 

PRESTIGE PHONE

prestigephone.de/en

In the following, you will get a short introduction of ourselves:

Tobias Hamacher:

-18 year-old graduate

-experienced as an independent entrepreneur, especially in the area of 3D-Printing

-lives in Brühl near to Cologne

-predestined by his IT knowledge, as well his affinity for technology

 

Felix Neumair:

-18 year-old graduate in economy

-lives in Brühl near to Cologne

-possesses a fundamental knowledge in the commercial sector

 

Before Felix changed to his economy school, we used to be in the same grade. In our break times we always shared our business ideas, until we finally were totally obsessed by the idea of PRESTIGE PHONE. It is an amazing mobile phone with a significant and exclusive gold and silver design. Initial thoughts were thought out and first realistic plans were realized. After a brief time a serious company has risen under the name of PRESTIGE PHONE.
 

After we completed all formalities with full ambition, such as the entry in the VAT register, the registration of the trade and development of internal contracts, we started to research for qualified distributors and contract manufacturers that can provide the essential components in a timely manner and at the highest possible quality.
Due to persistent calls and price negotiations we could take a step forward to our dream of PRESTIGE PHONE.

Our key competencies include the ennoblement of the iPhone and its marketing under the brand name PRESTIGE PHONE.

 

 

 

 

We use exclusively high quality components and best materials in order to avoid technical complications right away. This is also one the reasons why we can ensure a high standard of quality for our PRESTIGE PHONE.

 

 

Collection

 

 

 

The occasion for our crowdfunding project

 We gather capital through Indiegogo, so that we can customize our PRESTIGE PHONE. The PRESTIGE PHONE 4S is based on the iPhone 4S. His successor - the Apple iPhone 5 - servers as the basis of our PRESTIGE PHONE 5. Each of our offered models can be ordered in a gold or silver variation.


In order to offer our product at a reasonable price, we try to produce on a bigger scale, which would enable better economic terms.

We as entrepreneurs invest our own capital as well as possible to promote our company. However, we recognized that our goal can just be realized through additional funds.

We ask you to support us so that we can take action successfully on a long-term to establish a financial backup for our study.

 

 

 

 

Our perks for you

We have chosen the following perks:

  1. Thank you so much for your support!
  2. You get a design, aluminum bottle opener, black anodized, with noble PRESTIGE PHONE laser engraving. Suitably for any key ring.
  3. You get two design, aluminum bottle opener, black anodized, with noble PRESTIGE PHONE laser engraving. Suitably for any key ring.
  4. For the first 5 supporters, we offer the PRESTIGE PHONE 4S Silver 16GB for an unique price of 689 €. (Otherwise, € 749)
  5. For the first 5 supporters, we offer the PRESTIGE PHONE 4S Gold 16GB for an onetime price of 799 €. (Otherwise, € 919)
  6. For the first 5 supporters, we offer the PRESTIGE PHONE 5 Silver 16GB for an unique price of 939 €. (Otherwise, € 999)
  7. For the first 5 supporters, we offer the PRESTIGE PHONE 5 Gold 16GB for an onetime price of 969 €. (Otherwise, € 1,049) 

 

 

 

FAQ

Which memory sizes are available for the PRESTIGE PHONE ?
The PRESTIGE PHONE 4S contains only the 16GB version. The PRESTIGE PHONE 5 is available in the memory sizes 16GB, 32GB and 64GB. The surcharge for the 32GB version is 110EUR and 220EUR for the 64GB version.

 

Is the middle frame of the PRESTIGE PHONE 4S Gold made of real gold ?
The processed components of the center frame are galvanized with 24-carat gold. During use the gold display is completely neutral in color and does not affect the functionality in any way.

 

Is the middle frame of the PRESTIGE PHONE 4S Silver made of real silver ?
The center frame of this model was sanded and polished by hand, however, it corresponds in its original form to the materials of the Apple iPhone 4S and is accordingly made of high quality stainless steel.

Why aren´t there any images of the PRESTIGE PHONE 5 ?
Due to the fact that this model is still in an early developing state, we cannot present you impressions at this time.

Why is there a black point close to the camera of the PRESTIGE PHONE 4S ?
Since this is a prototype, the point has been created for the purpose of testing. When selling goods this point is of course not available.

Why is the display of the PRESTIGE PHONE 4S not silver plated ?

Due to physical reasons of silver opacity it is not possible .

Is a personal engraving possible ?
Currently a personalized engraving, such as one's name is not possible yet. If it will be, we will let you know.

What are the Terms and Conditions ?
You will find our terms on prestigephone.de/agb.html plus the terms of Indiegogo, Inc. on indiegogo.com/partners/terms .

Whom should I contact if I have questions ?
Feel free to contact us via the following email address:
info@prestigephone.de

 

 

 

Thank you for your support

We will thank you for your attention and interest in our project.

 

We would also be very happy if you visit our other sites:

 

- Homepage: http://prestigephone.de/en

- Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/prestigephone.de

 

 

Best regards

 

Felix Neumair & Tobias Hamacher

 

© Hamacher, Tobias Manuel & Neumair, Felix GbR

Which memory sizes are available for the PRESTIGE PHONE ?The PRESTIGE PHONE 4S contains only the 16GB version. The PRESTIGE PHONE 5 is available in the memory sizes 16GB, 32GB and 64GB. The surcharge for the 32GB version is 110EUR and 220EUR for the 64GB version.
 
Is the middle frame of the PRESTIGE PHONE 4S Gold made of real gold ?The processed components of the center frame are galvanized with 24-carat gold. During use the gold display is completely neutral in color and does not affect the functionality in any way.
 
Is the middle frame of the PRESTIGE PHONE 4S Silver made of real silver ?The center frame of this model was sanded and polished by hand, however, it corresponds in its original form to the materials of the Apple iPhone 4S and is accordingly made of high quality stainless steel.
Why aren´t there any images of the PRESTIGE PHONE 5 ?Due to the fact that this model is still in an early developing state, we cannot present you impressions at this time.
Why is there a black point close to the camera of the PRESTIGE PHONE 4S ?Since this is a prototype, the point has been created for the purpose of testing. When selling goods this point is of course not available.
Why is the display of the PRESTIGE PHONE 4S not silver plated ?
Due to physical reasons of silver opacity it is not possible .
Is a personal engraving possible ?Currently a personalized engraving, such as one's name is not possible yet. If it will be, we will let you know.
What are the Terms and Conditions ?You will find our terms on prestigephone.de/agb.html plus the terms of Indiegogo, Inc. on indiegogo.com/partners/terms .
Whom should I contact if I have questions ?Feel free to contact us via the following email address:info@prestigephone.de
 
 

 

Thank you for your support

We will thank you for your attention and interest in our project.
 
We would also be very happy if you visit our other sites:
 
- Homepage: http://prestigephone.de/en
- Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/prestigephone.de
 
 
Best regards
 
Felix Neumair & Tobias Hamacher
 
© Hamacher, Tobias Manuel & Neumair, Felix GbR

story:
Hello, my name is Artem. I'm design engineer and my specialization is plastic.

Ok, let's start...

DESCRIPTION

Most of our refuse does not decompose, for example plastic.
We plan to use defective and used plastic parts for making products which will be helpful in everyday life.
Too much plastic is throw out to the city dump and we want to use this parts for reprocessing and creating something new and useful.
A lot of time and effort we're going to devote to this project and we hope for your help and support.

MATERIALS

ABS(Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene) & PS(Polystyrene) - for making products for schools, colleges and universities.
For examples: stand for books and tablets, desk organizers, pencil cases for pupils and students.
And one of the most important project is making the road signs to install them near schools and kindergartens to ensure the safety of childrens.

РС(Polycarbonate) - for making a prosthesis which will simulate the missing limb (please see below) and products which are designed for medical purposes, such as medical cases for hospitals and ambulance.

We are also developing other products that will find their application in various spheres of life.


EXAMPLES

Below you can see the most simple examples which we plan to make for educational organizations. This products are only a small part of our idea. We always develop and invent something new and implement it in life.

The stand for tablet or book:



Desk organizer:


Container for the small things:



IN THE FUTURE...

At now we are working on project of the production of polymeric limbs (with using the recycled materials). These parts are non-functioning prostheses, like only an imitation of the missing limb.
After completion of the development and manufacturing of prototypes will begin designing of universal fastening.
This project requires from us a long time to work through all the details, but we believe that we can implement it with your help.




 


SCHEDULE





DONATIONS

€1 - We'll be grateful for your support.
€15 - We will design and make one plastic part according to your desire.
€25 - We will desing and make two copies of the plastic part according to your desire.
€50 and more - We will design and make three copies of the plastic part according to your desire.
We will need a sketch or some description from you which you can send to us by email. In any case the shipping will be free.

RISKS

The only risk is the delivery time of rewards which depends of quantity of the contributors. Even we don't get enough funds we will fulfill our liabilities.

P.S. Thank you for your attention and hope for your support.

story:
My name is Liem. I am a designer, photographer, and entrepreneur. My life revolves around productivity. Before this project, my goal was to be busy around the clock each day, and I had gotten pretty good at it. However, I soon felt chronic stress creeping in and my creativity faltering. I realized that I often forgot to take time for myself. I had forgotten the importance of reflecting, reminiscing, and unwinding in a productive lifestyle.

I created Specter Oligospheres not only with the goal of alleviating stress, but for them to act as a totem of elegance and a reminder to take time to relax while still moving forward. I hope these can be an agent of change in your life as they are in mine.

Yours truly,

 Liem Nguyen

 

Specter Oligospheres were conceived for the creative, the professional, the scholar, and the aspiring. Their functionality inspires relaxation, their innovation inspires creativity, and their refinement inspires focus.

 

A Brief History Lesson:

During the Ming Dynasty (1368-1644), a blacksmith forged two iron spheres for the Emperor of China. These gifts were to be used solely by the royal family to balance Qi* (chi). Inevitably a craze erupted as China’s public learned of the newfound tools, creating today’s stress balls. In turn came nearly a thousand years of thought stimulation, increased blood circulation, improved brain function, and stress relief.

*Qi is thought to be the ‘air’ or the energy coursing inside of you. It’s the underlying bases for Chinese medicine and martial arts. Keeping it balanced is the key to living a healthy productive life.

Our goal is to revive this ancient tool with modern design and function to provide a solution to modern problems.

 

Specter Oligospheres offer an accessible escape to the chaos of everyday life. To help you tackle these challenges and increase productivity:

  • Hold the spheres, clear your mind, and begin rotating smoothly 
  • Try not to make any sounds, keeping the movement as consistent as possible 
  • Relax, reflect, unwind, reminisce, refocus, brainstorm

As you start off, focus on maintaining smooth, consistent rotations.

As you progress, try rotating the spheres without touching. This is where you truly unlock the capabilities of the Oligospheres. 

 

 

 

At Specter Co., we believe design must embody purpose. So we strayed away from the beaten path of creating mundane tools. Instead we constructed metallic art with such beauty that viewing alone instils relaxation, balance, and productivity.

 

"It’s something you have to try to understand. Before trying it I didn’t think these would do anything."

- Eric L. | UC Berkeley Design, Prototype Tester

"They're beautiful just sitting there and I love playing them on while they're sitting on their stand."

- Colin F. | Camp Counselor, Prototype Tester

"I'm constantly working or studying and getting into the habit of using these acted as my reminder to take a breather, clear my mind, and balance myself."

 - Tiffany Y. | Student, Prototype Tester

"I've been using them for two weeks now and I can confidently say I am more in tune with my body. I feel less stressed and surprisingly more productive."

 - Adrian M. | Accountant, Prototype Tester

"I love how the nature of the brass changes over time. It feels like I'm transferring my stress onto the spheres."

 - Yonnie T. | Product Manager, Prototype Tester

"I think it’s hard to understand how these work until you try them and get better at them. It's an acquired feeling that you begin to understand more and more. I like how I get progressively better at it everyday.”

 - Neal S. | Application Developer, Prototype Tester

 

We spent countless sleepless nights just pouring over the design. We set out to make something breathtaking but also functional; something with depth that could grow with the user. We combined form and function to achieve these three goals:

  • A design that could easily fit into a museum
  • Ability to benefit anyone
  • Built with exceptional quality

 

A work of art.

Design must encompass a philosophy. Specter Oligospheres represents relaxation to achieve progress. Whether the orbs are in use or on display, they act as your anchor to tranquility.

 

Sized for anyone

The size of the Oligospheres has been debated and tested in a plethora of hands. Too large diameters resulted in difficulty of use, while too small diameters had a reduced effect. We found the sweet spot at a 40mm size, making the Oligosphere ideal for everyone.

 

Impossibly Heavy

In response to an increase in typed work, carpal tunnel syndrome is on the rise. We chose to craft a weightier set of dense spheres to train hand and wrist dexterity combating carpal tunnel. 

 

Perfect combination between metal and wood

Our unique design marries metal and wood, sharp and smooth, polished and matte, symbolizing the balance needed to achieve healthy lifestyle.

The perfectly crafted wooden displays provide needed security for the spheres while showcasing the most metallic luster possible. This is the result of various trials to achieve the perfect looseness to allow a gratifying ‘wiggle’ motion as the balls move in place.

 

We spent months looking for the right company forge our brain baby into reality. We set out with the goal of finding a company that values quality and longevity as much as we do. Those who will check and check again that the product comes out as precisely as we designed and will last a lifetime. 

Today, we are ecstatic to say we've found our match. It was not only their extensive knowledge or years of experience that won us over, but their attention to detail and quality assurance system.

 

Our shared passion for perfection creates confidence that every sphere is sure to impress and weather a lifetime. To achieve this we have multiple stages of quality checks. After each sphere is shaped, it enters automated checking where a machine ensures the orb is a perfect sphere (no nicks, dents, or warps). If so, it is sent on to polishing where it is hand polished and buffed. Finally, the Oligospheres are sent to a quality assurance team for careful human inspection before hand packaging.

 

 

As you experience life, your Oligospheres grow with you. This may seem strange as every SPECTER Oligosphere is made the same. However, as soon as the Oligosphere is removed from its packaging, it becomes one of a kind. Each sphere encapsulates some of the stresses it aids users in releasing, making every sphere unique to its owner. As you rotate the spheres, you will imprint your own marks upon them, making your Oligospheres unique to you and they progress that you've made.

Each set of brass spheres will slowly attain a unique tarnish over time. To wipe and reset the tarnish use a vinegar bath to restore your Oligospheres to a polished shine.

 

 

 

We've spent countless days testing and refining the Oligospheres. Our partners in manufacturing are lined up and ready for production and our team is eager to quality check and ship each and every sphere. Your support is essential to fund the first production run and ship our Specter Oligospheres from our office onto your desk! The funding will assist with the cost of tooling, manufacturing, distribution, and cover investments for this project and future ones as well.

In order to bring Specter Oligospheres to life, we need your support. By not only backing our project, but also sharing it with your friends and family, you will ensure our success. We truly believe that Oligospheres have the capability to benefit the lives of anyone who is willing to give them a shot. Something as simple as tweeting about our page or sharing our Facebook page will go a long way to the success of Oligospheres.  

 

 

Thank you so much for your support,

Liem Nguyen, Founder

Yen Nguyen, Marketing and Business Development

& The Specter Team

 

Risks and Challenges:

If our project gets funded, we will make sure everything goes according to plan in order to meet the promised deadlines. Our team combines over 15 years in design, manufacturing, and fulfillment and we are eager to ensure outstanding quality and transparency throughout our entire campaign. Projects often have trouble with meeting deadlines for shipment. We have post campaign surveys set up, our shipping stations ready, and are eager to ensure that all of your packages arrive on time.

Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there is always a risk of unpreventable issues that may present themselves during the process of manufacturing. Should any problems arise, we promise to keep you updated and informed before, during and after production; anything we hear, you hear. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and ahead of schedule.

story:
Summary

Last year I set out to learn about neural networks. It was way harder than it needed to be! Everything I needed to know was scattered between random pdf documents, blog posts and academic papers on arXiv. There were other tutorials and MOOCs - but they were very theoretical, whilst I just wanted to get started and code.

So now I want to create what I wish I'd had - a neural networks MOOC aimed at hackers. After completing the course, you should be broadly familiar with ways neural networks are used, be able to understand the academic literature, be able to set up a deep learning rig, and of course, hack on your own projects.

  • My background: software engineer, Maths & CS degree from Cambridge, formerly worked at Oculus, a16z.
  • Spent 1 year reading about ML to broaden my horizons
  • Now want to create the class I wish I'd had.

The prerequisites to the class will be - calculus and basic ability to code.

What We Need & What You Get

This is course on deep learning for people who want to dive straight in! Without dwelling too much on theory, this course provides everything you need to start building stuff using neural nets.

Includes:

  • what software packages and frameworks to use
  • training models using GPUs, setting up a cluster in the cloud
  • a broad overview of algorithms used in neural networks - in plain English
  • understanding the vocabulary used in deep learning academic papers
  • how to keep up with the deep learning literature
  • interesting project ideas so you can start building right away

The specific topics covered are:

  • Backpropagation 
  • Clustering
  • Convnets 
  • Variational autoencoders 
  • Natural Language Processing 
  • Hacks and optimizations 
  • Reinforcement learning 

The premium version of the course includes

  • A dedicated Slack chatroom where you can ask any questions you may have
  • A personalized reading list of ML papers relevant to your particular field (for example, game development)

You can check out a sample post here.

NEW: Check out a sample screencast here.

Risks & Challenges

Most of the course has already been written. The funds will be spent on living expenses whilst I improve the design, edit the content for readability, & add more diagrams, audio recordings and screencasts.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute right now, but still want the course to get made:

  • Get the word out to every software engineer you know!
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
THE MOODTEK STORY

Hello Indiegogo! We are Moodtek, and we are a married couple with two handsome little boys.

Here is some background: She studied photography, Anthropology and is certified in Clinical Hypnotherapy. He studied photography and computer science! We love art and so do our children. Our company goal has always been, quite simply, to provide products that can help change one's mood! We believe that the changing of moods can start the process of changing one's thinking and thus, changing their life!


To that end, we created a card game called MEMEOLOGY! It is an "idea-matching" game based around internet memes. It was released to minimal fanfare. We soon decided that for our brand to take off we needed to expand our horizons.

Our vision was to have a store (placed near the local university) where we could both work as graphic artists, allowing both of us to be able to quit our taxing day jobs and be with our children full-time! The store would offer eccentric mood-changing products like funky lights, incence, craftsman games, and apparel. We also had plans to rent rack space to local artists so they could get more eyes on their work. In addition to that, we wished to offer 3D printing services at extremely competitive rates for our fellow art/engineering/fashion/architecture students at our local colleges.

The idea was refined, refined and refined again until, finally, in 2013, we opened a "mom and pop" brick-and-mortar shop in sunny Riverside, California that offers our customers totally custom T-shirts and accessories, (quickly!) to our community! We offer the absolute lowest prices for custom T-shirts in the area. We cannot be beat!


  • We have NO order minimum (buy one or 100!)!
  • We have NO "setup" or "art" fees!
  • We can do ANY design! (expert graphic designers in-house)!
  • 24 hour turn-around time! Totally unheard of in the custom T-shirt business!
  • We do NOT charge for plus-sized shirts (up to 6XL)!
  • You can even order ONLINE via our website at www.moodtek.com!

    We fill a need in our community for those looking to get shirts and other types of apparel done NOW and CHEAP! We have been very successful at this goal, we simply can't be beat with our low prices (lowest around)! 

    • Orders of 1-10 shirts: $10 (shirt and labor is INCLUDED)! Full color!
    • Orders of 11+: $8 per shirt
    • Orders of 51+: $7 per shirt
    • Alternate shirt styles/colors ordered with next-day shipping so you can get your apparel finished by your deadline!
    • All work is custom tailored to what the customer requests, no clip art here!
    • WE SHIP ANYWHERE! Create something as a gift and send it to your distant cousin in New York!

    We realize that we are in an economy that is essentially in shambles and we strive to offer the best deals around. People simply do not have the cash! We feel you! All of our products are reasonably priced and tailor-made for whoever you may be (artist, construction worker, soccer mom, etc)! If our campaign is successful, we can provide an even larger value to our community in Riverside and to our customers world-wide!

    THE RIGHT TOOLS FOR THE JOB! WE WILL NEED THESE ITEMS!

    DIRECT-to-GARMENT PRINTER and PRE-TREATMENT UNIT

     

    EASY T XL $7995 + VIPER One $3895

    • This industrial printing unit will transform our operation two-fold. It will enable us to use approximately half as much ink as we currently burn, as well as completely remove our dependance on ink-transfer sheets and vinyl (we do not use screen printing methods). This also has the added benefit of reducing our landfill footprint by about 90% as we will be going paper-less! These savings will be immediately transferred to the customers in our community! The turn-around times for products will be drastically reduced. We already promise 24 hour turn around for small custom work, but with this machine, we will be able to finish orders same day!

    ADDITIONAL PLATENS (swappable frames for hats, sleeves, infant/youth/oversized clothing) $3000

    3D PRINTER - Cubify CubeX Trio $3999

    • This will enable us to fufill one of our original business plans which was to offer the capability for designers (board/dice game developers/artists/engineers, etc) to get their custom work printed and sent to them - anywhere in the USA and the world! Moodtek is only concerned with providing the absolute best value in hopes that customers come back as well as refer family and friends! Help us bring the wave of the future to our hometown - Riverside, CA! As of now, there are currently no stores in the city providing 3D printing technology for consumers. Moodtek wishes to be the first!

    The savings will be immediately passed on to EVERY SINGLE customer that passes through our doors or shops via our online shop!

    THE PERKS!

    SUCCESS MEANS GREAT DEALS!

    We want to push the envelope as far as we can to provide the best quality, the best prices, and the best service! Our gains become the consumer's gains!

    If we can manage to hit our campaign goals, any extra funds will eventually go to:

    • Buying more advertising in print media and online (google ads, facebook credits, newpaper advertising, radio spots).
    • Hiring graphic artists to meet growing demands of the business. Its just us two at the moment! We want to be job creators!
    • Buying more 3D and Direct-to-Garment printers to meet increased demand.
    • Expand our business to provide PRINT-on-DEMAND support (custom card games, board games, dice games, etc).
story_txt:
THE MOODTEK STORY

Hello Indiegogo! We are Moodtek, and we are a married couple with two handsome little boys.
Here is some background: She studied photography, Anthropology and is certified in Clinical Hypnotherapy. He studied photography and computer science! We love art and so do our children. Our company goal has always been, quite simply, to provide products that can help change one's mood! We believe that the changing of moods can start the process of changing one's thinking and thus, changing their life!


To that end, we created a card game called MEMEOLOGY! It is an "idea-matching" game based around internet memes. It was released to minimal fanfare. We soon decided that for our brand to take off we needed to expand our horizons.
Our vision was to have a store (placed near the local university) where we could both work as graphic artists, allowing both of us to be able to quit our taxing day jobs and be with our children full-time! The store would offer eccentric mood-changing products like funky lights, incence, craftsman games, and apparel. We also had plans to rent rack space to local artists so they could get more eyes on their work. In addition to that, we wished to offer 3D printing services at extremely competitive rates for our fellow art/engineering/fashion/architecture students at our local colleges.

The idea was refined, refined and refined again until, finally, in 2013, we opened a "mom and pop" brick-and-mortar shop in sunny Riverside, California that offers our customers totally custom T-shirts and accessories, (quickly!) to our community! We offer the absolute lowest prices for custom T-shirts in the area. We cannot be beat!





We have NO order minimum (buy one or 100!)!
We have NO "setup" or "art" fees!
We can do ANY design! (expert graphic designers in-house)!

24 hour turn-around time! Totally unheard of in the custom T-shirt business!
We do NOT charge for plus-sized shirts (up to 6XL)!
You can even order ONLINE via our website at www.moodtek.com!



We fill a need in our community for those looking to get shirts and other types of apparel done NOW and CHEAP! We have been very successful at this goal, we simply can't be beat with our low prices (lowest around)! 

Orders of 1-10 shirts: $10 (shirt and labor is INCLUDED)! Full color!
Orders of 11+: $8 per shirt
Orders of 51+: $7 per shirt
Alternate shirt styles/colors ordered with next-day shipping so you can get your apparel finished by your deadline!
All work is custom tailored to what the customer requests, no clip art here!

WE SHIP ANYWHERE! Create something as a gift and send it to your distant cousin in New York!

We realize that we are in an economy that is essentially in shambles and we strive to offer the best deals around. People simply do not have the cash! We feel you! All of our products are reasonably priced and tailor-made for whoever you may be (artist, construction worker, soccer mom, etc)! If our campaign is successful, we can provide an even larger value to our community in Riverside and to our customers world-wide!




THE RIGHT TOOLS FOR THE JOB! WE WILL NEED THESE ITEMS!
DIRECT-to-GARMENT PRINTER and PRE-TREATMENT UNIT
 
EASY T XL $7995 + VIPER One $3895

This industrial printing unit will transform our operation two-fold. It will enable us to use approximately half as much ink as we currently burn, as well as completely remove our dependance on ink-transfer sheets and vinyl (we do not use screen printing methods). This also has the added benefit of reducing our landfill footprint by about 90% as we will be going paper-less! These savings will be immediately transferred to the customers in our community! The turn-around times for products will be drastically reduced. We already promise 24 hour turn around for small custom work, but with this machine, we will be able to finish orders same day!

ADDITIONAL PLATENS (swappable frames for hats, sleeves, infant/youth/oversized clothing) $3000

3D PRINTER - Cubify CubeX Trio $3999

This will enable us to fufill one of our original business plans which was to offer the capability for designers (board/dice game developers/artists/engineers, etc) to get their custom work printed and sent to them - anywhere in the USA and the world! Moodtek is only concerned with providing the absolute best value in hopes that customers come back as well as refer family and friends! Help us bring the wave of the future to our hometown - Riverside, CA! As of now, there are currently no stores in the city providing 3D printing technology for consumers. Moodtek wishes to be the first!

The savings will be immediately passed on to EVERY SINGLE customer that passes through our doors or shops via our online shop!

THE PERKS!
SUCCESS MEANS GREAT DEALS!







We want to push the envelope as far as we can to provide the best quality, the best prices, and the best service! Our gains become the consumer's gains!
If we can manage to hit our campaign goals, any extra funds will eventually go to:

Buying more advertising in print media and online (google ads, facebook credits, newpaper advertising, radio spots).
Hiring graphic artists to meet growing demands of the business. Its just us two at the moment! We want to be job creators!

Buying more 3D and Direct-to-Garment printers to meet increased demand.

Expand our business to provide PRINT-on-DEMAND support (custom card games, board games, dice games, etc).

story:
New milestones!


12K - Base module released instantly as AGPLv3.

17K - Backend module released instantly as AGPLv3.

25K - Website + Backend + Base modules released instantly as AGPLv3.

27.5K - Technical and functional documentation.

Summary

  Compatibility rules - Prevent configuration errors with custom rules.

  Custom values - Numerical, Text, Attachment, Color etc.

  Backend & Frontend - Configure products in both interfaces.

  Generate BOM's - Automatically generated Bill of Materials

  Visual - Images are shifted as configuration progresses

  Configuration Steps - Break all your options into as many steps as you want

  Compute prices - On the fly as you configure, the prices of the parts are added

  Extensible - Designed from the ground up for you to extend any feature

  Production ready - Ready for production and in production

 

Read more info about licensing and perks in FAQ

What do you get?

 

Base

Base module on which you can build your own configurator. It serves as a dependency for both frontend and backend configurator.

It's the foundation that ties everything together making sure all operations are done in only one place. This prevents redundancy and error for any configurator interface based on it.

 

Backend Product Configurator

 

 

Generate products straight from your backend document. On your sales order, manufacturing order or any document for that matter. 

Using an Odoo native dynamic wizard you are guided through the configuration process. And the entire structure is generated on the fly based on the properties you set on the product template (Attributes, Images, Configuration Rules, Steps etc).

 

Website / E-commerce Product Configurator

 

 

The website configurator is fully integrated with the e-commerce module. Your customers can configure and visualize your product.

Best of all they will see it develop before their eyes and have the price displayed for each change they make. And at the end, you get a error-free product that is generated for you with all related data.

No time lost or frustration to you users. All you have to do is confirm the order.

 

*Check out our videos displayed above for more details.*

 

Anything else?

How about time and money?

  • Every second you spend checking a customer configuration you lose time and money.
  • Every second you spend creating a product, bill of materials or adding prices you loose time and money.
  • Every mistake made by you or your customer during configuration or generation of products your lose time and money.
  • A long and complex ordering process can drive your customers away and can increase the number of your returns.

What about a solution that solves all of this for you at the speed of a click. How much is that worth to you?

 

Roadmap

  • MRP Enhancements
    •  Support more complex bom structures for advanced manufacturing.
  • Support Wizard
    1. Assistance wizard to help the user configure and navigate faster.
  • Themes & Building Blocks
    1. It's already easy to change the layout but with building blocks and themes it will be effortless.
  • WebGL Configurator
    1. The best possible user experience in product customization can be achieved only through a strong visual approach such as this one. And we would love to bring it to Odoo.
 

 

Why us and why Odoo?

 

Odoo is the leader in opensource ERP systems. And our main focus is to find solutions where the standard is not enough.

For example in Austria only 3 companies have been granted the license to handle waste in the entire Austrian territory in 2015. 

One of them is our customer. And they are using Odoo.

Developed in collaboration with the Austrian partner WT-IO-IT our Waste Management System is producing and handling more than 13.000 incoming invoices for controlling and more than 3.500 outgoing invoices each year. The results speak for themselves.

 

 

Our partnership with OCA on this project is crucial for the opensource objective. OCA is by far the largest organization in the Odoo ecosystem with over 540 contributors. Dedicated to promoting widespread usage of Odoo and development.

If the campaign reaches the target the repositories will be hosted and maintained by OCA.

OCA Board:

`We most definitely support this great initiative! And we are convinced of the quality of this work. We are 100% committed to it and would be glad to see it under the OCA umbrella! Let's make it happen !`

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Q: When will it be released?

A1: If any perk is achieved the respective module will be released instantly. Including the full package perk.

A2: If the campaign does not reach the budget or milestone and you got the Base perk or higher you will get the module from the perk instantly after signing the license agreement.

Q: What if I got a perk lower than the 'Base' and the campaign does not reach the budget or a milestone?

A: If not even the first milestone is reached you will get double the amount you donated in discount from the retail price after the campaign ends or a full refund before the campaign ends. 

If any milestone is reached your contribution is considered as a important part for reaching the milestone and you will get the respective module as AGPLv3.

Q: What license will it have?

A1: Any milestone will release the respective modules as AGPLv3.

A2: If the campaign does not reach the first milestone the license will be closed source for backers with 'Base' Perk and above.

Q: What Odoo version does it support?

A: V8, V9 and soon V10.

Q: Does it work with Odoo Enterprise?

A: Yes

Any other questions?

Reach us at contact@pledra.com or by visiting our website http://www.pledra.com

Spread the word!

Do us all a favor and share this news on your social media channels. You can use the button on the top of the campaign.

 

Thank you for your support!

story:
ORBIT is the rotating retractable pen, as usual, with the minimal styles that TRONNOVATE pursues, but still compatible with multiple popular refills. 

We do care about the feel and experience when you hold our ORBIT during writing, so this time, we still develop a particular mechanism to provide ORBIT with perfect  balance in weight and length. We believe you can have the best writing experience with our ORBIT since we do so! 

Just like our TAKUMI series, ORBIT is compatible with over 60 different kinds of popular refills in the market. For more details, please see the full list of compatible refills further down the page. We will continue to update the list throughout the project.

ORBIT is with minimal design but it is just not that "simple".We spent a lot of time to discover the best weight balance and proportion to provide the best using experience to you.  Moreover, Rotating engraved part and mechanical design of refill compatibility are devoted to give you the maximum pleasure when using our ORBIT!

Color options are Meteor Black, Space Grey, and Galaxy Silver with special anodized surface treatment and the finest details.

ORBIT is able to show various of pen styles based on the use of refills. Peculiar press part design not only provides higher identity to ORBIT, but also enhance the usability.

We have do a complete research and sort out 3 groups of lengths of popular refills(98.4mm、112mm、118mm) to let you change the refill what you like promptly.

Each part is assembled precisely to present perfect function for ORBIT. The internal tube plays the key role to cope with different kind of refills and let you adjust to the perfect position without hesitation!

ORBIT was designed for thinkers and creators, recording your ideas anytime just by rotating the end to let the refill come out. ORBIT is perfect for thinkers & creators since it works well with your notebook for sketches and notes.

OBIT also fits perfectly with your suit. Imagine you would become the eye-spot when taking out of ORBIT to sign and write. Are you ready to get one? 

 See how you can change different refills in just 30 seconds!

ORBIT is perfect for thinkers & creators since it works well with your notebook for sketches and notes.OBIT also fits perfectly with your suit. Imagine you would become the eye-spot when taking out of ORBIT to sign and write. Are you ready to get one?  See how you can change different refills in just 30 seconds!
ORBIT provides 2 models with different lengths to meet your personal needs. 
ORBIT Alpha provides the maximum capacity to compatible with most of popular refills for you to try with your favorite refills and still give you superb writing felling.


ORBIT Beta fits perfectly with famous hi-end refills such as Mont Blanc, Parker, Lamy..etc and is portable to insert into your pocket to let you write anytime and any where when you got to note down ideas immediately.


Note 1: We will keep updating this list as we check refill compatibility.
Note 2: The names in the above list might change by pen refill company. We can't list every possible name change, so please use the info above to cross-reference.
We will keep updating the refill information. If you found your favorite refill is not in our refill list, please don't hesitate to let us know. We will check it and reply as soon as possible.




TRONNOVATE DESIGN LABORATORY INC. is found in 2014, working on design- and idea-creation. Our team are based in Tainan, Taiwan, in the lovely city treat us, move and inspire us. Every product is made through our eyes, hearts and behaviors. TRONNOVATE devotes to add more design into our environment by those simplest ways, and let our life more cheerful and nature. Design for the better life!For more information, please check the following link:




Thanks everyone!
Sincerely,
TRONNOVATE Design team

story:
We need your help!

For the past several months the PerSociety (P.S.) team has been working on a mobile app that will help manage business cards you receive and how you store them in the future.

To make our app most user friendly, we need to finish off an OCR (optical character reader) component allowing you to take a picture of any business card and immediately scan the info to be merged into your P.S. phone book. The OCR will be implemented on our Android, and iOS apps. We intend to have the OCR project completed by early December.

Boring...or so you might think...

Most people probably think that business cards are a thing of the past...you got Facebook, Linkedin, outlook, etc...who uses business cards these days?

Think again...business cards are the easiest way for us to remember those we meet at various places. Even meeting someone at a bar or even a coffee shop, jotting a name and number on a piece of paper beats entering a name and number in your contact phonebook without seeing where it came from or who that name or number is.

In addition to looking someone up on Facebook and Linkedin, having a business card to touch, hold and see helps us remember a person. Put a face to name, put a name to a number, put a card to the face, name and number. And that's what P.S. is all about.

Our Solution

The Persociety cloud will let you create a contact profile, allow you to tag each contact with a business card and any other piece of info forever. Our solution is cloud based so you can access it from anywhere, anytime. One person commented our beta mobile app an electronic rolodex. Ours is more beautiful than that.

The Beauty

We do more than simply saving business card images; when the business card is uploaded to our server, you have the option to invite your contact to join "insociety" and link their real time profile to yours. The beauty of "insociety" is that once your contacts become part of your network you could request anyone to update their info at any times. You'll no longer have old business cards in your "virtual desk"

Our Story

Persociety is a startup with no outside funding other than the hard work and savings of our five co-founders, who all recognized a need to address a common problem with business cards.

Pile of Business Cards

But before we were able to do that, P.S. first defined, in no uncertain terms, the intrinsic value of business cards.

We keep business cards because that's how we network in the real world. The first thing we dig into when we suddenly say to ourselves, "hey I need a lawyer, I need to call an accountant, or I need to find a mechanic" is our pile of business cards...If you can even find them.

Some of these business cards get old and outdated, but we don't know when unless we keep in contact or update our pile. That's the reason we thought of our solutionm and P.S. was born.

 

The P.S. Team

Our P.S. group of five was put together because we had the exact same problem with managing our contacts, even as we come from completely different backgrounds.

1 entrepreneur, 1 lawyer, 1 numbers guy, 1 techie, and 1 realtor.

We are all one professional Per Society.

Meet us

Ruell Medina - 1 Entrepreneur

Ruell has many hats in the various companies that he owns and operates. A Bay Area native, he is involved in various industries from gaming, to banking, telecom, financial services, travel, you name it. He thus needs to use the P.S. app to store literally hundreds of cards. 500 people may seem a lot to remember, but when he sees each card, he swears he can remember who that person is.

 

Billy Chan - 1 Lawyer

Billy is the legal guru. Also partner of a successful restaurant Social Kitchen and Brewery in San Francisco by night. So between the clients, and the people he meets and greets, he needs to use P.S. to store his business cards electronically so he can quickly pull it up and reference a contact right away.

 

Abhi Agrawal - 1 numbers guy CPA

Abhi got his chartered accountancy license in India and said that wasn't enough. So he moved to the US and got his CPA. He loves the numbers world so many clients,  he needs his business card repository right by him at all times.
 
 

Bahurudeen Mohamed - 1 Techie

Bahu worked for one of the earliest startups in India as early as 1998. The company was developing ecommerce website even before Amazon was a big thing. He since moved from India to the US and helped two startups get off the ground successfully. He's met so many friends at tech shows and conventions. He said something needs to be done electronically to swipe his card. Bahu invented the swipe function of our business cards on our P.S. app.
 
 
Gwen Chua - 1 Real Estate Guru
 
Gwen sells homes for his clients in San Mateo County. From his buyers to sellers, his clients are his contacts.  He would love for all of them  to use P.S. so they can store his business contact as a reference  anytime they need anything Real Estate related and to share his wealth  of Real Estate related contacts.  Looking for a reliable plumber, a  contractor or maybe a housekeeper?!

Check out our website, http://www.persociety.com 

Check out our giveaways on the gallery.

 

Kindle Fire Case/ with P.S. Mobile Preloaded

 

 

Persociety Ipod Touch Preloaded with Persociety Mobile App
