story:
3dprint            geeky-gadgets         fabbaloo

3druck           blog.atmel                    hwlibre


With 18 days to go, it's time for our biggest announcement yet!

Thanks to the support of companies interested in the project we have opened negotiations with the major components suppliers, allowing us to bring the cost of the Alligator to 120 €! 
As a result of These Negotiations, we can now offer the same electronics at a lower price, while continuing to produce in Italy and to provide assistance and support.

We hope by reducing the price, we will give more people the opportunity to learn about the potential offered by our board.

Obviously those who already pledged more than 120 € for the Alligator will be contacted as soon as possible to get a refund of the difference.

Share this news, spread the word, and help make it happen for Alligator!


Print safely for hours without interruptions! Alligator Board is equipped with Power Supply filters, analog stabilization and protections. High quality, high resolution and high speed.

Alligator is an easy-to-use open source motherboard, ideal for all types of 3D printer. The additional specification lines make it sturdier and safer compared to the other boards, apart from increasing its resolution. Besides this, it’s no small matter that Alligator is able to interface effortless with most of the existing hardware.
It’s already a big step forward, but it doesn’t end here: making use of Alberto Cotronei (MagoKimbra) collaboration, we’re bringing all firmwares from 8 bit platforms to 32 ones, permitting a far greater computational power. 
Marlin porting will be available in a few days.
We want to give makers and professionals the opportunity to use boards capable of printing high mesh objects and perform heavier counts, paying attention to Jerks and other aspects that up to now was not possible to consider.
Alligator can run :
  • printers
  • Laser cutters
  • CNC mills
  • Pick and Place and other small or Mid-size CNC machines
Our ambition is to advance the entire community trough an open source motherboard, powerful and innovative. We hope that Alligator can be as useful to as many people and projects as possible.

The Alligator Board is designed to be a complete and reliable solution as RepRap 3D printer electronic control board. The base module features everything you need to build a standard 3D printer, and with the expansion Piggy this is the most complete solution for complex 3D printer.

It is based on the 32 bit Cortex M3 ATSAM3X8EA-AU microcontroller (Arduino Due CPU). This represents a big step towards greater computing power, compared to the existing solution based on 8 bit mcu. This product is well suited for any kind of 3D printer and is the ideal solution for Delta models, requiring more complex computation.

Alligator is the first 3D printer motherboard supporting direct connection to Linux embedded world.

3D printers need a PC and an operating system to process models and generate GCODE printing files. Alligator Board with the expansion port for Raspberry-Pi becomes a whole with Linux.

By simply connecting Raspberry-PI to Alligator you'll discover countless features, such as WIFI, bluetooth, full tablet control, slicer on board, and much more!

With Raspberry-Pi you can install a web interface to control your printer  remotely and you can do slicing and control everything by using your browser, including printing.


      




Alligator Board Repetier Firmware on Github
Alligator Board Design Files on Github
Download Alligator Board User Manual
Download Alligator Board Wiring Scheme





The ability to adjust the current of the motors via firmware allows the three axes to work in perfect harmony between them. The adjustable microstep size up to 1/32 and performance of the 32-bit ARM processor ensure high print resolution with any architecture.                      

 
The idea of developing a board, born at MakerFaire Rome 2013 edition, proposing a solution to all the most common printing problems related to electronics.
Then we founded the 3D Artists team and we started the development of the project, designing the Alligator Board.
The team has taken advantage of expertise and experience in the electronic and mechanical design by developing a complete and innovative solution, suitable for makers and professionals.
After one year of research and development we have presented the Alligator Board at the Maker Faire Rome 2014.



Alligator Board is designed, assembled and tested in Italy.

All the various production stages of Alligator Board are subjected to an accurate analysis, starting from the selection of the best components to the X-ray inspection:

  • PCB manufacturing & Electrical Test
  • Automatic solder paste dispencer
  • Automatic component SMT mount
  • Reflow Oven
  • AOI , automatic optical inspection
  • X-Ray inspection
  • Washing
  • Final Validation Test
  • Manual inspection
  • Packaging and shipping


Be part of our community, make a €10 pledge and adopt Mr Ally, an awesome 3D printed logo!

Be part of Alligator Community! Show your support with a cool limited Alligator T-Shirt!

Shipping rate table
Italy: 8€
Europe : 17€
America: 20€
Contact us for shipping to other countries.

The principle risk of not being able to deliver on our promise is small considering that we have already produced a prototype and this is working great. 

In terms of shipping, the boards will be assembled immediately after the end of the Indiegogo project, so everyone will have their rewards shipped out before the end of April 2015.

However, issues within the manufacturing process do occasionally happen that are unexpected; this would delay our delivery. In such an event, will be our priority to solve the inconvenience.

Whatever happens along our production timeline, you can rest assured that we will keep you updated on our progress. We do not take pledges lightly, as each pledge will come from people who believe in this project and our ability to execute.



  • Cover the costs of Alligator Board project development.

  • Maintain the entire process flow in Italy, from design to production.

  • Develop and launch into the market innovative and powerful products and accessories for 3D printers.

  • Be able to order a good amount of components to keep the price down.

  • Raise the funds to proceed with future production runs. 

What Firmware does Alligator support?

Currently is available Repetier Firmware, but in a few days we'll also have MarlinKimbra porting.

Lately are emerging many dedicated 32 bit high-performance firmwares and with Alligator you'll stay up to date.

How can I program the board?

There are two possibilities:

- Arduino IDE, with which you'll have no need of buying expensive programs or studying  difficult development environments. You only have to connect the Alligator's USB port to the PC.

- J-tag interface for the more experienced


What is the advantage of using this processor than ATmega2560?

With SAM3X8E you can print your pieces faster and at higher resolution.

For example if you decide to print a complex piece (as a woman's bust can be) with a standard 8 bit board, it can easily happen that the micro is not able to reckon on time and the printer moves jerkily. With Alligator this doesn't happen due to the increased computational power. 

Besides this, it's no small matter that because of the board's speed the printer moves in a much more harmonious manner, and we can realize this even from the noise of the engines.

What's more with the computational power and the bigger space you can put more performing firmwares that will make the print always better.

What is the advantage of not having to handle an operating system?
Not having to handle a complex operating system is an advantage for all real time operations. For example a cortex timer will be much more efficient.
Alligator is much faster, and at the same time thanks to the expansion port for Raspberry you will enjoy all the additional features that an operating system can have. So Wify, USB, Ethernet will be available without overloading the printer control. In addition to this, the firmware that can be loaded on Alligator were written for years and can therefore provide much more stability than an operating system.

Will Alligator be able to control a delta style printer and handle the segments calculations at higher levels? 

Alligator is perfect for Delta printers.The tests carried out in laboratory have shown an excellent performance even in the presence of many segments/second.

Network interface and Raspberry-Pi. How can I use them?

The network interface on board provides the opportunity to integrate a web server to monitor and control the printer and manage files Gcode.

With Raspberry-Pi you can install Repetier server or any other web interface and you can do slicing and control everything by using your browser, including printing.


Why do I want a Direct RaspberryPi connection, when I've got a

microcontroller on board, and the Pi can use the USB port?


The microcontroller on Alligator is not able to perform the slicer and generate a

gcode, RaspberryPi instead can do it!

A direct connection is much more convenient, the communication takes place via

direct serial without going through any USB/Serial converter. Much more stable!

Also some gpio are shared between Raspberry and Alligator and this allows you to

add many features such as an interrupt to launch routine on Alligator, this without

going through UART or USB ports.


How do I control the board when it is not connected to the PC? Has the SD slot been planned?

Alligator is equipped with an on board Micro SD card reader. You only have to to store the file to be printed (GCODE) in the memory card and launch the printing by using display or USB port.

Very soon it will be possible to start the printing via LAN with the Ethernet port.

Alligator has an expansion port that can be directly connected to the Raspberry-Pi. You'll have the opportunity of entering a Linux system in your machine! Everything will be easier and you may have features such as Slicer Gcode on board, full control of the machine via wifi, ethernet, bluetooth, printing notifications via email, webcam streaming.. a guaranteed fun!

What kind of display can be connected to Alligator Board?

You can connect the classic "full graphics display 128x64" with encoder and buzzer RepRap style.

Furthermore the display can be connected at both 3.3V and 5V:

- Alphanumeric

- SPI

- Serial (uart)

Sometimes you may need to add a small connector to arrange the order of the signals.

We're also developing a color display with touch interface. You'll very soon be able to control your machine with a touch of finger!

Can you connect servo motors, led or other?

Yes, you can connect servo, led, rgb led, relè and more. Clearly the pins available are modest.

"No Stop Print Filter" . How exactly does it ensure I don't need a UPS to keep my print from being interrupted? 

It's a given that a small power cut is often enough to block a print of many hours.

Example: You're making a 24 hours print. After 20 hours because of a disturbance due to a refrigerator, a washing machine, a neon or other, your printer stops, making you throw away time and money. We experienced this problem many times with the traditional boards , so we put on Alligator alimentation filter, USB filter and uncoupled GND signal which prevent these phenomena.

Alligator board being properly filtered and protected is immune to this type of problems. Your prints will be safe for many hours!

What does "20A no blowing connector" mean?

Let's say you're printing and a connector melts: besides the safety risk, you are forced to stop 3/4 days to order the piece, receive it and replace it. Here too, you threw a print, lost time and still had to buy other pieces.

"Precise Filtering" on temperature reading. How is it more precise?

Analog inputs are related to analog ground loops, these solutions are usually

implemented in quality boards.

The temperature inputs are actively filtered (not with a single capacitor as in other

boards). Thanks to this the readings are much more stable than traditional boards.

What do you mean with "Complex Filter"? And why should it be better than a

"Simple Filter"?

End­stop filters are extremely important: in Delta machines for proper calibration

it's essential that all trucks go home without false reading. Thus we have

introduced a specific active comparator that is an electronic solution by far more

stable compered to other boards that use only a simple capacitor as filtering.


"Protection from gnd loops" . What does it mean?

Many users complain of ground loops in their printers. With Alligator we have

minimized the problem by decoupling all round planes. We also added filters, both

common mode and differential mode to minimize every type of disturbance, and to

limit the effects of the loop due to the wiring.


What is the use of the driver soldered to the board? I've already burned a dozen drivers..

The driver on board allows an optimization of the circuitry that makes overheating a distant memory.

The drivers burn because if mounted on external boards can not dissipate heat and signals through connectors can get incorrect.

The traditional drivers are therefore significantly less stable over time both as current and as temperatures. 

I contributed to a perk but I forgot to add shipping. What should I do?

If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make an additional contribution. This counts as the shipping cost.

There was an error with my contribution. What happened?

Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: common contribution errors
story_txt:
3dprint            geeky-gadgets         fabbaloo3druck           blog.atmel                    hwlibreWith 18 days to go, it's time for our biggest announcement yet!Thanks to the support of companies interested in the project we have opened negotiations with the major components suppliers, allowing us to bring the cost of the Alligator to 120 €! As a result of These Negotiations, we can now offer the same electronics at a lower price, while continuing to produce in Italy and to provide assistance and support.We hope by reducing the price, we will give more people the opportunity to learn about the potential offered by our board.Obviously those who already pledged more than 120 € for the Alligator will be contacted as soon as possible to get a refund of the difference.Share this news, spread the word, and help make it happen for Alligator!Print safely for hours without interruptions! Alligator Board is equipped with Power Supply filters, analog stabilization and protections. High quality, high resolution and high speed.Alligator is an easy-to-use open source motherboard, ideal for all types of 3D printer. The additional specification lines make it sturdier and safer compared to the other boards, apart from increasing its resolution. Besides this, it’s no small matter that Alligator is able to interface effortless with most of the existing hardware.
It’s already a big step forward, but it doesn’t end here: making use of Alberto Cotronei (MagoKimbra) collaboration, we’re bringing all firmwares from 8 bit platforms to 32 ones, permitting a far greater computational power. 
Marlin porting will be available in a few days.We want to give makers and professionals the opportunity to use boards capable of printing high mesh objects and perform heavier counts, paying attention to Jerks and other aspects that up to now was not possible to consider.Alligator can run :
printers
Laser cutters
CNC mills
Pick and Place and other small or Mid-size CNC machines
Our ambition is to advance the entire community trough an open source motherboard, powerful and innovative. We hope that Alligator can be as useful to as many people and projects as possible.The Alligator Board is designed to be a complete and reliable solution as RepRap 3D printer electronic control board. The base module features everything you need to build a standard 3D printer, and with the expansion Piggy this is the most complete solution for complex 3D printer.








It is based on the 32 bit Cortex M3 ATSAM3X8EA-AU microcontroller (Arduino Due CPU). This represents a big step towards greater computing power, compared to the existing solution based on 8 bit mcu. This product is well suited for any kind of 3D printer and is the ideal solution for Delta models, requiring more complex computation.Alligator is the first 3D printer motherboard supporting direct connection to Linux embedded world.3D printers need a PC and an operating system to process models and generate GCODE printing files. Alligator Board with the expansion port for Raspberry-Pi becomes a whole with Linux.By simply connecting Raspberry-PI to Alligator you'll discover countless features, such as WIFI, bluetooth, full tablet control, slicer on board, and much more!With Raspberry-Pi you can install a web interface to control your printer  remotely and you can do slicing and control everything by using your browser, including printing.      





Alligator Board Repetier Firmware on Github
Alligator Board Design Files on Github
Download Alligator Board User Manual
Download Alligator Board Wiring Scheme









The ability to adjust the current of the motors via firmware allows the three axes to work in perfect harmony between them. The adjustable microstep size up to 1/32 and performance of the 32-bit ARM processor ensure high print resolution with any architecture.                      


 
The idea of developing a board, born at MakerFaire Rome 2013 edition, proposing a solution to all the most common printing problems related to electronics.
Then we founded the 3D Artists team and we started the development of the project, designing the Alligator Board.
The team has taken advantage of expertise and experience in the electronic and mechanical design by developing a complete and innovative solution, suitable for makers and professionals.

After one year of research and development we have presented the Alligator Board at the Maker Faire Rome 2014.








Alligator Board is designed, assembled and tested in Italy.

All the various production stages of Alligator Board are subjected to an accurate analysis, starting from the selection of the best components to the X-ray inspection:


PCB manufacturing & Electrical Test
Automatic solder paste dispencer
Automatic component SMT mount 

 Reflow Oven

AOI , automatic optical inspection

X-Ray inspection
Washing
Final Validation Test
Manual inspection
Packaging and shipping












Be part of our community, make a €10 pledge and adopt Mr Ally, an awesome 3D printed logo!








Be part of Alligator Community! Show your support with a cool limited Alligator T-Shirt!




Shipping rate table


Italy: 8€Europe : 17€America: 20€

Contact us for shipping to other countries.






The principle risk of not being able to deliver on our promise is small considering that we have already produced a prototype and this is working great. 
In terms of shipping, the boards will be assembled immediately after the end of the Indiegogo project, so everyone will have their rewards shipped out before the end of April 2015.
However, issues within the manufacturing process do occasionally happen that are unexpected; this would delay our delivery. In such an event, will be our priority to solve the inconvenience.
Whatever happens along our production timeline, you can rest assured that we will keep you updated on our progress. We do not take pledges lightly, as each pledge will come from people who believe in this project and our ability to execute.








Cover the costs of Alligator Board project development.



Maintain the entire process flow in Italy, from design to production.



Develop and launch into the market innovative and powerful products and accessories for 3D printers.




Be able to order a good amount of components to keep the price down.



Raise the funds to proceed with future production runs. 







What Firmware does Alligator support?


Currently is available Repetier Firmware, but in a few days we'll also have MarlinKimbra porting.
Lately are emerging many dedicated 32 bit high-performance firmwares and with Alligator you'll stay up to date.
How can I program the board?
There are two possibilities:
- Arduino IDE, with which you'll have no need of buying expensive programs or studying  difficult development environments. You only have to connect the Alligator's USB port to the PC.
- J-tag interface for the more experienced



What is the advantage of using this processor than ATmega2560?
With SAM3X8E you can print your pieces faster and at higher resolution.
For example if you decide to print a complex piece (as a woman's bust can be) with a standard 8 bit board, it can easily happen that the micro is not able to reckon on time and the printer moves jerkily. With Alligator this doesn't happen due to the increased computational power. 
Besides this, it's no small matter that because of the board's speed the printer moves in a much more harmonious manner, and we can realize this even from the noise of the engines.
What's more with the computational power and the bigger space you can put more performing firmwares that will make the print always better.
What is the advantage of not having to handle an operating system?Not having to handle a complex operating system is an advantage for all real time operations. For example a cortex timer will be much more efficient.Alligator is much faster, and at the same time thanks to the expansion port for Raspberry you will enjoy all the additional features that an operating system can have. So Wify, USB, Ethernet will be available without overloading the printer control. In addition to this, the firmware that can be loaded on Alligator were written for years and can therefore provide much more stability than an operating system.
Will Alligator be able to control a delta style printer and handle the segments calculations at higher levels? 


Alligator is perfect for Delta printers.The tests carried out in laboratory have shown an excellent performance even in the presence of many segments/second.
Network interface and Raspberry-Pi. How can I use them?


The network interface on board provides the opportunity to integrate a web server to monitor and control the printer and manage files Gcode.
With Raspberry-Pi you can install Repetier server or any other web interface and you can do slicing and control everything by using your browser, including printing.


Why do I want a Direct RaspberryPi connection, when I've got a
microcontroller on board, and the Pi can use the USB port?


The microcontroller on Alligator is not able to perform the slicer and generate a
gcode, RaspberryPi instead can do it!
A direct connection is much more convenient, the communication takes place via
direct serial without going through any USB/Serial converter. Much more stable!
Also some gpio are shared between Raspberry and Alligator and this allows you to
add many features such as an interrupt to launch routine on Alligator, this without
going through UART or USB ports.
How do I control the board when it is not connected to the PC? Has the SD slot been planned?
Alligator is equipped with an on board Micro SD card reader. You only have to to store the file to be printed (GCODE) in the memory card and launch the printing by using display or USB port.
Very soon it will be possible to start the printing via LAN with the Ethernet port.
Alligator has an expansion port that can be directly connected to the Raspberry-Pi. You'll have the opportunity of entering a Linux system in your machine! Everything will be easier and you may have features such as Slicer Gcode on board, full control of the machine via wifi, ethernet, bluetooth, printing notifications via email, webcam streaming.. a guaranteed fun!
What kind of display can be connected to Alligator Board?
You can connect the classic "full graphics display 128x64" with encoder and buzzer RepRap style.
Furthermore the display can be connected at both 3.3V and 5V:
- Alphanumeric
- SPI
- Serial (uart)
Sometimes you may need to add a small connector to arrange the order of the signals.
We're also developing a color display with touch interface. You'll very soon be able to control your machine with a touch of finger!

Yes, you can connect servo, led, rgb led, relè and more. Clearly the pins available are modest.

It's a given that a small power cut is often enough to block a print of many hours.
Example: You're making a 24 hours print. After 20 hours because of a disturbance due to a refrigerator, a washing machine, a neon or other, your printer stops, making you throw away time and money. We experienced this problem many times with the traditional boards , so we put on Alligator alimentation filter, USB filter and uncoupled GND signal which prevent these phenomena.
Alligator board being properly filtered and protected is immune to this type of problems. Your prints will be safe for many hours!
What does "20A no blowing connector" mean?


Let's say you're printing and a connector melts: besides the safety risk, you are forced to stop 3/4 days to order the piece, receive it and replace it. Here too, you threw a print, lost time and still had to buy other pieces.
"Precise Filtering" on temperature reading. How is it more precise?

Analog inputs are related to analog ground loops, these solutions are usually
implemented in quality boards.
The temperature inputs are actively filtered (not with a single capacitor as in other
boards). Thanks to this the readings are much more stable than traditional boards.

"Simple Filter"?

End­stop filters are extremely important: in Delta machines for proper calibration
it's essential that all trucks go home without false reading. Thus we have
introduced a specific active comparator that is an electronic solution by far more
stable compered to other boards that use only a simple capacitor as filtering.

"Protection from gnd loops" . What does it mean?
Many users complain of ground loops in their printers. With Alligator we have
minimized the problem by decoupling all round planes. We also added filters, both
common mode and differential mode to minimize every type of disturbance, and to
limit the effects of the loop due to the wiring.

The driver on board allows an optimization of the circuitry that makes overheating a distant memory.
The drivers burn because if mounted on external boards can not dissipate heat and signals through connectors can get incorrect.
The traditional drivers are therefore significantly less stable over time both as current and as temperatures.

If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make an additional contribution. This counts as the shipping cost.

story:
Let’s face it– we’re not just planning one aspect of our lives now. 

 

We’re juggling multiple roles: as goal-getters, multi-taskers, problem-solvers, and even way more than should be (am I right?). We’re balancing our personal, family, and work and/or school lives. 

It’s not just about organizing our schedules and to-do lists anymore; it’s about getting more out of life.

 

 

 

Meet the Design Your Life 2021 Planner

a fun, complete productivity system that keeps you motivated all year round.

 

 

 

What's inside?

Aside from a weekly planner, you get an impressive 17 productivity tools in one compact, portable system.

 

These are thoughtfully-designed tools to help you live life intentionally. They are grouped into 4 categories to help you visualize each aspect of your life: Lifestyle, Organization, Social/Relationship, and Finance.

 

 

 

Goal-Setting Pages

Ever feel overwhelmed when you need to set your goals? You're not alone! We've developed 4 simple, but thoughtful, steps to guide you. Look at the big picture, overcome your fears, then set manageable, smaller goals to help you achieve them. 

Wellness Check-Ins

Self-care is an investment. The DYL Planner provides a space for monthly reflections and quarterly check-ins to have a healthy relationship with yourself and to keep your mind and body going.

 

Travel Planners + Checklist

Get a bird's-eye view of your road trip and vacation plans, plus a master checklist so you don't forget your essentials.

 

 

Lists Pages

Listers gotta list. Have a bucket list? Write them down! Books to read, movies to watch, places to visit--there's a place for all of them here.

 

The Last Time

A tracker to remind you of the last times you did something like go to a doctor's appointment, had a car maintenance, cleaned the fridge, etc.

 

Monthlies

A monthly tracker/checklist for all your recurring to-do's, habits, events, and more.

 

 

Password Keeper

Ssshhh. There is a password keeper inside this planner, but of course we wouldn't name it that. We suggest using shortcuts codes or names that only you can understand. But for the ones who don't like this feature, this page can also be used as a Contacts Page / Address Book or an extension of your lists.

 

Notes Pages

Plenty of lined, dotted, and blank sheets for you to play with--18 pages to be exact!

 

 

 

Events Planner & Gift List

Plan events and jot down your loved ones' birthdays directly on your year at a glance. You also get a checklist for events to schedule later as well as a Gift List and your own Wishlist.

 

Future Log

Already have plans for 2022? We got you! The Future Log is a 2022 calendar and an events planner in one.

 

Cash Flow

See where your money is going, pay your bills on time, and budget for expenses. There is also a section where you can account for the things you want to save up for, whether small or big-- like your dream vacation, emergency funds, or retirement.

 

Expense Trackers

Writing down all your expenses makes you more mindful of your money habits. At the beginning of each month, an expense tracker is provided, but should you need more, we will have free printables available on our website after the campaign for you to download.

 

Pre-order yours now

 

 

The Weekly Planner

Each month consists of: 

  • an overview
  • expense tracker
  • monthly calendar
  • weekly pages

 

 

The first step to planning is actually wanting to open up your planner. With its unique monthly designs, you will never get bored of the DYL Planner. Each month is like a fresh start; an opportunity for new beginnings– even during the middle of the year.

 

 

Want a pretty planner but just don't have time to decorate every single page? The DYL Planner is already pre-designed to keep you motivated and inspired while leaving you with extra time to accomplish the important stuff.

 

Each page is thoughtfully-designed with you in mind. As graphic designers, we obsessed with every little detail--the spacing, fonts, colors, copy, and all the other things you don’t need to think about. We’ve also been constantly redesigning and improving the features based on thousands of feedback from the DYL community. Of course, we made it aesthetically-pleasing too so it can excite you every. single. day. No more pressure of making your planner look pretty; it already is!

 

 

Aside from all that goodness, there are also these awesome features:

 

  •  12-month weekly planner (Jan-Dec 2021). Your best year yet.
  •  6.5″ x 8.5″ (A5 plus the tabs). A handy, portable size that can fit in your bag.
  •  Expandable back pocket. For all your receipts, stickers, and maybe snacks?
  •  2 different-colored bookmarks. Distinguish where you’re at.
  •  Tabbed pages. Flip through productivity pages and months so quick.
  •  120 gsm FSC Certified paper. That thick, luxurious paper feeling that doesn't bleed through. Also eco-friendly!
  •  Round-edged, hard cover with matte finish. Sleek and sturdy.
  •  Lay-flat binding (new for 2021). Righties and lefties unite!
  •  Monday start. Plus, Saturdays and Sundays are their own days like they should be, not combined into one.
  •  192 pages. Full of useful, no-fuss pages.
  •  Holidays. US, Philippine, and fun holidays.
  •  Motivational quotes all throughout the year.
  •  Bonus: 2 sticker sheets! Because, why not?

 

 

We’ve already built a community that loves designing their lives and we’d love for you to be part of it! By backing the Design Your Life 2021 Planner, you also get access to our printables library-- a resource for additional productivity tools based on requests from members of the DYL community.

 

Join our DYL community on Facebook and Instagram!

 

Know anyone who would love their own DYL 2021 Planner? Let them know or gift one to them!

 

Get (2) DYL Planners now - 14% off!

One for you, and one for a friend!

 

 

 

See how others have used the past DYL Planners:

 

Click to see Instagram post

 

Click to see Instagram post

 

Click to see Instagram post

 

Click to see Instagram post

 

 

 


 

C&S Designs is co-founded in 2007 by sisters Christine and Sheryl Tan. Since then, we’ve been developing the planner and have expanded to create a line of Design Your Life Planners.

With Bachelor’s degrees in Information Design and Multimedia Arts respectively, everything we designed has been carefully thought of– from the user experience, the colors, the spacing, and down to the littlest details.

Our style is combining work with play and style with functionality. Our mission is to spread happiness with our designs and make planning fun and interesting. We can’t wait for you to receive your very own Design Your Life Planner! 

 

Shipping Details

We ship worldwide! Please also note that for international orders, shipping charges are discounted but do not include duties, taxes, customs VAT, or any other fees that may be charged by your country. You can check with your local customs office about rules and regulations that may apply to you.

 

Retailers & Press Inquiries

Please email us at hello@dylplanner.com

story:
About us

We're 3 guys. It's me, Isak, Alexander and Jonathan.
Jonathan is our very own talented designer, Alexander handle distribution, and I deal with our manufacturing-partner.

   What do you do with F You Money?
Well. You can do whatever you want with it. Like we do in the video, you could send it to someone who in the past has belittled you, you can burn it up and put it on your social media, have it on your desk at the office and so on. Feel free to do whatever the f*ck you want (because if not, it wouldn't be F You Money) #fyoumoney

About F-You Money. 

You might think we're joking, but we're not. This is just one of those ideas you get in the shower and usually forget about. However, we chose to act on it and now here we are.

Pledge options

Why this is important 

I'll be honest. It's not like we're solving any problems here, we don't want to.
We just felt like this product could make you feel good.

Stretch

Tell you what. If Mark Cuban or Gary Vaynerchuk pledge and share this campaign on their social media, and we reach 10.000$ - Everyone will get an extra bundle F-You Money.

Legal disclaimer

In the video you can see footage of me calling the local authorities to confirm that this product is not intended for counterfeit. You may have noticed that it's just my friend with a police cap on him, and not the actual authorities. 
And so, I'm writing this disclaimer as I have actually got the go-ahead from all Swedish agencies necessary. 
You might think Uncle Sam with a giant middle-finger would suffice, but I should also state that there are several disclaimers on the bill aswell.


Timeline

January -15 Idea is born, hard work begins.

January -16   -   Hard work finally over
March -16   -   LIVE! Indiegogo
April -16   -   End of campaign 
May -16   -   Printing and manufacturing       
June -16   -   Shipping


Risks and challenges

Manufacturing
At the moment we have a strong partnership that's legally binding, so that no matter the number of bundles ordered, they are committed to deliver on their statement. Depending on the volume, we might look at a different process of printing, however, if that would in anyway tamper with the quality we will make sure the quality is intact and instead cut back on our net.


Shipping
We're working with Sweden Postal Office to ensure the communication is good between us and our partner. Shipping outside of the EU does actually cost us a little bit more than 5$, however, we feel that buying 1 stack for 10$ and paying 8$ for shipping would not be very sexy. This is more of a risk for us rather than for the backer, however we felt the need to explain our position regarding expenses / profits - making this project more or less a zero-sum game.

story:
We want to help YOU — creators — with your crowdfunding campaigns, so you can focus on your creating instead of marketing.

Most crowdfunding campaigns fail because they don't generate enough traffic. We want to help you generate more traffic by taking our skills and turning them into products. Our team is seasoned in growth hacking and software development, and have already created a similar tool called Slingbot.

We want to improve on this and build tools, specifically for campaign owners, to make their lives easier.

Our goal is to offer a simple, effective Twitter marketing solution to help indiegogo campaigns succeed.


Why do we need $25,000 to develop the first crowdfunding marketing platform?

$25,000 will give us the runway to build out additional tools, analytics, and improve on our current platform.

We also want to scale our current product — Slingbot — to other platforms, such as Pinterest.

We're passionate about crowdfunding and want to help fellow crowdfunders raise the moeny they deserve. 

Our goal is to be the first, easy-to-use, crowdfunding marketing platform.

“The ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world, are the ones who do." — Steve Jobs


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute that’s perfectly ok. You can help with something more than currency! You can share our campaign!

Want to share the love? Tweet us at @SlingbotApp.

Curious about our current tool? Check out Slingbot.

story:
Introducing the development of a Hybrid GPS Navigational APP unlike any other, that will Integrate All the Major Internet Social Networks into One Seamless Real Time Display Navigational   Social Network:

TheGPSbook.com

       This app will Totally Revolutionize the way we connect by enhancing the entire way the internet social networking operates. This will be an APP that works on any mobile device that will integrate it’s GPS with all the major internet social network sites. The best way to describe how this APP will operate, feel, and look is think the video game “The Sims” meets your GPS Navigation mixed with Facebook / Foursquare / Twitter / Instagram / Bitstrips and etc. The beginning stages of developing this APP is already underway by one of the Largest Mobile App Developing Companies in the World - Zco Corporation www.zco.com who we are contracting as our programming team. Zco Corporation is a work for hire only APP Software development company and are excited to be on board for this project once the funding is raised! Be sure to check out their impressive work and resume as they are the right APP developing Company for the job on building this APP.  




According to Zco's estimates It will take 300 working days to build this APP based on these Screen Shots, 3D GPS Mapping, Website and Social Networking Support, and along with all these New Innovative Navigational Features.

Design Build For Mobile Device Operating System Platforms:


1. Complete Facebook Integration.

No need to add a new friends. Simply check mark the friends from your Facebook friends list who you want locate and be located by.

as well as integration of the rest of the other Social Network add on's that include statuses, pictures, and videos of you and your friends location.



2. Follow Mode.

How many times have you been on a long distance road trip with a caravan of vehicles and you got stuck behind a traffic light and lost your lead??

This App will let you track all your friends involved the road trip and Navigate you in a follow mode so you never lose their lead, even if they pull off on an exit to a gas station, restaurant, etc..

   

3. Meet UP's & CheckPoints

Ever Been to a large festival or amusement park with a group of people, split up and then later need to find each other or want to navigate to the location where they are?



4. Post Status / NewsFeed /  APP Tagging

Users can Post Status Bubbles of current locations. Integrate with other Social Apps by tagging pictures, videos, sounds, and etc generated by them to their locations. With a integrated News Feed Linked with Facebook & Twitter.

Turn Your Visibility to be located by friends ON/OFF with a default auto turn off Security Timer.  Set proximity alerts when any friends come within a set distance of where your at, and stay closer connected to what’s going on socially in your area!



According to Zco's estimates it will take 300 working days to build this APP based on these Screen Shots, 3D GPS Mapping, Website and Social Networking Support, along with all these New Innovative Navigational Features. For an approximate Zco's quoted labor costs of $130,000.  I will be working closely hand in hand with the Zco programming team Managing the production as the lead Design, making decisions on the creation of the feature flow of how the APP will stylishly operate, similar to how a Director or Producer creates a Movie or Music. The Goal of $350,000 amount of funding I am raising will cover this expense including any extras Zco may incur during the build, with the remaining balance of funds raised will be used for minor operating costs during development. Including covering All the expenses for Perk Rewards, and most of all, for the most important cost for it's success, the Majority of the remaining funds going towards Marketing the App!

In case we don't reach our goals of funding during this campaign we will still full-fill every Perk Contributed. So whether you donated towards a T-shirt, Sticker, or even the Iphone or Android Phone you will still receive IT!! 


Here's Your Chance to be on the Ground Floor part of the Newest Social Network Technological Advancement!

  







Hello my name is Aaron Mancina, and I am the independent innovator and founder for this APP, TheGPSbook.com. My Background is in Media, I own and operate an Independent Recording/Media Studio Label in Detroit, MI. Established in 2000 Called WiseGuy Records Studios, www.wiseguyrecords.com . In which I have many resources in building my team along with Zco to create this APP. Including all the right looks, operation, animation, and feel. Your Involvement on the Ground Floor is Crucial to making this all Possible! Hope there's a Perk that will best fit and you can contribute and be a part of this Revolutionary APP!

If it anytime there was any questions or concerns about this product or campaign feel free to comment or email me at: aaron@wiseguyrecords.com

Thank You For Your Support!!

Aaron Mancina

story:
Introduction

Thank you for visiting my project page. I have spent the past year developing a proof of concept privacy extension for the Firefox. The privacy extension enables you to send emails that only your recipients can read. It works but it is not yet ready for public release. That is where you come in. I would appreciate if you would help fund this project so that I can turn the proof of concept into a finished product which will deliver secure emails. Please take a few moments and read on to find out whether you would be interested in supporting this project.

What is the problem:

At the moment if you want to use Gmail you have no choice as to whether your email is private or not. This means that the content of your emails can be viewed by your provider. They can use your email for any purpose they choose which could be anything from targeted advertising or sharing your details with the American government. Overseas organisations do not recognise UK laws regarding an individuals right to privacy and the UK government does not enforce them.

The UK Human Rights Act 1998 law states:

Article 8: Right to privacy

(1) Everyone has the right for his private and family life, his home and his correspondence.

(2) There shall be no interference by a public authority with the exercise of this right except such as is in accordance with the law and is necessary in a democratic society in the interests of national security, public safety or the economic well-being of the country, for the prevention of disorder or crime, for the protection of health or morals, or for the protection of the rights and freedoms of others.

US based Lavabit, which has recently closed in the wake of the Edward Snowden scandal did provide a secure mail service. The Service provided by Lavabit was flawed because there was no separation between the organisation that sent the messages and the keys that secured them.

This would be like storing the keys to a money box in the cupboard where you keep it.

This unfortunately created an opportunity for Lavabit to betray their customers, and so were forced under legal pressure to close.

I have designed and successfully tested a mechanism that abstracts the process of securing the mail from the mechanism that sends it.

What is the project:

I have developed the proof of concept that delivers "better than no privacy mail". I need funding to turn this into a product that anyone can use. My aim is to deliver a product that will always be free for personal use. This funding will secure the resources needed to develop the product and the infrastructure for a fully supported 5 year live product. In that time I plan to licence the product for commercial use, securing the long term availability for the public.

How it works:

The system will initially operate as a browser add-on. This is used to request an encryption key from the Key Distribution Server (KDS). The add-on then encrypts the content of your mail and stores a copy of the recipient list. You can then send the mail with your normal mail service provider. You can use the exact same account you normally send mail with.

The recipient is then able to either use the add-on to request a copy of the key to decrypt the mail content or they can use a decipher portal on the Site for the (KDS).

The add-on can be configured to request a new encryption key for every secure message created or to hold a collection of re-usable keys that are recycled after a period.

Use of Funds:

In order to deliver this privacy solution I will use the funds requested in the following manner:

·  £10,000 will deliver the secure KDS with secure hosting of the service guaranteed for 5 years and full encrypted communication between your browser and the KDS. There is contingency built in to cope with an increased demand of service for additional resource (hardware).

·  £17,000 will cover the development costs to deliver free browser add-on for Firefox, Chrome, Safari and Internet Explorer. This will also deliver an encipher/decipher portal for those that do not want to use a browser add-on.

I have a schedule of stretch goals identified to expand the utility of the system further so that if the funding goal is reached I will update the project page.

story: NA

Have you ever missed an important meeting at work or a big test and you have all this to blame on your alarm clock...well, really it was your fault because you simply pressed the snooze button...over and over and over and over, well--you get the point.  ATOM+Eva, is what we like to call Alarm Technology Optimization Means. Eva is a piece of art--she works with an integrated mobile application called ATOM which operates on both iOS and Android platforms. 

 

What are they?

ATOM+Eva is a remote alarm clock, meaning you will have to physically get out of bed to turn the alarm off.  Unlike other remote alarm clocks, ATOM+Eva  is for everyone! It's portable, it looks great, and it's going to do the job! 

 

How do they work?

Great question!  Eva contains a one of a kind QR Code which responds to ATOM, a mobile device application.  Simply place Eva on your bathroom mirror or anywhere else that you visit when you first wake up.  Next, set ATOM (your alarm) for when you would like to wake up.  Finally when ATOM begins to alert you in the morning you will have to get out of your bed and scan Eva with the built in code scanner, once you do this, your alarm will then go off. The fact that you are actually out of your bed will do wonders in so many facets of life--productivity, you can actually make breakfast, you can see the sun rise, create an exercise routine and so much more!  And if you don't want to use ATOM+Eva for all that, but simply just want to wake up on time...they are there for that too! 

ATOM+Eva are of course a two part pair: You can download ATOM as an app on any iOS or Android mobile device. (You will receive an activation code when you receive Eva.) Eva is a beautiful anodized aluminum badge, containing a custom QR code, that is highly durable and includes a strong mini suction cup to stick to any flat non-pourus surface. Eva is also water resistant in the event she ends up in some place she shouldn't necessarily be.

 

Background

You may be wondering where we came up with names for ATOM+Eva...well here it is. Once we found out how much we liked calling the beautiful aluminum badge Eva, we came up with ATOM and an acronym to suit. So ATOM is the app side of things which stands for A-larm T-echnology O-ptimization M-eans and Eva is his much needed partner. Also, Eva, defined in Hebrew means "to live, to rise, or life." So we were really excited about that because after all, ATOM+Eva's job is to wake you up and give you life each morning! There is also that very popular play on words of the famous Biblical beings "Adam and Eve." They are very distant relatives of course and happy to share similar namesake!!

 

ATOM App Modes

Don't worry--we don't want you to destroy your mobile device, so to help you out we have designed several modes for you to pick from. 

"Stealth Mode" -- Set ATOM to Stealth mode and he will begin to alert you at the time you set.  He will continue ringing for 10 seconds--he will then become silent for the next 90 seconds, this time should be used to get out of bed and scan Eva to turn ATOM off.  We have designed this aspect for those that have roommates or really grumpy wives/husbands/girlfriends/boyfriends that will go crazy if they continue hearing ATOM alerting them non-stop.  If you scan Eva within the initial 100 seconds, no worries, ATOM is now off and most importantly you are out of your bed.  If you did not successfully scan Eva within the first 100 seconds--go pack your bags or promptly start apologizing...no, seriously you can still turn ATOM off, but he will continue alerting you until you scan Eva...no more quiet time!

"Away Mode" -- Of course ATOM+Eva do not want to be apart! We want you to take them with you on road trips to relatives, to be a part of your business trips,  and when you have a sleep over at a friends house.  Away Mode is simple, when you get to where you are staying, go place Eva where you want to scan her for your wake up call.  When ATOM begins alerting you in the morning you will wake up as usual and scan Eva to turn ATOM off--a second scan will then be required to turn off a second alert from ATOM reminding you to get Eva from wherever she is!  If you forget Eva behind even after the second scan...shame on you, ATOM reminded you to pick her up!

 

Your Help

We currently have a prototype of ATOM+Eva and they work great together! There are always hurdles and minimum quantities to order and unfortunately the hours the guys spend developing and testing is not free--so we really need your help!  Eva is looking great and we can't wait to see her in your hands--or on your mirror--or wherever you decide to place her, but she also has cost to make her look so great.  This is where you come in again, in order for us to get ATOM+Eva to you, we need to make orders that are efficient for both of us (and ATOM+Eva of course)...you as a backer will enable us to keep our cost at an efficient level and allow all of us; you, the team, and ATOM+Eva to be happy and in the homes of you, our backers! 

 

The Benefits

ATOM+Eva are for everyone!!!! Young or old can benefit and enjoy ATOM+Eva. Not many of us use regular old alarm clocks anymore because lets face it...they are old.  The use of ATOM in your mobile device means he is always with you, and Eva is portable and durable, so take her with you too! Reliable--ATOM+Eva are designed to work! If you keep pressing the snooze button, you will never get out of bed, but if you have to physically get up, you are...well, up! 

 

The Rewards

ATOM+Eva are the reward!!! We have an Early Bird special which can allow you to get ATOM+Eva as a backer pledging less than what they will retail for, don't miss this opportunity!!! If you aren't lucky enough to grab it early, don't worry--there are several pledge levels available. 

This is a great list of rewards with awesome benefits to you, our backers! Spread the word to all of your friends and tell them how cool ATOM+Eva will be, and don't worry we will have them ready well in time for Christmas and they will make a great stocking stuffer for all of those sleepy heads in your families!!!

- ATOM+Eva and the team

ATOM+Eva is a remote alarm clock, meaning you will have to physically get out of bed to turn the alarm off.  Unlike other remote alarm clocks, ATOM+Eva  is for everyone! It's portable, it looks great, and it's going to do the job! 
 
How do they work?
Great question!  Eva contains a one of a kind QR Code which responds to ATOM, a mobile device application.  Simply place Eva on your bathroom mirror or anywhere else that you visit when you first wake up.  Next, set ATOM (your alarm) for when you would like to wake up.  Finally when ATOM begins to alert you in the morning you will have to get out of your bed and scan Eva with the built in code scanner, once you do this, your alarm will then go off. The fact that you are actually out of your bed will do wonders in so many facets of life--productivity, you can actually make breakfast, you can see the sun rise, create an exercise routine and so much more!  And if you don't want to use ATOM+Eva for all that, but simply just want to wake up on time...they are there for that too! 
ATOM+Eva are of course a two part pair: You can download ATOM as an app on any iOS or Android mobile device. (You will receive an activation code when you receive Eva.) Eva is a beautiful anodized aluminum badge, containing a custom QR code, that is highly durable and includes a strong mini suction cup to stick to any flat non-pourus surface. Eva is also water resistant in the event she ends up in some place she shouldn't necessarily be.
 

Background
You may be wondering where we came up with names for ATOM+Eva...well here it is. Once we found out how much we liked calling the beautiful aluminum badge Eva, we came up with ATOM and an acronym to suit. So ATOM is the app side of things which stands for A-larm T-echnology O-ptimization M-eans and Eva is his much needed partner. Also, Eva, defined in Hebrew means "to live, to rise, or life." So we were really excited about that because after all, ATOM+Eva's job is to wake you up and give you life each morning! There is also that very popular play on words of the famous Biblical beings "Adam and Eve." They are very distant relatives of course and happy to share similar namesake!!
 
ATOM App Modes
Don't worry--we don't want you to destroy your mobile device, so to help you out we have designed several modes for you to pick from. 
"Stealth Mode" -- Set ATOM to Stealth mode and he will begin to alert you at the time you set.  He will continue ringing for 10 seconds--he will then become silent for the next 90 seconds, this time should be used to get out of bed and scan Eva to turn ATOM off.  We have designed this aspect for those that have roommates or really grumpy wives/husbands/girlfriends/boyfriends that will go crazy if they continue hearing ATOM alerting them non-stop.  If you scan Eva within the initial 100 seconds, no worries, ATOM is now off and most importantly you are out of your bed.  If you did not successfully scan Eva within the first 100 seconds--go pack your bags or promptly start apologizing...no, seriously you can still turn ATOM off, but he will continue alerting you until you scan Eva...no more quiet time!
"Away Mode" -- Of course ATOM+Eva do not want to be apart! We want you to take them with you on road trips to relatives, to be a part of your business trips,  and when you have a sleep over at a friends house.  Away Mode is simple, when you get to where you are staying, go place Eva where you want to scan her for your wake up call.  When ATOM begins alerting you in the morning you will wake up as usual and scan Eva to turn ATOM off--a second scan will then be required to turn off a second alert from ATOM reminding you to get Eva from wherever she is!  If you forget Eva behind even after the second scan...shame on you, ATOM reminded you to pick her up!
 
Your Help
We currently have a prototype of ATOM+Eva and they work great together! There are always hurdles and minimum quantities to order and unfortunately the hours the guys spend developing and testing is not free--so we really need your help!  Eva is looking great and we can't wait to see her in your hands--or on your mirror--or wherever you decide to place her, but she also has cost to make her look so great.  This is where you come in again, in order for us to get ATOM+Eva to you, we need to make orders that are efficient for both of us (and ATOM+Eva of course)...you as a backer will enable us to keep our cost at an efficient level and allow all of us; you, the team, and ATOM+Eva to be happy and in the homes of you, our backers! 
 
The Benefits
ATOM+Eva are for everyone!!!! Young or old can benefit and enjoy ATOM+Eva. Not many of us use regular old alarm clocks anymore because lets face it...they are old.  The use of ATOM in your mobile device means he is always with you, and Eva is portable and durable, so take her with you too! Reliable--ATOM+Eva are designed to work! If you keep pressing the snooze button, you will never get out of bed, but if you have to physically get up, you are...well, up! 
 
The Rewards
ATOM+Eva are the reward!!! We have an Early Bird special which can allow you to get ATOM+Eva as a backer pledging less than what they will retail for, don't miss this opportunity!!! If you aren't lucky enough to grab it early, don't worry--there are several pledge levels available. 
This is a great list of rewards with awesome benefits to you, our backers! Spread the word to all of your friends and tell them how cool ATOM+Eva will be, and don't worry we will have them ready well in time for Christmas and they will make a great stocking stuffer for all of those sleepy heads in your families!!!
- ATOM+Eva and the team

story:
A GLOBAL HEALTHCARE NETWORK

 

Medsembly is here to create a way for everyone in the healthcare profession to feasibly meet and network. The goal of our app is to unite all careers and offer endless resources and tools to aid in the success of our everyday superheroes, and to subsequently produce a stronger alliance within the medical field.

 

WHY MEDSEMBLY?

 

The Problem

Healthcare: One of the largest job sectors, a billion dollar industry, nearly 100 million students, employees and prospects, but no hub. There is no central area both virtual or actual that affords these crucial members of society an avenue to meet, share knowledge and ideas, help one another, and create lasting friendships.

The Solution:

 

Medsembly is a healthcare conglomerate! It allows our users a practical way to network and more! Our app will serve as an all-in-one for members in healthcare, where we will offer endless tools to aid in their learning. Along with the ability to chat and direct message peers, we have a dedicated resources page with direct access to third party, peer-reviewed apps and tools. These third party resources are well known, frequently used by our founder and recommended by others in the healthcare industry. Other current features include the ability to buy, sell, and trade medical/school books. One thing we would be able to further implement with your help is a medical marketplace where users can sell, trade, rent, or buy anything work or school related such as stethoscopes, otoscopes, and laptops. And finally, users can constantly test their knowledge and stay up-to-date on latest practices by answering case studies and practice questions.

 

A Look At The App

 

Network With Peers Globally

 

 

Practice Your Knowledge and Maintain Competence

 

Exchange Books and Medical Supplies

 

Direct Access to Peer-Reviewed and Recommended Resources To Help You Succeed

 

     

    The Impact

    On Our Users:

    Our goal at Medsembly is to alleviate the lives of our healthcare members anyway that we can. We understand the stress and anxiety that comes with obtaining a medical education and working in the healthcare sector. Though we work in a rewarding field, we deal with just as much trauma; treating gunshot wounds, drownings, open skull fractures, suicides, and cardiac arrests...just to name a few. With Medsembly, our users will have a platform that they can call home and meet like-minded peers that can relate to their personal struggles as they journey through the medical field.

    On The World:

    Although Medsembly is exclusively for healthcare members, it has an indirect impact on mankind. Being able to easily communicate with other professionals means learning of new innovative medical technology, ailments affecting other nations, comparing standards of practice and scope of practice, and learning new ways to effectively practice medicine and treat patients, to yield better healthcare for all!.

     

     

    Mission Launch The App: Why We Need Your Help

     

    Although Medsembly was founded in early 2018, we first focused on building a community and social medial presence, analyzing our audience and the need for an app like Medsembly prior to the start of development. Since our public inception in February 2018, we have gained nearly 18K Instagram followers, which is our primary platform of connecting and engaging with our audience.  Development of the app began in June 2019 and was completed in late November 2019. We started beta testing the Medsembly app in early December 2019. In just 5 months and with a small budget for marketing, we have acquired over 500 active testers on the app with a phenomenal reception. Users are excited for the future of Medsembly!

               

          

    With Your Contribution

    With your help, we can get the app out by our target launch date of Fall 2020 and in the hands of our users to truly make a difference! Every contribution helps us complete back-end work, general  app maintenance, and optimize the user interface to include some features such as:

    • Unique Registration Process
    • Individual Profile Pages
    • Better Image-upload Picture Resolution
    • Set-up Medical Marketplace
    • Incorporate Ads
    • Function to Reset Password and Username
    • Secure Proof API
    • Removing S3 Resources When User Deletes Post

     

     

    Meet the Founder

    Rodeline Joseph is a Physician Assistant with over 10 years of healthcare experience. She began her career in healthcare as an LPN at the age of 18 after graduating from a magnet high school. She gained ample experience while working in a nursing home during her undergraduate studies. She then went on to obtain her Master's degree in Physician Assistant Studies. She recognized the need for a platform like Medsembly while in PA school and realizing how difficult it was to meet and connect with other medical professionals outside the classroom. She has been a PA for nearly 4 years and works in Emergency Medicine and Urgent Care in Atlanta, Georgia. She began brainstorming her vision for Medsembly shortly after graduating PA school in 2016 and founded the company in  2018.
     
     
     
     
     

    Frontline Shirts And Tumblers For Backers!

    All our backers that make a minimum of $25 contribution get a Medsembly Logo Tumbler. Those that make a contribution of $50 or more get a short-sleeved unisex Frontline shirt in the color of their choice (white or black) along with a Medsembly Logo Tumbler. And anyone that contributes $100 or more gets their choice of a short or long-sleeved unisex Frontline shirt in the color of their choice (white or black), plus a Medsembly Logo Tumbler, plus a 10% discount off merchandise in our store! These shirts honor our healthcare professionals that devote their lives to treating patients, and most recently, during the COVID-19 pandemic. All our shirts are custom designed which means you won't find anywhere else.

     

    $25 contribution: Medsembly Logo Tumbler

    $50 contribution: Short-sleeve Frontline T-shirt in black or white PLUS a Medsembly Logo Tumbler

    $100+ contribution: Long-sleeved Frontline shirt in black or white PLUS a Medsembly Logo Tumbler PLUS 10% discount off shop store purchase.

     

     

     

     

    CAN'T BACK US? THAT'S OKAY, SHARE THE WORD WITH YOUR WORLD!

    Help us reach our goal by sharing our campaign with everyone you know!

     

     

    Follow Us For App Updates And All Things Medsembly!

       

     

    Hashtag #Medsembly when you receive your perks so we can feature you on our page!

     

    Click Below To Learn More From Our Website & Invite Healthcare Members To Beta Testing

    Thank you to all our backers and everyone who has supported our mission.

    Graphic Designer: FleurashDesign

    Videographer: Alexander Aperture

    Photographer: Dwayne Ricardo

    Make-up Artist: Artistry Defined

story:
Missed CHiP Pre-Orders?

Sign up & be the first to know when CHiP is Available
Head over now to WowWee.com/CHiP >


Simulates interactions with a real dog: feels hungry, needs attention, loves to play, and goes to sleep.

Smartband technology enables CHiP to uniquely recognize you, follow you, wait for you to come home, and remind you for mealtime or playtime.

Artificial intelligence and an adaptive personality to follow commands, fetch a ball, avoid obstacles, and learn new tricks. CHiP is equipped with an advanced locomotion system that allows for high speed, omnidirectional motion and extreme agility.


  1. PRODUCT FEATURES
  2. TECHNICAL SPECS
  3. SAFETY & CERTIFICATIONS
  4. DISTRIBUTION
  5. CUSTOMER SUPPORT

    6. Please contact CHiPsupport@wowwee.com with any questions or requests for changes in your order.(top)
    What comes in the box? - CHiP Robot Dog
    - SmartBand: Enables unique user recognition
    - SmartBall: Play fetch
    - SmartBed: CHiP is rechargeable and autonomously self docks.
    What does the Smartband do? The SmartBand enables unique user recognition. This means CHiP recognizes the wearer as its master.

    Additionally, you can use the SmartBand to:
    - Reward good behavior. "Like" certain behavior by hitting the "like" button on the band. CHiP learns what you like and what you don't like, and adjusts accordingly.
    - Tell CHiP to come. If you want your CHiP at your side, simply hit the location pin on the band.
    - Attack. Little brother being a pest? Sic CHiP on him!
    - Control CHiP's movements. The SmartBand doubles as a joystick for remote control.
    What does the Smartball do? CHiP can track the ball in real time, which means that you can play games together. CHiP can play fetch and even soccer!
    What does the Smartbed do? One of our favorite features of CHiP is the SmartBed. Whenever CHiP gets low on power, and is within range of the SmartBed, CHiP will make its way back. As for the actual battery life, we are currently testing and optimizing the battery life. We expect to the production units to have hours of battery life in continuous mode and even longer in standby modes.
    What can I do with the CHiP app? The CHiP app serves many functions and enables even more layers of gameplay:

    1. Notification Center: The CHiP app lets you gauge the status of CHiP's vitals - how happy, hungry, and energetic CHiP is feeling. If one area becomes deficient, the app pushes a notification to the user.
    2. Tricks: When CHiP learns a new trick as a result of a new interaction with a user, the App stores it in CHiP's trickbook, and you can reward CHiP with a "Like" or a treat. It also lets CHiP's master access and replay these with a tap of a button.
    3. Feed CHiP.
    4. Secondary commands for SmartBand: The SmartBand responds to a "tap" and a "hold". Thus, the user can choose and program all kinds of secondary shortcuts on his/her SmartBand through the CHiP app.
    5. Turn your smartphone or tablet into a remote control for CHiP to control his movements.

    (top)

    Device Compatibility We don't have the official compatibility listing yet, but popular Android and iOS devices will be supported. WowWee has a long history developing SmatPhone controlled robots and devices, we work hard to support as many devices as possible. You can refer to the device compatibility for the MiP robot to get a sense of what our products currently support. This list may change as your device operating system gets updated, as new devices come out, and as we develop the CHiP firmware and electronics.
    How Rugged is CHiP CHiP is pretty tough and goes through extensive abuse testing. We do ask that you take reasonable care and avoid hard drops, staircases, water, and other situations that could damage CHiP.
    Can I throw the SmartBall? Despite the fact that we designed the SmartBall to be very resilient to drops and shocks, we don't recommend throwing the SmartBall on to hard surfaces, or subjecting it to severe impacts. Generally speaking, a light toss, or rolling motion is preferred and will result in the best play experience indoors.
    CHiP has really cool looking wheels, what are those? And why does CHiP have wheels like that? CHiP has mecanum wheels which we selected as they allow for some pretty amazing movement. Using these wheels, CHiP can move in any direction and is therefore fully omni-directional. We think this is cool because it means that CHiP can chase a ball, slide sideways to block a ball, follow you very quickly, and generally be very responsive and agile.
    CHiP wheels look they can be replaced. Yes, we decided to future proof CHiPs wheels so that in the future, if we come up with variations on size, performance, etc, it will be really easy to replace the wheels.
    How fast will CHiP move? It's a bit early to clock in CHiP's top speed as we are still tuning the gearboxes, motors, and electronics. CHiP will move very quickly and the video shows the current motion and speed of our existing prototypes. We expect the production CHiPs to be just as fast and possibly faster.
    What is the range of the BeaconSense™  system? The BeaconSense™  system allows CHiP to track its accessories (the SmartBall, SmartWatch, and SmartBand). The range is several meters and this covers most room sizes. It's possible that CHiP may be blocked from seeing its accessories if there are walls or other obstacles in the way. However, the system is very robust and we have launched many products using this type of technology. If CHiP needs to recharge but is really far from the SmartBed, or in a different room, it will alert you via the Bluetooth link and the app and ask for a hand getting back to the SmartBed.
    Will the BeaconSense™ system work between rooms? We are actively improving the BeaconSense™ system and we expect to develop the technology so that we can provide multiple beacons in a pack that can be placed around a home to build a mesh of navigational beacons. That would enable CHiP to truly navigate your home. We are also refining the obstacle avoidance algorithms and any/all improvements will be made available through firmware updates.
    What is the SmartBand? The SmartBand is a sleek, rechargeable, wearable wristband. It is packed with technology (BeaconSense™ and Bluetooth) that lets CHiP know where you are and what you want. When you walk into a room, CHiP will react and come towards you. It also has buttons on it so you can activate CHiPs capabilities or movements with great convenience. For example you can use the SmartBand to have CHiP come, heel, or stay. You can even tell CHiP when you like something by tapping the Like button on the remote, and CHiP will learn your preferences.
    What is the SmartBall? The SmartBall is CHiP's favorite toy. Like the SmartBand, the SmartBall is packed with sensors and wireless abilities. This allows CHiP to know where the SmartBall is, pick it up, bring it to you, or simply play. It enables soccer-type play, fetch and CHiP can play with his toy any time it's in range.
    What can I do with both of these items? You can do countless things with these devices, but here is one example: When you play fetch with CHiP, the SmartBand and the SmartBall work together so that CHiP can find the ball, and bring it back to you. CHiP can also play soccer with you and guard a goal from incoming shots, or simply pass the ball back to you.
    Does CHiP have voice recognition? We want to provide a seamless experience for the user. That being said, we have been exploring several different voice recognition technologies and we are looking for the best solution. Rest assured, that it's one of our major goals to crack by the time the product ships.
    Can CHiP climb stairs? Unfortunately no, CHiP is a one floor pup.
    Can CHiP walk on carpets? CHiP's mecanum wheel design allows him to roll across most floor surfaces - including hardwood floors, tile, and low pile carpeting.
    Can CHiP be used outside? CHiP is pretty good on most floor surfaces, and might work well on a smoothly paved road, but the rollers on his meccanum wheels would not do well on rough pavement or gravel. We did design CHiPs wheels to be removable/swappable, and it's possible that given demand, we will be releasing outdoor wheels.

    While CHiP can probably handle the smooth pavement, his BeaconSense system uses infrared light, which operates in the 940nm frequency, and while it can function outdoors (which is why that frequency is used) its range is very limited, no more than a couple feet, and can have interference in strong sunlight. He can be driven using the CHiP App out doors, but his tracking skills would be very limited. Also note that CHiP is not waterproof, and should not get wet.
    Is Chip rechargeable or it works on same AAA/AA batteries? CHiP is rechargeable. The SmartBand is rechargeable.
    If it is rechargeable than how much time it generally takes and what is play time on full recharge? We are shooting for CHiP to easily get through an active day. But like any Dog CHiP will need a recharge periodically or after significant use. One of our main goals with CHiP is to eliminate the worry and inconvenience of having to charge or change batteries.  
    Where can CHiP play? Low-cut carpet, hardwood floor, slippery tile. He’s an indoor dog!

    (top)

    Is CHiP under warranty? WowWee offers 90 day warranties on all of its robot products.
    Is CHiP waterproof CHiP is not waterproof. Please keep CHiP away from moisture, rain, puddles, spills, dirt.

    (top)

    How much it will cost in stores? We are look at MSRPs of $229 at retail.
    When is credit card debited? Indiegogo will process your payment at the time of preorder, upon checkout.
    Payment information on Indiegogo site More info on the IGG payment process & other details should be written up on the IGG website
    What will be the return policy or method if it come out to be defective in pre-order models? We will replace.
    When will I receive my CHiP? You'll be the among the first to receive CHiP. WowWee plans to fulfill pre-orders in the Summer of 2016, ahead of CHiP being available on retail shelves.
    Where does CHiP ship to? We provide worldwide shipping. Shipping rates vary depending on your country.
    How much does shipping cost? Shipping costs are already included for the USA, For Canada, there is a charge of $30 for shipping. For rest of the world, please add $45 for shipping (not including duties or taxes). For multi-packs, (CHiP 2 pack), shipping charge decreases per unit. Please see perk details for the shipping cost that applies to you.
    Does the price include VAT or other duties? For the customers who ordered during the international sales period, you are responsible for any VAT, tariff, duty, taxes, handling fees, brokerage charges, customs clearance charges, etc. required by your country for importing consumer goods.
    Can I get a refund? Yes, Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, please see here for How To Request a Refund.

    (top)

    Where can I buy it? Right here, right now on Indiegogo!
    There was an error with my contribution. What happened? Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve : Common Contribution Errors. Also this video might help.
    Can I get a refund? Yes, Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, Please see here for How To Request a Refund.
    How do I choose more than one perk? The Indiegogo system is not set up to choose multiple perks. If you would like to choose more than one perk, you will need to initiate a separate process for each pre-order. If you encounter difficulties, please email CHiPsupport@wowwee.com  and use "NEED HELP WITH ORDERING" as the subject line.
    There was an error with my contribution. What happened? Please refer to this article on Common Contribution Errors.
    Why am I checking out through Indiegogo? We are using the Indiegogo platform to maintain transparency with our campaign: all the stats, numbers, deadlines and dollars raised are real. We want you to know that we have the full support of the crowdfunding community to help keep us accountable.
    If I have other questions, who should I contact? We are receiving a lot of inquiries, and are responding as fast as possible. Please contact CHiPsupport@wowwee.com  with any other questions you may have.
