The SmartBand enables unique user recognition. This means CHiP recognizes the wearer as its master. 

Additionally, you can use the SmartBand to:
- Reward good behavior. "Like" certain behavior by hitting the "like" button on the band. CHiP learns what you like and what you don't like, and adjusts accordingly. 
- Tell CHiP to come. If you want your CHiP at your side, simply hit the location pin on the band. 
- Attack. Little brother being a pest? Sic CHiP on him!
- Control CHiP's movements. The SmartBand doubles as a joystick for remote control. 


What does the Smartball do?
CHiP can track the ball in real time, which means that you can play games together. CHiP can play fetch and even soccer! 


What does the Smartbed do?
One of our favorite features of CHiP is the SmartBed.  Whenever CHiP gets low on power, and is within range of the SmartBed, CHiP will make its way back.  As for the actual battery life, we are currently testing and optimizing the battery life.  We expect to the production units to have hours of battery life in continuous mode and even longer in standby modes.


What can I do with the CHiP app?
The CHiP app serves many functions and enables even more layers of gameplay:

1. Notification Center: The CHiP app lets you gauge the status of CHiP's vitals - how happy, hungry, and energetic CHiP is feeling. If one area becomes deficient, the app pushes a notification to the user.
2. Tricks: When CHiP learns a new trick as a result of a new interaction with a user, the App stores it in CHiP's trickbook, and you can reward CHiP with a "Like" or a treat. It also lets CHiP's master access and replay these with a tap of a button.
3. Feed CHiP.
4. Secondary commands for SmartBand: The SmartBand responds to a "tap" and a "hold". Thus, the user can choose and program all kinds of secondary shortcuts on his/her SmartBand through the CHiP app. 
5. Turn your smartphone or tablet into a remote control for CHiP to control his movements.





(top)



Device Compatibility
We don't have the official compatibility listing yet, but popular Android and iOS devices will be supported. WowWee has a long history developing SmatPhone controlled robots and devices, we work hard to support as many devices as possible.  You can refer to the device compatibility for the MiP robot to get a sense of what our products currently support.  This list may change as your device operating system gets updated, as new devices come out, and as we develop the CHiP firmware and electronics.


How Rugged is CHiP
CHiP is pretty tough and goes through extensive abuse testing.  We do ask that you take reasonable care and avoid hard drops, staircases, water, and other situations that could damage CHiP.


Can I throw the SmartBall?
Despite the fact that we designed the SmartBall to be very resilient to drops and shocks, we don't recommend throwing the SmartBall on to hard surfaces, or subjecting it to severe impacts. Generally speaking, a light toss, or rolling motion is preferred and will result in the best play experience indoors.


CHiP has really cool looking wheels, what are those?  And why does CHiP have wheels like that?
CHiP has mecanum wheels which we selected as they allow for some pretty amazing movement.  Using these wheels, CHiP can move in any direction and is therefore fully omni-directional.  We think this is cool because it means that CHiP can chase a ball, slide sideways to block a ball, follow you very quickly, and generally be very responsive and agile.


CHiP wheels look they can be replaced.
Yes, we decided to future proof CHiPs wheels so that in the future, if we come up with variations on size, performance, etc, it will be really easy to replace the wheels.


How fast will CHiP move?
It's a bit early to clock in CHiP's top speed as we are still tuning the gearboxes, motors, and electronics. CHiP will move very quickly and the video shows the current motion and speed of our existing prototypes. We expect the production CHiPs to be just as fast and possibly faster.


What is the range of the BeaconSense™  system?
The BeaconSense™  system allows CHiP to track its accessories (the SmartBall, SmartWatch, and SmartBand). The range is several meters and this covers most room sizes. It's possible that CHiP may be blocked from seeing its accessories if there are walls or other obstacles in the way. However, the system is very robust and we have launched many products using this type of technology. If CHiP needs to recharge but is really far from the SmartBed, or in a different room, it will alert you via the Bluetooth link and the app and ask for a hand getting back to the SmartBed.


Will the BeaconSense™ system work between rooms?
We are actively improving the BeaconSense™ system and we expect to develop the technology so that we can provide multiple beacons in a pack that can be placed around a home to build a mesh of navigational beacons.  That would enable CHiP to truly navigate your home. We are also refining the obstacle avoidance algorithms and any/all improvements will be made available through firmware updates.


What is the SmartBand?
The SmartBand is a sleek, rechargeable, wearable wristband. It is packed with technology (BeaconSense™ and Bluetooth) that lets CHiP know where you are and what you want.  When you walk into a room, CHiP will react and come towards you.  It also has buttons on it so you can activate CHiPs capabilities or movements with great convenience.  For example you can use the SmartBand to have CHiP come, heel, or stay.  You can even tell CHiP when you like something by tapping the Like button on the remote, and CHiP will learn your preferences.


What is the SmartBall?
The SmartBall is CHiP's favorite toy. Like the SmartBand, the SmartBall is packed with sensors and wireless abilities. This allows CHiP to know where the SmartBall is, pick it up, bring it to you, or simply play. It enables soccer-type play, fetch and CHiP can play with his toy any time it's in range.


What can I do with both of these items?
You can do countless things with these devices, but here is one example: When you play fetch with CHiP, the SmartBand and the SmartBall work together so that CHiP can find the ball, and bring it back to you. CHiP can also play soccer with you and guard a goal from incoming shots, or simply pass the ball back to you.


Does CHiP have voice recognition?
We want to provide a seamless experience for the user. That being said, we have been exploring several different voice recognition technologies and we are looking for the best solution. Rest assured, that it's one of our major goals to crack by the time the product ships.


Can CHiP climb stairs?
Unfortunately no, CHiP is a one floor pup.


Can CHiP walk on carpets?
CHiP's mecanum wheel design allows him to roll across most floor surfaces - including hardwood floors, tile, and low pile carpeting.  



Can CHiP be used outside?
CHiP is pretty good on most floor surfaces, and might work well on a smoothly paved road, but the rollers on his meccanum wheels would not do well on rough pavement or gravel. We did design CHiPs wheels to be removable/swappable, and it's possible that given demand, we will be releasing outdoor wheels. 



While CHiP can probably handle the smooth pavement, his BeaconSense system uses infrared light, which operates in the 940nm frequency, and while it can function outdoors (which is why that frequency is used) its range is very limited, no more than a couple feet, and can have interference in strong sunlight. He can be driven using the CHiP App out doors, but his tracking skills would be very limited. Also note that CHiP is not waterproof, and should not get wet.


Is Chip rechargeable or it works on same AAA/AA batteries?
CHiP is rechargeable. The SmartBand is rechargeable.



If it is rechargeable than how much time it generally takes and what is play time
on full recharge?
We are shooting for CHiP to easily get through an active day.  But like any Dog CHiP will need a recharge periodically or after significant use.  One of our main goals with CHiP is to eliminate the worry and inconvenience of having to charge or change batteries.  


Where can CHiP play?
Low-cut carpet, hardwood floor, slippery tile. He’s an indoor dog!





(top)



Is CHiP under warranty? 
WowWee offers 90 day warranties on all of its robot products. 


Is CHiP waterproof
CHiP is not waterproof.  Please keep CHiP away from moisture, rain, puddles, spills, dirt.





(top)



How much it will cost in stores?
We are look at MSRPs of $229 at retail.


When is credit card debited?
Indiegogo will process your payment at the time of preorder, upon checkout.


Payment information on Indiegogo site
More info on the IGG payment process & other details should be written up on the IGG website


What will be the return policy or method if it come out to be
defective in pre-order models?
We will replace.


When will I receive my CHiP?
You'll be the among the first to receive CHiP. WowWee plans to fulfill pre-orders in the Summer of 2016, ahead of CHiP being available on retail shelves.


Where does CHiP ship to?
We provide worldwide shipping. Shipping rates vary depending on your country.


How much does shipping cost?
Shipping costs are already included for the USA, For Canada, there is a charge of $30 for shipping. For rest of the world, please add $45 for shipping (not including duties or taxes). For multi-packs, (CHiP 2 pack), shipping charge decreases per unit. Please see perk details for the shipping cost that applies to you.


Does the price include VAT or other duties?
For the customers who ordered during the international sales period, you are responsible for any VAT, tariff, duty, taxes, handling fees, brokerage charges, customs clearance charges, etc. required by your country for importing consumer goods.


Can I get a refund?
Yes, Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, please see here for How To Request a Refund.





(top)



Where can I buy it?
Right here, right now on Indiegogo!


There was an error with my contribution. What happened?
Please refer to this article on  common contribution errors and steps to resolve : Common Contribution Errors. Also this video might help.



Can I get a refund?
Yes, Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, Please see here for How To Request a Refund.


How do I choose more than one perk?
The Indiegogo system is not set up to choose multiple perks. If you would like to choose more than one perk, you will need to initiate a separate process for each pre-order. If you encounter difficulties, please email CHiPsupport@wowwee.com  and use "NEED HELP WITH ORDERING" as the subject line.


There was an error with my contribution. What happened?
Please refer to this article on  Common Contribution Errors.


Why am I checking out through Indiegogo?
We are using the Indiegogo platform to maintain transparency with our campaign: all the stats, numbers, deadlines and dollars raised are real. We want you to know that we have the full support of the crowdfunding community to help keep us accountable.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?
We are receiving a lot of inquiries, and are responding as fast as possible. Please contact CHiPsupport@wowwee.com   with any other questions you may have.

story:
How it happened & why

          

  How it works                                                     

                                          Two Steps 

                   

         

Benefits

                                 

 

Push Pull Power Tool 

Standard model

Standard model-Gentle operation for use on or close to fragile parts.

                                No damage around

                       Different applications

 

Standard model-transmission tube (ramp)  

 

3D  Design standard model

 

 
 

  Heavy Duty Model:

  

Heavy Duty Model-More power.For working out doors.Capable of removing 4 inch nails or wood fastened with multiple nails and screw.

 

 

Founder/Inventor

My name is Hamid Izadi. I am a mechanical engineer with more than 20 years of experience in the field of designing specialized machines and parts for various production lines; auto parts, gas valves, sanitary valves, and other mass produced precision parts. A history of my previous work is available on our website: www.bestindustrial.info

Nasser ashgriz

Professor,Mechanical Engineering

Intellectual Property Advisor

                                        

 

Beniamin lenchner

                                

Production manager

 

 

 Nazila Izadi

   Networking,Marketing

How does this tool Positively impact the environment?

This tool saves time for handymen, who would normally struggle with the manual removal of nails and screws. It is often too difficult to handle so many nails in one job or shift, leading many skilled workers to break or cut the wood for disposal. This leads to disposal fees, as wood cannot be recycled if it has embedded nails, screws, or other metal fasteners. In addition to the cost of disposal, this practice is also very harmful f to the environment. This disposed wood is usually burned, causing its own form of pollution after which new trees would have to be felled to supply wood further depleting this limited natural resource. Reuse and recycling of wood provides great environmental benefits as well as cost savings.

 

                                       

Your help is motivating to invent for this important.

Our perks

 

 

standard model

Retail price :                                                                                         300  USD

Early Bird     :                      40% off + free shipping                    180  USD      

Exclusive Indiegogo        30%off  + free shipping                     210  USD

1 hp air compressor+air hose

type :oil-less,singel stage,direct drive

power:1 horspower,120V,220V,60Hz,9.5A

Duty cycle:50%

Tank size:3 US Gallon(11.4L)

Motor type: Heavy duty induction

Cut in pressuer:95 psi 

Cut off pressuer:125psi

Compressor capacity : 3 CFM , 40psi, --  2 CFM ,90 psi

 

Standard model+1 hp Air compressor+Air hose

Retail price :                                                                                           420 USD

Exclusive Indiegogo :          30%off+free shipping                     295 USD

 

Heavy duty model

Retail price:                                                                                             400 USD

Early Bird:                                40%Off+free shipping                    240 USD

Exclusive Indiegogo;            30%Off+free shipping                    280 USD

Heavy duty model+1 hp air compressor+Air hose

Retail price :                                                                                            520 USD

Exclusive Indiegogo:             30%Off+free shipping                    365 USD

 

Common  Questions

Q1: Do you have push pull power tool that be electric or cordless?

We have designs for electric and cordless versions which will produced if this campaign is successful. Please free to email us if you would like to make a special order

Q2: How is push pull power tool  ​manufactured?

We have quality manufacturers that supply specialized parts, whom we have worked with for many years.

If this crowd funding campaign is successful, the project will be managed by a team of professionals.  

Assembly and tests of the product will be done by our team to ensure the best production and quality assurance.

Q3: Did you test the durability of the product?

Yes. Currently our prototypes have over 100 hours of use and testing; with use and testing continuing daily.

Q4: What kind of warranty do you have?

You will receive product with 2 years manufactures warranty.

Q5: Can contributors give suggestions for this product?

Certainly we would love to hear your suggestions. Your satisfaction is an important aspect of the creation of this product.  

Q6: Will this product be available internationally?

Yes we deliver push pull power tool anywhere in the world with the exception of a few countries that have regulated importation and international payment laws.

Q7: Do you have any special chisel for other applications?  

Yes, but currently only the models that need crowd funding are available. If  you have a specific need feel free to send us an email.

Q8: How much pressure does the tool need for correct operation?

90 Psi. Most standard compressors produce enough pressure. 

Q9: What is capability of each model?

Standard model is able to pull nails up to 2.5 inches.

Heavy duty model is able to pull nails up to 4 inches.

Q10:What is needed for operator safety?

Safety glasses and gloves are suggested for operator safety.

Q11: Can the tool be used in multiple positions?

Yes, the Push Pull Power Tool can be use in various positions. The angle between the two handles changes to 90, 180 or 270 degrees; making it possible for use with either hand.

Q12:What is the return-policy?

We have a 14 day return policy with a full return if product is undamaged and in normal working condition.

Q13:Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT for international order?

Import duty or VAT-may need to be paid if your country requires it .

VAT or import duty will need to be paid before final delivery ,in most case if there is duty to be paid the delivery company will contact you and they will have the ability to accept payment either online ,by phone or with the delivery driver directly .The baker is responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing.  (http://www.dutycalculator/hs-code-duty-rate...)

Q14:How can i contact you ?

You can email us anytime at hamidizadi21@yahoo.ca or like and follow us on Facebook, Instagram and twitter. Visit our official website at www.bestindustrial.info

Q15: How can get a refund

You have to read Indiegogo policy.

  

Risk &Challenges 

.We are very mindful of the importance of on time delivery of product. Some factors that may affect this are uncontrollable events such as natural phenomena/storms as well as manufacturer/supplier issues.

 With these factors being ever present we have solutions for different scenarios; we have business with multiple manufacturers/suppliers with we whom have over 20 years of experience, for contingency in case of emergency.

In relation to technical challenges and issues, our in house team is very capable at troubleshooting problems and innovating solutions. This may cause the product to be slightly different but maintain or improve ease of use and functionality.  Please visit or our website: www.bestindustrial.info for an in-depth view of our capabilities..

 Quality Assurance is of utmost importance to us and will be ensured via our experience in project management, quality control plans and our hard working team of engineers.

Our team truly appreciates everyone that contributes to this campaign. We view you as team members helping to bring the Push Pull Power Tool to reality.

story:
Due to the momentum gained towards the end of this initial campaign (via social media, word of mouth, local press, catching up with the learning curve, etc.) and the potential for some upcoming national press, we at WorldPennyJar have decided to extend our campaign here (www.indiegogo.com/worldpennyjar) as we try to reach our $20,000 goal.  We raised $1,190 during the first phase of the campaign, so we have set our goal for this second phase at $18,810.  Please continue to support our campaign and follow our progress at the link above.


Also, here's the list of all those who contributed to phase one of the campaign: Beau Llewellyn, Emily McClelland, Juan Salgado, Vera Purcell, Eric Haynes, Sally Stoll, Kathryn Servais, Ann Marie Piotrowski, Nicole Cantalupo, Jeff Wahlgren, Jamie Vandenberg, Marc Siegel, Mary Warren, Caitlin Murray, Cori Kunnert, Henry Greene, Don Wheeler, Stephanie Ivy, William Moskoff, Caroline Coykendall, Jennifer Sydow, George Speros, Dominic Colella, Anne Marie Lubicky, Sam O'Malley, Emily Hill, and to all of the others who have contributed anonymously.  -- Thank you so much!

Also, here's the list of all those who contributed to phase one of the campaign: Beau Llewellyn, Emily McClelland, Juan Salgado, Vera Purcell, Eric Haynes, Sally Stoll, Kathryn Servais, Ann Marie Piotrowski, Nicole Cantalupo, Jeff Wahlgren, Jamie Vandenberg, Marc Siegel, Mary Warren, Caitlin Murray, Cori Kunnert, Henry Greene, Don Wheeler, Stephanie Ivy, William Moskoff, Caroline Coykendall, Jennifer Sydow, George Speros, Dominic Colella, Anne Marie Lubicky, Sam O'Malley, Emily Hill, and to all of the others who have contributed anonymously.  -- Thank you so much!

story:
The first edition of the Yubixi app already connects you with others nearby based on common interests. You can watch the demo video and/or download it today from the Apple App Store for iPhones or Google Play for Android phones.

Now, imagine that the app shows you all of the events and activities happening near you based on your interests. Yes, there are other apps out there that try to do this, but no one has gotten it right yet. We know that all you want is to see everything that's going on around that you care about and nothing you don't. The proven team at Yubixi can build a better events app, and we can have it in your hands in 60 days if we meet our funding threshold. How's that for rapid gratification?

Using the foundation of our current Yubixi app that connects people with each other based on common interests and proximity, we can make the vision for events a reality. You'll see activities you're actually interested in, including major events like concerts, festivals, and sporting events, but you'll also see smaller events like comedy shows, networking events, community projects, and public gatherings, as well as user created events, like parties and meetings and even some special secret VIP events like movie premiers and celebrity appearances.  Before you know it, instead of saying "I don't know... what do YOU want to do?" you'll be telling your friends to get the app! (and you can be all cool telling them how you helped crowdfund it and stuff).

This funding will allow us to extend the current Yubixi app and expand our infrastructure and team to support the initial version of events. The more successful our fundraising is, the better we'll make it and the sooner we'll get it in your hands. 

Meanwhile, you can download the current version of Yubixi here.

If we hit our target, we will keep raising funds and keep giving rewards. Every dime will be specifically allocated to making the app even better. We have the resources, it's just a matter of whether they work on this project or another (far less exciting) one.
story_txt: The first edition of the Yubixi app already connects you with others nearby based on common interests. You can watch the demo video and/or download it today from the Apple App Store for iPhones or Google Play for Android phones.Now, imagine that the app shows you all of the events and activities happening near you based on your interests. Yes, there are other apps out there that try to do this, but no one has gotten it right yet. We know that all you want is to see everything that's going on around that you care about and nothing you don't. The proven team at Yubixi can build a better events app, and we can have it in your hands in 60 days if we meet our funding threshold. How's that for rapid gratification?Using the foundation of our current Yubixi app that connects people with each other based on common interests and proximity, we can make the vision for events a reality. You'll see activities you're actually interested in, including major events like concerts, festivals, and sporting events, but you'll also see smaller events like comedy shows, networking events, community projects, and public gatherings, as well as user created events, like parties and meetings and even some special secret VIP events like movie premiers and celebrity appearances.  Before you know it, instead of saying "I don't know... what do YOU want to do?" you'll be telling your friends to get the app! (and you can be all cool telling them how you helped crowdfund it and stuff).This funding will allow us to extend the current Yubixi app and expand our infrastructure and team to support the initial version of events. The more successful our fundraising is, the better we'll make it and the sooner we'll get it in your hands. Meanwhile, you can download the current version of Yubixi here.If we hit our target, we will keep raising funds and keep giving rewards. Every dime will be specifically allocated to making the app even better. We have the resources, it's just a matter of whether they work on this project or another (far less exciting) one.

story:
Inspired by classic typewriters - lofree is designed to give you a nostalgic feeling. Yet, it introduces advanced features like simultaneously pairing to three devices, different backlit options, wireless/wired mode and more.

 

It comes in Pure White:

Turquoise Blue:

Or Sandstone Black:

95% of all mechanical keyboard are made for gamers. They are bulky, wired and full with features that you that you probably won’t use.

The lofree keyboard is built for writers, designers and everyone that just want to enjoy a beautiful wireless mechanical keyboard.

We believe lofree will transform the way you think about keyboards. We want you to feel inspired every time you look at the lofree keyboard. 

Whether you like the lofree keyboard wired or wireless (via Bluetooth), both is possible via a quick switch on the side of the keyboard.

Are you planning to use the lofree keyboard for the Mac? Lofree is fully compatible with Mac’s functional keys (F1 to F12) without any additional setup from your side. That means you'll be able to adjust the brightness and volume, use launchpad, mission control among the other multifunctional keys from your lofree keyboard. 

Not only does it looks great on your desk, the lofree keyboard is designed to be portable and compact. Want to finish some work in a cafe? Why not bring your favorite keyboard along.

We went through more than 10 iterations to come up with the final version of the keycaps. The keycaps is what makes the lofree keyboard unique. Spherical round keycaps designed for your fingers.

After trying out five different switches, we choose for Gateron Blue switches to make the mechanical keyboard sounds like your retro typewriter. Nostalgia in a modern coat.

Do you work with multiple devices at once? With lofree you can connect up to 3 different devices. And easily switch between them with a quick switch on the keyboard.

Lofree is compatible with Mac/Windows. It can also connect to your iOS and Android phone, which makes typing emails on your desk so much easier.

Lofree features three different backlit settings. Whether you’re working in the dark and want to adjust use the full backlit or you just want the letters to be visible, this can be done with a press of a button.

Although lofree got more than 4 times more battery than a normal keyboard, we optimized the battery duration even longer with the auto-sleep mode.

After prototyping different angles of the keyboard, the 6 degree angle gives you increased stability, more comfort and precision.

  • Number of Keys: 78 (Mechanical Switch)
  • Number of Multimedia Keys: 12
  • Main Body Material: PC
  • Keycap Material: PC and ABS
  • Backlit: White LED
  • Battery: 4,000mAh Li-ion Rechargeable Battery
  • Bluetooth Working Time (Backlit Off): Around 6 months (Single Charge)
  • Bluetooth Working Time (Backlit 40%): Around 3 weeks (Single Charge)
  • Bluetooth Working Time (Backlit 70%): Around 2 weeks (Single Charge)
  • Bluetooth Working Time (Backlit 100%): Around 1 week (Single Charge)
  • Charging Time: Around 5 hrs (USB 3.0)
  • Charging Port: Micro USB
  • Mode: Bluetooth/Cable
  • Bluetooth Operating Distance: Up To 10m (Open Space)
  • Bluetooth Device Name: DOT@LOFREE
  • Size: 296.6*144.5*30.6mm
  • Weight: ~800g
  • Operating Environment: -10 to 50℃

IN THE BOX:

  • Lofree Bluetooth Mechanical Keyboard * 1
  • USB Cable * 1
  • Package * 1
  • User Guide * 1

 

 

Half assembled lofree keyboards

half assembled lofree keyboards (during trial manufacturing)

Keycaps ready to be used

These were the units which were sent to the media (packaging is already complete)

 

When you combine love and free, you get lofree. We all come from a designer's background - as reflected in our product. We dedicate ourselves to keep the most sophisticated product simple and elegant, in order to benefit and reach more people. We push boundaries in product design and have won several Red Dot and iF design awards. We love the way of life. This is lofree.

Before we launched - you helped us choose a color for our keyboard. You helped us push through dark times when we thought of giving up! Right now we’re stuck before the mass production phase of the lofree keyboard because it requires a significant amount of money.


We believe crowdfunding is a good way to raise money to go into mass production and to showcase our product to the world. In return, we offer discounted rates for our product for the people that believes in us.

Will you offer a specific region keycaps layout?

As it requires a considered amount of capital to offer different layouts, we're planning to do this later, after the campaign. You'll be able to buy other regions keycap layout them at a lower price. 

How long does the keyboard last on a single charge?

This highly depends on the backlit settings;

Backlit off, normal use: ~6 months

Backlit at 40%, normal use: ~3 weeks

Backlit at 70%, normal use: ~2 weeks

Backlit at 100%, normal use: ~1 week

If it's low on battery, the usbport LED indicator will blink rapidly. You can recharge with the supplied microUSB cable. 

Do you offer more colors?

Right now we're in talking with our manufacturer to offer more colors. We currently have no timeline on when the negotiations end, but we're trying our best.

Will we offer different color keycaps?

We'll offer this after our campaign. We're currently only selling the keyboard (with the standard black keycaps).

The layout looks very different from other keyboards, why is that?

We've poured our heart and soul in the design of the keyboard. This is what makes lofree unique. The layout takes a bit longer to get used to it than other keyboards.

How many devices lofree can pair at once?

In total 3 devices, and quick switch between them with fn+1, fn+2, fn+3.

Why is the shipping cost free for US and $19 for other countries?

We'll bundle all the orders from US in one shipment [to the US]. Then we'll send it to the customers. In EU and other countries there are different regulations, and according to our shipping company we cannot do that. 

Do I have to pay VAT and duty?

We'll try our best to avoid duty and VAT. However we cannot reassure that you won't pay VAT and duty.

story:
MemoNote is a revolutionary digital e-writer. It is exquisitely designed with the five major functions you would need for your day to day activities namely; E-Writer Tablet, Power Bank, private notebook, reading light, and card holder.

MemoNote allows you to preserve your thoughts instantly with its innovative dual writing mode. You can jot down ideas on the LCD writing tablet on the left and organize them on the paper on the right.

MemoNote is more than just a notebook. It simply gives you a passionate and creative experience with all its special features.

Make every creation an enjoyable experience from start to finish.

The 10.2 inch LCD Writing Tablet interface enables you to draw creative sketches, take unlimited notes, and it is your perfect tool for efficient communication. You can easily unleash your crazy ideas and nature by doodling with it. You can also translate and record your ideas in writing or sketches and share with others. You can make a to-do-list on MemoNote and start to organize your schedule right away!.

In addition, MemoNote’s paper notebook helps preserve treasured memories, daily activities and can also serve as a travel journal.

MemoNote was professionally developed and designed by writing enthusiasts and paper and pen experts. After a thorough research and series of analysis, we were able to come up with a special feature that makes writing on the digital screen feel the same as writing directly on the paper. With the aid of the stylus pen, you can write fluidly on the LCD writing screen and highlight texts easily. This superior technology enables you to write smoothly without any lag or disruption. Also, the LCD writing screen is gentle on the eyes.

You can endlessly use the tablet without running out of storage. It is perfect as a scratch & sketch paper. No matter taking a phone number in emergency or just doodling, using your tablet to spread your mind and save paper. You can delete anything with a simple press on Del button.

However if you accidently touch the screen, don't worry. The "Everhold" tech feature of the E-Writer tablet will hold your writing for as long as you desire.

We all deserve privacy and that was why we added an advanced motion lock feature to help protect your MemoNote. You can use MemoNote to store your diary, passwords and other private information. Our motion launch lock offers more than 10000 different sets to protect your privacy.

Memonote has an integrated light which can be switched on and off in just a jiffy. Whether you are on a night flight or in a dim living room, you can proceed with reading and writing under its moderate light without distracting others.

MemoNote features a built-in 7000mAh power bank that can charge iPhone XS Max 2 times, iPhone XS 2.5 times, Samsung Galaxy Note 9 2 times, and also provide power for the lock and light. The power bank is slim and hidden just behind the E-writer tablet, keeping the entire footprint of the MemoNote compact.

With MemoNote Digital E-writer, you can scan your work with your phone or take a picture and upload it to Cloud, Evernote, OneNote, Dropbox, and more. Your meeting notes, masterpieces, and documents will now be manageable and shareable.You are fully secured!

MemoNote is the ultimate tool for work and study. Loaded with tons of features, MemoNote weighs only 19oz (550g) as much as a regular notebook. MemoNote is an essential you need to have, whether on your office desk or in your bag. It basically makes life simpler and more organized!

Constructed with durable premium parts, MemoNote is built to last for years. The notebook is also replaceable, meaning you can insert another A5 size notebook or planner and continue using for years!

Lepow International LLC. is a leading electronic manufacturer established in 2011 in Hong kong, China, which started its branch in the United States in 2013. Its crowd funding campaign of Memomate – an E-writer tablet – achieved great success in 2018. Lepow is dedicated to delivering high-end smart mobile accessories and top-notch user experiences to its worldwide customers. Lepow’s portable charger has won the Red Dot Design Concept Award and the CES Innovation Awards HONOREE. Comprised of a team of experts, Lepow will continue to provide second to none products and customer services for all our customers across the globe!

Sample Test

story:
FRANÇAIS

 

THE PROBLEM

Your information is stored in the cloud in its entirety with one storage provider. None of the existing security measures can fully protect your data from the weaknesses of this one-to-one relationship.

 

 

OUR SOLUTION 

The VoD2 solution scrambles your data before it leaves your device or your network and splits it into meaningless slices that are then sent to different storage providers. No storage provider has the entirety of your data nor can it read the slice it has in storage.

 

 

PEACE OF MIND 

In addition, should anything happen to any of the storage locations used (intrusion, breach, outage, etc.) the VoD2 solution will regenerate your original data using the remaining available slices.

 

 

SOME FACTS...

 

The number of devices (PCs, tablets, smart phones, etc.) will reach 4 billion by 2015, of which smart phones will represent half.

 

 

 

There will be an estimated 625 million personal users of cloud storage by the end of 2013.  Furthermore, projections indicate this number will grow to 1.2 billion by 2017!

 

 

It is shown that 30 to 40 percent of cloud storage users consider security of their intellectual property and privacy of their data as their primary concern (Deloitte & Charlie Osborne). 

 

   

FAQ


1. What is VoD2?

VoD2 is a cloud storage security solution that provides effective and comprehensive privacy and information protection. It does not offer cloud storage, but secures your data being stored, from the moment it leaves your device or your network, for as long as it is stored in the cloud.

 

2. How does the VoD2 solution work?

The VoD2 solution scrambles your data before it leaves your device and splits it into at least three slices that are totally unreadable. These three slices are sent to three different cloud storage providers, so that none of them have the entirety of your data, nor can they read the slice they are storing. Vod2 performs the reverse operation, whenever and wherever you want to access your data. Should any problem arise at a storage provider’s data center, VoD2 will still be able to recreate your original data with the remaining slices.

 

3. Why is VoD2 a better security solution?

Because VoD2 scrambles your data and splits it at the point of origin, it makes it practically impossible for anyone, including any cloud storage provider, to read or access your information once it is stored in the cloud. In addition, the VoD2 solution does not burden your files with overhead due to additional security measures put on by other providers. Finally it protects you from being totally dependent on any single storage provider.

 

STILL HAVE QUESTIONS? 

GO TO VoD2.com

  

________________________________________________________________________________

 

ENGLISH

 

 

LE PROBLÈME

Votre information est stockée dans le nuage dans son entièreté avec un seul fournisseur de stockage. Aucune des mesures de sécurité existantes ne peut vous protéger complètement contre la faiblesse de cette relation un-pour-un.

 

NOTRE SOLUTION 

La solution VoD2 brouille vos données avant qu’elles ne quittent votre appareil ou votre réseau et les sépare en tranches totalement illisibles qui sont transmises à différents fournisseurs de stockage. Aucun d’eux n’a l’entièreté de votre information ni ne peut lire la tranche qu’il a en stockage.

 

 

LA PAIX D’ESPRIT 

De plus, s’il arrivait quoique ce soit à l’un des sites de stockage utilisés (intrusion, bris, panne, etc.), la solution VoD2 régénèrera vos données d’origine en utilisant seulement les tranches disponibles.

 

  

QUELQUES FAITS…

 

Le nombre d’appareils (PCs, tablettes, téléphones intelligents, etc.) atteindra 4 milliard d’ici 2015 dont la moitié sera des téléphones intelligents.

 

 

 

Il y aura environ 625 millions d’utilisateurs personnel du stockage dans le nuage d’ici la fin 2013.  De plus les prévisions indiquent que ce nombre va croître à 1.2 milliard en 2017!

 

 

Il appert que 30 à 40 pour cent des utilisateurs du stockage dans le nuage considèrent que la sécurité de leur propriété intellectuelle et la confidentialité de leurs données constituent leur principal souci (Deloitte & Charlie Osborne). 

 

 

 FAQ

 

1. Qu’est ce que VoD2?

VoD2 est une solution de sécurité pour le stockage dans le nuage.qui fournit une protection complète et efficace de l’information et de la vie privée. VoD2 n’offre pas de stockage mais protège vos données stockées à partir du moment ou elles quittent votre appareil ou votre réseau et tant qu’elles restent stockées dans le nuage.

 

2. Comment fonctionne la solution VoD2?

La solution VoD2 brouille vos données avant qu’elles ne quittent votre appareil et les sépare en au moins trois tranches aléatoires et totalement illisibles. Ces trois tranches sont envoyées chez trois fournisseurs de stockage différents afin qu’aucun d’eux n’est l’entièreté de vos données ni ne puisse lire la tranche qu’il détient. Vod2 effectue l’opération inverse ou et quand vous avez besoin d’accéder à vos données. S’il y avait un problème à un des centre de données d’un des fournisseurs de stockage, VoD2 sera quand même en mesure de régénérer vos données originales à partir des tranches restantes.

 

3. Pourquoi VoD2 est une meilleure solution de sécurité?

Parce que VoD2 brouille vos données et les séparent au point d’origine, cela rend presque impossible pour qui que ce soit, incluant les fournisseurs de stockage, de lire ou d’accéder votre information une fois stockée dans le nuage. De plus, la solution VoD2 n’alourdit pas vos fichiers avec des données additionnelles que nécessitent les mesures de sécurité rajoutées par les autres fournisseurs. Aussi, avec VoD2, vous n'êtes plus dépendant d'un seul fournisseur de stockage pour la sécurité de votre information.

 

D'AUTRES QUESTIONS? 

VISITEZ VoD2.com

 

________________________________________________________________________________

De plus, s’il arrivait quoique ce soit à l’un des sites de stockage utilisés (intrusion, bris, panne, etc.), la solution VoD2 régénèrera vos données d’origine en utilisant seulement les tranches disponibles.
 
  
QUELQUES FAITS…
 
Le nombre d’appareils (PCs, tablettes, téléphones intelligents, etc.) atteindra 4 milliard d’ici 2015 dont la moitié sera des téléphones intelligents.
 
 
 
Il y aura environ 625 millions d’utilisateurs personnel du stockage dans le nuage d’ici la fin 2013.  De plus les prévisions indiquent que ce nombre va croître à 1.2 milliard en 2017!
 

 
Il appert que 30 à 40 pour cent des utilisateurs du stockage dans le nuage considèrent que la sécurité de leur propriété intellectuelle et la confidentialité de leurs données constituent leur principal souci (Deloitte & Charlie Osborne). 
 

 
 FAQ
 
1. Qu’est ce que VoD2?
VoD2 est une solution de sécurité pour le stockage dans le nuage.qui fournit une protection complète et efficace de l’information et de la vie privée. VoD2 n’offre pas de stockage mais protège vos données stockées à partir du moment ou elles quittent votre appareil ou votre réseau et tant qu’elles restent stockées dans le nuage.
 
2. Comment fonctionne la solution VoD2?
La solution VoD2 brouille vos données avant qu’elles ne quittent votre appareil et les sépare en au moins trois tranches aléatoires et totalement illisibles. Ces trois tranches sont envoyées chez trois fournisseurs de stockage différents afin qu’aucun d’eux n’est l’entièreté de vos données ni ne puisse lire la tranche qu’il détient. Vod2 effectue l’opération inverse ou et quand vous avez besoin d’accéder à vos données. S’il y avait un problème à un des centre de données d’un des fournisseurs de stockage, VoD2 sera quand même en mesure de régénérer vos données originales à partir des tranches restantes.
 
3. Pourquoi VoD2 est une meilleure solution de sécurité?
Parce que VoD2 brouille vos données et les séparent au point d’origine, cela rend presque impossible pour qui que ce soit, incluant les fournisseurs de stockage, de lire ou d’accéder votre information une fois stockée dans le nuage. De plus, la solution VoD2 n’alourdit pas vos fichiers avec des données additionnelles que nécessitent les mesures de sécurité rajoutées par les autres fournisseurs. Aussi, avec VoD2, vous n'êtes plus dépendant d'un seul fournisseur de stockage pour la sécurité de votre information.
 
D'AUTRES QUESTIONS? 
VISITEZ VoD2.com

 
________________________________________________________________________________

story:
Greetings!

Thank you for reviewing our lab report as we hope it will help us get a grant for more research and experiments!

Here at Naughty Dog Laboratories, we are working to bring you the finest fantasy products for all your bedroom needs.

The other scientist and I have been in special effects for the past 5 year, gaining tons of knowledge of the way things are done, but we were wanting to push our talents into another area, less familiar territory if you will, and thus our toy adventure began!

With your help, we hope to contribute not only high quality products but rather interesting designs as well.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to bring you the next line of awesome fantasy, we are hoping to raise $2,500.
This money will be going towards buying materials to start producing our products, as well as going towards to help expand our product line.

We will be offering affordable perks for your generous donation to advance our research, Anything from $5 off to helping us CREATE a design from your own ideas and/or designs!

However, if we are not able to raise the funds we need, whatever funds we do get will go towards helping people obtain their perks. We promised you perks, you'll be getting perks!
 

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize everybody can't contribute to our cause, but we do ask for a signal bost!
Please send this along to friends who might be interested!
Thank you so very much!

-Naughty Dog Lab Team

story:
Print mobile, wherever you are! PPrintee offers you the opportunity to print from everywhere and on any paper format!

Students, writers, architects, designers, engineers, executives, artists and those of you who are always on the go, please welcome PPrintee!  Enjoy great printing features, no matter where you are! 


       

Did you ever need to print an essay, a business card, a CV, a strip of paper, a blueprint, a contract, a train ticket or simply an envelope sticker?

You no longer need to search for a print shop or to get to your office or to your school to have your documents printed. The new generation of pocket printers is here! PPrintee is an intelligent high-tech printer that self-drives on paper, while analyzing the printing surface.


It is designed to work with all paper formats and it offers the same quality standards as an advanced desk printer. And what is most important, PPrintee fits perfectly in your bag or in your pocket. 

PPrintee is itself free, mobile and easy to use. Just place it close to a paper, send a print order via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi and watch it while PPrintee does its job.

The process is very simple. PPrintee gets to work as soon as a print order is received. It literally moves on the paper, seizing its edges, it positions itself and then it starts printing. If several papers are need to be printed, PPrintee tells you to change the paper or it searches for another blank paper nearby. 

It’s fun, it’s fast and it’s easy to use. 

This amazing device generates fluid movements that are perfectly synchronized with the speed of printing. Thanks to an advanced motion system that works closely with a pair of integrated scanning modules, PPrintee performs fully coordinated movements during the entire printing process.

PPrintee takes autonomous decisions. But don’t worry! It won’t go crazy! PPrintee takes only clever decisions! It is endowed with intelligent feed-back functions which allow the user to understand and learn everything about the way it moves.

Thanks to a real-time automatic feedback process, PPrintee auto-analyses every single action performed during a printing activity. It searches for the paper’s edges by driving itself on the printing surface. Then it finds the correct positioning for printing and afterwards it fulfils the printing task.  



Because fast printing and quality printing, wherever you need them, are both equally important to you.

Because it’s small, it fits in your pocket and it offers great printing features.

Because you like to be free. Because you have ideas that must take shape as fast as possible, no matter your location. Because you will most assuredly have new ideas and projects that you would not possibly envisage without the PPrintee. 


Yes! It can print on every possible paper format: from  stickers, business cards, envelopes, A4, A3, A2, A1, A0 to all non-standard paper formats, such as long paper strips or large formats that are usually printed by plotters. PPrintee has no limits; it works with all of them.

You don’t even need to know exactly what paper format you are using. PPrintee explores the paper’s edges and lets you know the size of the paper that is going to be printed.

However, if you want to configure a certain paper format, you can choose to do so from the printer’s menu or, directly, from your phone via the PPrintee app. In this case, PPrintee simply finds the right positioning for printing and it starts printing. 

Connect two or more PPrintees for the same printing task. They will automatically sync and coordinate each other during the entire printing activity.

PPrintee addicted and creative professionals, PPrintee will make your day! It provides you with fast, high quality printing wherever you are. When you see these wonderful machines at work, you quickly understand that large and industrial printing has acquired a new meaning. 

If you are a more conservative person or you are still living the typewriters’ nostalgia, you’ll simply love PPrintee. You can print as you type: word-by-word or row-by-row, depending on the way you configure it.

You type, and PPrintee prints. You stop and it stops. You hesitate and PPrintee waits for you. You will experience the great feeling of writing on the spot as if it were with a typewriter. 

More than all the above, PPrintee has a screen that performs different tasks: it provides you with a printing’s outcome, it plans its movements and it updates itself.

If it’s in stand-by and it’s connected to Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, it can show you your favorite news, time and weather or your last Facebook news. Of course, you can configure all this manually, but you can also give PPrintee the opportunity to choose them for you.


PPrintee might also ask you questions and start moving when it’s happy. And you’d better answer its questions, as you do not intend to have an angry PPrintee nearby.

If it’s turned on, but inactive for a long period, PPrintee moves on the paper, it vibrates or it asks you politely to print or go away. ☺

So don’t make PPrintee angry and don’t leave it inactive …The result might be dramatically funny for you!

 

Further steps: to develop and test PPrintee’s full mechanics composed of wheels and mobile cylinders that can turn at 360 degrees and allow the object to have different positions on the surface it operates; and to integrate the scanning modules that assure the self-positioning and the real-time feedback during printing.  


                                          


                     


         

    



We imagined different ways to print mobile and we designed a high-tech intelligent mobile printer that can fit in your pocket.

We wanted to capture fast, mobile and high-quality printing in one single device; and this is how we have come up with PPrintee.


This is how it works. PPrintee moves on paper, it searches for the paper’s edges, it positions; afterwards it starts printing.  PPrintee analyses both its position in space and the printing surface. It is able to find the paper and to explore its format. It has two integrated scanning modules that assure a real-time synchronisation between the printing process and its movement on paper. 


These two scanning modules are PPrintee’s eyes. They see, while the printer thinks. They send feedback during the entire printing process and help PPrintee take decisions and correct its actions.

The print head moves fast enough to obtain a high fluidity in printing the paper. Behind PPrintee’s fluid movements, there is an advanced mechanics of wheels and mobile cylinders, both activated by micro-engines.



The wheels can make a 360 degrees turn and they can also go out or retreat inside the cylinder. And this is how PPrintee is able to lift or to lower its position.

In the searching paper position, the wheels are largely outside the device, providing a flexible movement.


In the printing position, the wheels are only a little bit outside the device, allowing the print head to smoothly touch the paper and to coordinate the printing with the printer’s movement.

PPrintee's ink cartridges are designed in such a way that they can be easily refilled and also environmentally friendly. For the monochrome prototype, they can last up to 200 pages. You will also find them on the market together with the serial production of PPrintees. 




PPrintee's team is passionate end enthusiastic about high technology. We all give value to innovative and futuristic ideas. So far, we have received great feedback on this clever pocket printer from engineers and technological enthusiasts in US, France and Germany and, thus, we have already applied for an international and US patent. We have also been offered partnership opportunities from several local and international manufacturing companies. Therefore new partnerships are envisaged. 


Do you have a prototype?

We are working on it.  We have tested important elements of the product design, as well as the mobility and the printing functionalities. We will use the funds to manufacture the final PPrintee Prototype, including the development of both its firmware and software, and to launch the serial production. You will be able to see photos and videos of this whole process in our campaign's updates and on our website www.pprintee.com. Join the PPrintee Community and share your ideas! 

Who are you? How did you come up with this idea?

We are a team of enthusiastic creative minds, engineers, technicians and entrepreneurs. One day in August 2013, as we were discussing our professional needs, we came up with this wonderful idea: to make printing mobile and thus open infinite possibilities for the printing process in particular and visual arts in general.

How can I participate in this project? How can I join the PPrintee Community?

You can support our project on Indiegogo. We offer a lot of cool stuff in exchange of your contribution!

You can also support us by following our website and the PPrintee Facebook Page, by telling your friends about our project and by being in contact with other PPrintee Community Members. Please feel free to exchange ideas with us and share your thoughts on PPrintee. We welcome any kind of feed-back. Soon, we will print mobile.

Does PPrintee print in color? 

Not yet. The first PPrintee will be a monochrome one, printing only black & white. But be patient. We will also develop the colour PPrintee.

Where can I buy a cartridge? How do I replace a cartridge?

PPrintee’s cartridges are environmentally friendly ink cartridges, specially designed to be easily refilled or replaced. You can buy them from us or from our retailers as soon as the PPrintee serial production is on the market.

How long will black & white cartridges last?

We are trying to fit a cartridge that contains enough ink to print exactly like a desk inkjet printer. We have estimated an approximate of 150 – 200 pages (A4) per cartridge.

How can I print on several consecutive pages?

It depends on how you configure the printer. PPrintee can both stop after each page and tell you to change the paper or it can look for another blank page available near the already printed one and continue the printing task.

When do you build the printer?

Check our timeline in order to find all the necessary information. We hope to start manufacturing PPrintee within a year. The campaign’s page and our website www.pprintee.com will keep you up to date with the entire process.

Will you provide any warranty for the product?

We will observe all international and US regulations.


When we designed PPrintee, we took in consideration all its micro-parts and their exact placement inside and we will do our best to make the product look and work exactly as we present it!

However, you need to be aware that changes might occur during final tests or that some features might not be available right away. The Engineering part is the toughest one. We will always keep you posted on our advances and let you know how the final prototype will look like.

Last but not least, we would really appreciate all your thoughts about the product, they way it looks as well as about its functionality. If you have some suggestions, don't hesitate to share them with us. 

Let's co-build PPrintee! 

In the near future, we take into consideration the development of a colour printer  with an integrated scanner. 


Share your ideas with us and share this project. Speak about PPrintee and  support us on this journey.

Let's build PPrintee together!

Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

What is buyago?  buyago is the first mobile app of its kind and will be created for all the major app stores. buyago was designed with real people in mind. It was created to provide business level services to individual buyers and sellers with available tools not available in any one app. It just might be the only tool you ever need when buying and selling automobiles, so whether you are a buyer or seller, It will be a fully stand alone website and APP similar to CARS.com and Auto-Trader.com with features they severely lack making every sale look like a fortune 500 company transaction.

This app will completely revolutionise the way we now buy and sell automobiles no longer will you have to spend your entire day at a dealership pretending to read those years old magazines while sitting in their lobby and drinking the horrid coffee. buyago will eliminate the painful experience we have all encountered while buying or selling a vehicle by providing almost everything required to complete a transaction.

  • Buying a used car can be a dreaded task but what is worse than buying a car used? Buying a used car from a total stranger with little knowledge about whom you are buying from or worse having insufficient details on an item you are about to spend a great deal of your hard earned money on  is no easy task.   Sure, craigslist is a terrific search option, however, recent news reports about the dangers of such blind transactions made me realize recently that I was just one step away from something horrific happening when I had to view vehicles I had seen on Craigslist in person. 


My name is Dino  an Entrepreneur proud nerd and a father whom is obsessed with safety and efficiency and I am delighted to present you with a smoother way to handle these pesky transactions. I came up with the idea for this app after enduring a horrific experience recently attempting to purchase a "new" used car.  I decided to utilize Craigslist as my primary search tool. The search was nauseatingly painful-not just the hours spent combing through vehicle after vehicle,  but visits to view the autos in person proved resulted in more chaos and disappointment than anticipated. Therefore I ask for your assistance in making this search tool a reality.

This groundbreaking app will radically reinvent how vehicles are bought and sold by making the process infinitely easier and providing tools never before available for this sort of transaction. The app will be geared towards the buying and selling of automobiles but it will be unlike anything now available on the market. The built-in features most of which will be free of charge, will require you to have just a smart phone and  id to complete a transaction in most cases and nothing else. And yes you read that correctly just a smartphone, tablet, and identification no other items required.(which will be essentially the only item required to take to complete a transaction). The phone will be your electronic Swiss Army knife- just a lot smarter. 

Contributions that are made whether financial or otherwise will be crucial to the birth and survival of this wonderful tool and may very well protect the life of someone we cherish.  This app will facilitate safer and smoother transactions between individual buyers and sellers with features that are not available on any one site on in any app. This all in one app will pretty much contain everything required to complete a secure purchase or a sale using just a smart phone.

App Features: GPS maps- easy photo snap and post-plus tons more tools making the process of buying and selling motor vehicles easier than ever before.

What We Need & What You Get

  • My funding target is $25000 which is required to assist in the creation publishing and promotion the app. 100% of your contributions will be used to create the app and service. 
    • $25 Support: Same as above plus a one-time 5%% discount off premium service
    • 100 Support: Two limited edition buyago shot glasses
    • $250 Support: App will be made available for evaluation by you plus a special edition coffee mug.
    • $500 Support You will receive a special limited edition buyago coffee mug with a 5% discount to premium app service
    • $2500 Support: Two special limited editions high quality buyago beer mugs with your name and a one-time 15% off premium services.

The Impact

The contributions you make will not only enable this service to be successful but it will also provide tools which will make the process of shopping or selling a vehicle exponentially easier than what is currently available.

  • Like many of you I have heard the reports of people being mugged and some enduring serious bodily harm just from attempting to do simple transactions offline.  buyago won't solve all the problems but it will certainly make it easier to conduct peer-peer sales and purchases the built-in features will make selling or buying a car a breeze. Your contributions will make my dream come through and provide a better reality for others to enjoy.

Risks & Challenges

My efforts to create app is not with-out challenges, but gladly I am prepared to take them on. A few of the challenges awaiting are the large corporations that are currently in this space in one way or the other, however, none of the current companies offer the level of sophisticated tools that will be available and the user experience which will surpass their offerings. What you will be contributing to is not just another app or service but way of buying an automobile with almost the ease of buying a cup of coffee.

Other Ways You Can Help

While funding is the intended goal that brought me here input beyond the tangible is also valued so once my app goes live I encourage your feedback to maintain and improve the quality of the service offered. I will also ask you to spread the word about this app everywhere possible, please utilise the Indiegogo share tools to engage others. Be a part of this revolution and let's do something special together.

Short Summary 
What is buyago?  buyago is the first mobile app of its kind and will be created for all the major app
stores. buyago was designed with real people in mind. It was created to
provide business level services to individual buyers and sellers with
available tools not available in any one app. It just might be the
only tool you ever need when buying and selling automobiles, so
whether you are a buyer or seller, It will be a fully stand alone website and APP similar to CARS.com and Auto-Trader.com with features they severely lack making every sale look like a fortune 500 company transaction. This app will completely revolutionise the way we now buy and sell automobiles no longer will you have to spend your entire day at a dealership pretending to read those years old magazines while sitting in their lobby and drinking the horrid coffee. buyago will eliminate the painful experience we have all encountered while buying or selling a vehicle by providing almost everything required to complete a transaction.
Buying a used car can be a dreaded task but what is worse than buying a car used? Buying a used car from a total stranger with little knowledge about whom you are buying from or worse having insufficient details on an item you are about to spend a great deal of your hard earned money on  is no easy task.   Sure, craigslist is a terrific search option, however, recent news reports about the dangers of such blind transactions made me realize recently that I was just one step away from something horrific happening when I had to view vehicles I had seen on Craigslist in person. My name is Dino  an Entrepreneur proud nerd and a father whom is obsessed with safety and efficiency and I am delighted to present you with a smoother way to handle these pesky transactions. I came up with the idea for this app after enduring a horrific experience recently attempting to purchase a "new" used car.  I decided to utilize Craigslist as my primary search tool. The search was
     nauseatingly painful-not just the hours spent combing through
     vehicle after vehicle,  but visits to view the autos in
     person proved resulted in more chaos and disappointment than anticipated. Therefore I ask for your assistance in making this search tool a reality.

This groundbreaking app will radically reinvent how vehicles are bought and sold by making the process infinitely easier and providing tools never before available for this sort of transaction. The app will be geared towards the buying and
selling of automobiles but it will be unlike anything now available on
the market. The built-in features most of which will be free of
charge, will require you to have just a smart phone and  id to complete a transaction in most cases and nothing else. And yes you read that correctly just a smartphone, tablet, and identification no other items required.(which will be essentially the only item required to take to complete
a transaction). The phone will be your electronic Swiss Army knife- just a lot
smarter. Contributions that are made
whether financial or otherwise will be crucial to the birth and survival
of this wonderful tool and may very well protect the life of someone we
cherish.  This app will facilitate safer and smoother transactions between
individual buyers and sellers with features that are not available on any one
site on in any app. This all in one app will pretty much contain
everything required to complete a secure purchase or a sale using just a
smart phone.

photo snap and post-plus tons more tools making the process of buying
and selling motor vehicles easier than ever before.

story:
Summary

PUBLIC Journal is the brainchild of a few passionate writers, designers, architects, and contractors. PUBLIC  Journal seeks to provide a larger voice for the public interest design movement, which brings light to the issues of humanitarian design, social impact projects, and community-based design organizations who are all working to leave the world a better place.  

The exploration of the greater good is why we have committed to providing a platform for this growing movement to reach a greater PUBLIC.


What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to expand the reach of the PUBLIC Journal voice. 

Your support potentially can provide you with:

  • Your own subscription to this wonderful new journal;
  • An opportunity to attend one of PUBLIC Journal's sponsored events.
  • An acknowledgement in the next issue of PUBLIC Journal!

The Impact

PUBLIC Journal reaches thousands of members within professional organizations such as the American Institute of Architect, the American Institute of Graphic Artists, and the American Institute of Architecture Students. We believe designers can have a great impact on the world, and here are some ideas how PUBLIC Journal can help:

  • Tens of thousands of designers graduate from college every year and PUBLIC Journal desires to be a voice to help influence the emerging professionals.
  • Over 100,000 professionals have the opportunity to learn how others are designing and helping nonprofits around the world.
  • Nonprofits and NGOs have the opportunity to voice their needs, desires, and accomplishments in order to help them expand their work for those in need around the world.


Risks & Challenges

Our team at PUBLIC Journal has self published Issue 1 & 2 with very little support. We currently have limited funds and need financial support in order to publish Issue 3. The publication of Issue 3 is a critical milestone for PUBLIC Journal to establish credibility with advertisers and corporate sponsors. The potential for this journal is great, and our readership could soon reach over 80,000 people with key distribution through professional design networks. We will not be able to continue this growth without financial support to cover printing, mailing, and design costs for Issue 3.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially you can still help spread the news of what we are up to by:

  • Liking us on Facebook and sharing our news: LIKE!
  • Follow us on Twitter: FOLLOW!
  • Read our stories on our website and share: PUBLIC JOURNAL!
  • Become an affiliate and/or provide a link on YOUR WEBSITE!

story:
STORY

This is a journey through chicken stock and language characters

 

ABOUT THE DIRECTOR

 

I love soup. I've always loved soup. Especially soup with letters in it. I like taking pictures of alphabet soup. 

With your help I can embark on a major motion picture experience of soup.

 

HOW YOUR MONEY HELPS

We have funding already. Your money will be used to acquire a beautiful property in rural Utah.

 

 

OUR CREW

 

OWEN LAZUR - Producer

He's got an upturned nose and baby-blue eyes. You can find him on the corner of Broadway and Astor anytime.

 

OLIVIA PETERS - Grocery Store

Olivia Peters is a Canadian

 

CAROLINE RUGO - Hello

Tisch Arts Scholar

 

YVES PASQUERLLI - Lens Crafters Associate Salesman

Yves Pasquarelli is a graduate of Tisch School of the arts and hopes to explore his ego as an artistic medium.

 

HOW YOU CAN HELP

you can help!

story:
The UltimateYou Planner is a tool for you to identify and achieve your biggest goals. Using tried-and-tested productivity techniques, the UltimateYou Planner is filled with ways to bring structure and success to your daily life. By intentionally planning and taking action, you can stay on track to reach those big goals you have created for yourself. 

With enough pages to be used daily for 6 months, this planner is a perfect length to make a big impact, without being so long that it feels overwhelming. All of the pages are left undated, allowing you to start anytime.   

**Fully funded through Kickstarter! We are already working to fulfil our first orders through Kickstarter and we can now accept new orders on our planner.** 
 

Photos showing the inside of the planner from a printed sample. 





The Ultimate Life Wheel gives you a snapshot of where you are and encourages you to grow within the 7 different areas of your life.
 

Create a 5-year plan and use the power of visualisation to help you to achieve your goals.
 


Map your key milestones on a 5 year roadmap.


Brainstorm all of your short and long term goals across the 7 life areas.
 


Track your key Focus Goals over the next 6 months.


The Action Plan pages are 2 full pages per goal so you can really dive deep and put a great plan in place.


Plan your key appointments throughout the month.


Check in and review your progress at the end of each month.

The Ultimate Week Page (left) allows you to track your habits and organise your week. The Ultimate Day Page (right) gives you space for your schedule, daily gratitudes, to-do list and more.

 

  • Size: A5 
  • 310 pages of high-quality paper (100GSM)
  • Beautiful design with rounded corners
  • Elastic strap to hold your planner securely closed
  • Flat pages - no awkwardly writing in the margins!
  • Made in Europe


We also have a beautiful 2021 Wall Calendar to help keep your year organised at a glance! 


 

Sometimes it’s true that life really does give you lemons, and it’s what you do with them that makes all the difference. 

In 2017 I moved from the UK to Germany to live with my now-fiancé. I found living and working in Germany challenging; I didn’t initially speak the language and I couldn’t find my place in the job market. After a couple of years working in roles that I didn’t find fulfilling, as well as a period of unemployment, I finally landed a job I loved in a leading tech start-up.

2020 started off great; I’d just started in my new role and my fiancé and I were busy planning our wedding in Tuscany. In one week in March, as COVID-19 hit Germany, I got made redundant from my job and we were forced to cancel our wedding. Everything I was excited about suddenly got taken away. 

I decided in that moment that I needed to turn all of these negatives into a very big positive and take control of my future.

I had dreamed of starting a business for years, and I didn’t want to delay this goal any longer. I have always had a huge passion for helping people to achieve their goals, and making them see that anything is possible with the right tools and knowledge.

I had already started sketches for a planner back in 2018. I revisited those sketches and combined them with all the knowledge I had from reading endless self-development books and several years spent working in the coaching industry with some of the world’s leading entrepreneurs. After many months of hard work, our first product was born: the UltimateYou Planner.

I’ve been working full-time on UltimateYou since March and it’s already been such an incredible journey. We’ve been funded, received some incredible testimonials, and been busy spreading the word on social media. Now we are excited to share it with you; we hope you love it as much as we do!

Think big, take risks, and create the life you’ve always wanted.

You are unstoppable.

The moment we finished our Kickstarter campaign! 



We have worked hard with different test groups to ensure our product is impactful and user-friendly. Read some of the reviews of our pre-released samples. 





Risks and challenges

The planner is 100% designed and ready to be printed. The two steps that remain between you and your UltimateYou Planner are the printing and the shipping.

Both of these could cause unforeseen delays. Printers can break down, people can get sick and things can go off schedule. Especially in times like these, it’s very hard to predict every little detail. We know sometimes things do go wrong, so please bear with us if we do experience any issues with these two final steps of the process.

We will be working really hard to deliver everything on schedule. To mitigate these risks, we have researched and planned as much as we possibly could. We have built a relationship with a reputable printing company in Europe who estimates that they will deliver the planners within 4 weeks of placing our order. We will work incredibly hard as soon as we receive the products to ship them out, so you get your copy in your hands as soon as possible.

If we do get a lot of orders, this could cause delays. If this is the case, we will bring in additional people to work with us on the shipping. We promise to keep you updated every step of the way! ✨
