story:
The new innovation for technology enthusiasts. This high-quality 3D laser scanning software offers a low-cost solution for mobile scanning.

Since 2009 under continuous development the new 3D laser scanning software InOSS enables users to generate detailed point clouds by using a G-Code based 3D printer and a mobile camera-laser-module.

What makes InOSS so special? Currently most commercial 3D scanning devices are desktop scanners. In contrast, the new scanning software InOSS offers the possibility to scan also bigger objects from various perspectives and at different distances. This is due to the very versatile and flexibly usable hardware consisting of scan unit (camera-laser-module) and separate scan axis. The data generated by InOSS can be further processed by third-party software for CAD or reproduction.

Another big benefit of the product is that the scan unit has to be calibrated only once! After that, no further calibration is necessary. Therefore the product represents a real innovation for technology enthusiasts. The alpha version is currently being revised and will soon be available as version 0.3.0.

This is how scanning works:


"Do it yourself" - simple assembly of the scan unit. The flexibly usable scan unit consists of a standard webcam and laser. These two components can be easily assembled by yourself. The calibration of the unit has only to be done once! (see calibration instructions below). After having finished assembly the unit can be directly installed to the 3D printer or to the separate axis. If it is installed to the printer it goes without saying the the size of the objects to be scanned depends on the capacity of the printer. Another convenient feature  is the fact that the scan unit as well as the axis can be produced by 3D printing.The according CAD data will be provided.

This is how assembly of the scan unit works:


Latest results. The current alpha version 0.2.1 already enables the user to completely scan objects and to generate a detailed point cloud.Integrated interfaces to the processing software MeshLab allow an efficient further processing of the point cloud, e.g. align (manual registration). There is hardly any other product on today's market offering such a flexible and cost-effective way to scan objects in three dimensions and in such a high quality.

Our targets / What do we need the money for. The alpha version is in a constant development process. Thanks to a further financial support we would be able to advance the software much more quickly and efficiently. This means in practical terms: besides the generation of a point cloud we would also be able to integrate a 3D registration (generation of a complete point cloud by connecting single 3D pictures), a surface solution as well as various filters in order to delete incorrect points. Additionally, we also aim to optimize the hardware components. Further financial support enables us to increase our manpower and to do a really successful development work.

This is what we offer in return. Anyone, who wants to support us, gets the current alpha version of the InOSS scanning software for a preferential price of 23,-  Euro. This price includes all update versions up to the final full version. Just to compare: After having finished the final version it will cost about 150,- Euro.

Risks. The only risk probably occurring is a delayed completion of development work due to a lack of time and manpower. So far as we can judge it now, this risk is rather unlikely to happen.

You want to get more information? Below please find answers to frequently asked questions.

Where do I get the free 30-day trial version?  You will find the trial version  in the download area of our website www.inpro-first.de

On which operating systems does the software run?  Currently InOSS runs on the operating systems Microsoft Windows XP,  Windows 7, Windows 8. 

Which type of camera should be used?  You can use any type of camera. Due to the simple assembly we recommend the type C270 of Logitech.The focus of the camera should be adjusted to approximately 150 mm.

Which type of laser should be used?  You can use every standard laser. For reasons of safety we recommend "laser class 1". Please read the safety instructions of the manufacturer before using the laser.

Where do I get the holding device for camera and laser?  You can produce the holding device yourself by 3D printing. The according 3D graphics have been designed for the camera Logitech C270. Thus there is no need for new designs. The printing data is offered in the download area of our website.

How to do calibration?

This is how calibration is to be done:


As regards the complete application time calibration has only to be done once!!
That's a great advantage. No further calibration has to be done, unless the module is damaged by dropping, external forces or the scans show any error.

If you have further questions or suggestions, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are looking forward to your e-mail.

story:
About Wisedog Team

Wisedog is a "Modular Design Area" located in central Greece, Larissa. Two and a half years ago, seven friends and co-workers decided to house their jobs and artistic skills-concerns under an abandoned for years building next to the Ancient Theater of Larissa. 1 Graphic-Web Designer, 1 Programmer, 3 Civil Engineers and 2 Coffee-Bar Experts transformed the place into a minimalistic design office, exhibition area, lobby that serves specialty beverages, conference room, music events and workshops area.
View our activity on www.wisedog.gr

 

What We Need & What You Get

We started this campaign in order to collect some funds for the first part of a calendar production and to see if you really like our calendar.

Wisedog 2017 calendar will be produced in 100 unique copies.
Its size is 70x100cm, perfect for a big, empty wall in your house, office or business.
Offset printing on a 300gr heavy special paper for the black parts and screen-printing with "glow in the dark" ink for the moon artwork.

Wisedog calendar will be sold at 20€ excluding shipping cost at the end of this campaign.
If you fund our first part production you will receive the calendar for 15€ excluding shipping cost. You will be the first person holding that calendar and also receive as, a thank you, one of the first 40 numbered copies of the 100.

 

Remember

Days on calendar are in Greek.

story:
What is KickFlows?

KickFlows is the social solution writers and musicians have been waiting for. Many writers and musicians are encountering the same issues - inspiration throughout the day, writer's block when they sit down to write. And here's something else: writing can feel lonely at times, even though we are fundamentally social beings. Isn't there a way to tap in to a social writing process when we want to, for feedback and inspiration? KickFlows helps solve these big creativity challenges!

 

KickFlows will keep your songs organized, give you access to cool writing tools, allow you to record those bits and pieces throughout the day. Not only will your writing process become easier and more continuous, but when you can decide when and how much to share with friends and fans via familiar social media functions!

Who needs KickFlows?

KickFlows is for anyone and everyone who enjoys writing their personal thoughts down. This app has the flexibility to be used as an electronic diary or journal, as well as a lyrics sharing device for musicians, poets and other creative writers.

 

No more restless nights wrestling with ideas and creative lines! No more forgetting the best lines you have ever thought of just because you were doing something else! Just KickFlow and express yourself!

How will KickFlows revolutionize the writing world?

- It will quadruple the creative output of the writing world

- It will democratize the creative process so everyone can be a better writer, singer, or poet

- The social media integration will get the best creative work out there faster and for higher accessibility  

- This app is for everyone of all ages and backgrounds

- A writer can record, find definitions, synonyms, antonyms, rhyming words and more!

- You can get feeds from other writers to help eliminate the most extreme case of writer's block

Why should you support KickFlows?

We are raising funds to successfully finish our web application as well as make it mobile.

 

How did KickFlows come to be?

We have taken KickFlows from a class project all the way to the biggest record label in the world. We are driven and motivated to create a home for writers and musicians. Our team shares this vision and passion for the project. All we need is you! There are
three ways to help. First, we need your network connections—recommend that a
friend have a look at KickFlows. Second, we need your feedback now and as we
put the product through beta. And of course, we need startup funds to grow our
KickFlows’ community to the millions of users we know it could reach. Let’s
make it happen and make an impact on writing and sharing forever.

story:
Why We Started a Small Campaign?

なぜ小さなクラウドファンディングを始めたか？

We are feeling crowdfunding campaigns are getting more professional and commercial. That's not bad. However we started to think instead of spending many hours and trying to make a big crowdfunding campaign to get funding for 500 - 1000 units production, it's better to start from a smaller campaign. 

In this way, we can develop and deliver development models at a reasonable buck to get feedbacks and have fun together by sharing the process to make a new type of product. So, we decided to not hire professionals to create a demo movie. Everything is made by ourselves to save the cost, and spend for development and production.

The original idea had started when we won a Hack Award at Yahoo Japan!'s hackathon event, "Hack Day". 

私たちはクラウドファンディングが少しずつより専門家や、商業的なものになってきていると感じています。それ自体は悪いことではありませんが、私たちは多数の時間と準備をかけて、達成ゴールが大きく、大量の支援、大量の製品の生産を前提としたキャンペーンを開始するよりも、まずは数十の方に開発モデルとして製品をお届けし、フィードバックをいただいたり、制作の過程を共有させていただく形で、より小さな規模のクラウドファンディングキャンペーンを始めたいと考えました。

そのためプロトタイプもまだまだ荒削りですが、デモの映像もプロを使わず、私たちで手作りで制作を行いました。

このhackfonという製品づくりは、今年のYahoo JapanによるHack Dayというイベントにて、Hack Awardを受賞したことから始まっています

So, what are we doing?

何をつくっているの？

We are making a device to hack an analog phone. Yes, an analog phone, not the latest smartphone. We made a device to connect to your phone and WiFi, and turn your phone to a remote to control IoT devices or Web services by just pushing phone buttons and dialing.

You can use your phone to order something like using Amazon Dash button or control IoT devices to turn on, off, change colors and do the actions you program. You can control web services too and we're working to make it work with IFTTT.

We will provide a dashboard to set a program to control IoT devices or web services by pushing buttons or by dialing.

hackfonは今やあまり使われなくなってきているアナログ電話をハックするデバイスです。そう、スマートフォンではなく、アナログ電話です！固定電話とWiFiをhackfonに接続することで、IoT機器やウェブサービスを、電話のボタンを押したり、ダイヤルすることでコントロールできるリモコンへと変えてしまいます。

Amazonダッシュボタンのように、何かを注文するように設定したり、HueライトなどのIoT機器を操作したりすることができます。またIFTTTやヤフーのmy Thingsなど、自動化のためのプログラムを実行するよう設定することもできます。

こうした設定を簡単に行えるように、ウェブ上でのダッシュボードを提供します。

Why Analog Phone?

なぜアナログ電話なの？

（A prototype of hackfon on right, and a case sample at center)

Now smartphone apps and smart speakers are popular devices to control IoT devices and web services. But they are sometimes, not so useful. To use the app, you have to find the app in your phone, then launch it, and control the app to do things. If someone else wants to control devices assigned to your phone, you also need to hand your phone to others. And smart speakers, you have to spppeeeeaakkk, then need to wait for the response.

With hackfon, you can just simply push the button, or make a dial to control and that's it. Analog phones are also cheap, and anybody can use it, so it's also good to share with others, to use as a remote in your house or in the office to control IoT devices and web services.

IoT機器の多くはスマホのアプリで操作することができます。また最近ではスマートスピーカーでも多くの操作ができるようになりました。しかしアプリの場合は、スマホの中にある多くのアプリの中から、使いたいアプリを探して、それを立ち上げ、そしてそれからアプリを操作しなくてはなりません。また自分のスマホに接続された機器を他の人が操作した場合には、自分のスマホを相手に手渡さなくてはいけません。スマートスピーカーも便利な反面、わざわざ話さないといけないのが億劫な場面もあります。

hackfonなら、ボタンを押したり、ダイヤルするだけ。またアナログ電話は安価で販売されており、お年寄りから子供まで誰でも簡単に扱うことができます。家庭やオフィスなどでIoT機器や、ウェブサービスを操作するリモコンとして共有するのに向いています。

Amazon Made a Device to Turn to a Phone, We Do Reverse

アマゾンは電話になるIoT機器を作りましたが、私たちは逆をします

 Amazon had announced a new echo device in Oct. 2017. The product named "echo connect" turns your Echo into a voice-controlled speakerphone. We do the reverse. We are turning analog phones to the latest smart devices.

There are always some trends in technology. Products tend to evolve along those trends but there are always different options and other possibilities to the development of new products. 

We are working to seek one of another possibility for technology evolvement with this product. And, you can utilize your old phone! If you have a nice design analog phone, it's a chance to revive it.

アマゾンは2017年10月にecho connectという新商品を発表しました。これはアマゾン社のEchoを音声コントロールできるスピーカーホンに変えてしまうというデバイス。私たちは逆に、アナログ電話をスマートデバイスへと変えます。

技術にはいつもトレンドが存在します。最近のスマートホンやスマートスピーカーにみられるように、そうした傾向にそって、製品は進化していく傾向があります。ですが、テクノロジーには常に他の可能性や進化の可能性もあります。

私たちは、そうした他には手がけていなけれど存在する別のテクノロジーの進化の道を模索してみたい、と考えこの製品を手がけました。

もし自宅に有効活用されていない古い電話機をお持ちでしたら、それを再活用するチャンスです。キャラクター電話や、素敵なデザインの電話機があれば、それを生き返らせてみましょう。

Making from Small Quantities

少量から生産をします

(Inside the factory of Jenesis corporation in ShenZhen, China)

 We don't know how many backs we will get by this campaign. We are thinking to start small, but if we get backs more than we expected, we may use a factory in ShenZhen, China. One of our company advisors is running a factory in ShenZhen, China, and doing hard quality check with Japanese standard.

If we get only few number of backs, don't worry, we will make them. Instead of making a high leap toward a big target, we just decided to make a smaller milestone below it since we had seen many struggles among hardware startups.

どのくらいの数の支援をいただけるかわかりませんが、私たちが想定していたよりも多くの支援を頂いた場合、中国の深センの工場での生産を予定してます。私たちの会社のアドバイザーにもなっていただいている日本人経営の中国の工場にて、高い品質管理の水準によって生産を行うことを考えています。

もし想定よりも少ない数の支援しかいただけなかった場合でも心配ありません。私たちが自ら生産を行います。高いターゲットのゴールを設定し、そこに向けて背伸びをしようとするよりも、今回はこのような形で小さなチャレンジを行うことにしました（そして世界各地でいろいろなハードウェアスタートアップが苦労しているのも目の当たりにして、このような試みで今回は始めてみることにしました）

Media Coverage | メディア掲載歴

fabcross.jp

"hackfonは、日本発のMOTTAINAI精神を実践すると同時に、スマートフォン操作の苦手な人が陥りがちなデジタルデバイド（情報格差）を解消するデバイスと言えるだろう"

story:
About

Designed for portability, MAGCON is intended to be a portable stationery item which fits in your notepad like a glove. Not only does it work great as a straight and curved metallic ruler, it is also a compass and a protractor. With a MAGCON in hand, you will be well-equipped to draw perfect circles and patterns effortlessly.

MAGCON is a highly portable multi-functional stationery item with many more handy capabilities than a traditional compass. It doesn't poke holes through paper as it has no sharp point, and yet is still stable enough to not move around thanks to the specially designed rolling base. 

 

MAGCON is an innovative pocket-sized drawing tool tailor-made for designers, artists, architects, journal enthusiasts, mandalas lovers, illustrators, tattoo artists,  students and creative professionals.

 

 

We are blessed to have invited many talented artists from around the world to try MAGCON on their artworks. From what we have heard, they are all beyond pleased with the results. These creative souls come from a wide span of places — including the USA, France, Canada, Russia, the Philippines, Spain, Norway, Croatia, Ireland, UK, Taiwan, Australia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Indonesia, New Zealand, Malaysia... etc.

 

Given MAGCON's unique additive design, new wings with exciting innovative features can be added in the future to suit a wide range of your needs.

The multi-functional wings are the cornerstone to the functionality of this product. You will have the flexibility to use whichever wing that meets your needs, whether to draw straight or curved lines, or angles. In this project, we are providing two wings for a variety of functions. Both wings are suitable for US letter / A4-sized paper sheets.

 

The first attachable wing is a reinvention of the traditional compass. It gives you the power to draw perfect circles, from radius 16mm to 80mm (holes are spaced at 4mm increments). It also doubles as a ruler, which enables you to draw straight lines, angles and beautiful arcs.

 

 

A longer version straight wing for drawing bigger circles, from radius 16mm to 140mm. 

The second wing gives designers the flexibility to draw beautiful curves and angles. Curved lines, arcs, ellipses, hexagons, and circles can be drawn from radius 18mm to 77mm.

Designers can choose either, or both, of these wings for their creations. Most of them prefer a combo to support their limitless creativity.

MAGCON is also a protractor for high-precision arcs.

 

 

MAGCON can be conveniently slotted into a notebook, making it the perfect little bookmark, which is also capable of drawing guide lines and circles. You can use the back side of the wing and book edge to assist faster drawing. 

MAGCON can hold pens of different sizes as long as the diameter is no bigger than 10.8mm. When placed on the desk, it can hold a pen as well as the wings. 

 

The holes can accommodate various cartridges of pens, pencils and markers. 

 

Here is a genuine leather pouch for everyday carry. It can carry up to two set of combo A.

It doesn't long enough to carry longer version straight wing.   

Here comes an interesting twist — did you know that MAGCON works wonderfully as a beer opener? 

To open beer bottles, we recommend using the aerospace aluminium or stainless steel wings since they are much sturdier than the aluminium ones.  

The central cylinder is made of stainless steel, while the two accompanying wings are made of aluminium with anodized finishing.

There are two other wing options for you to choose from if you want a more durable material, namely aerospace aluminium and stainless steel.

Need help choosing? Stainless steel is the strongest, most durable material out of the three options. Meanwhile, the aerospace aluminium package offers the best value of all.

Striving for the highest quality possible, we went through a meticulous, multi-stage prototyping phase.

At the beginning, we crafted the first batch of prototypes via 3D printing. Next, we used CNC machines to create the metal prototypes. After months of prototyping and testing (and many in-person trips to the manufacturing facilities), we gained enough confidence to pre-release some samples to talented artists in order to gauge user experience and feedback.

Both parts are CNC-machine made with high-precision measurements.  A laser created the marks on the ruler and protractor.

With a MAGCON in hand, you will be well-equipped to draw perfect circles and patterns effortlessly.


MAGCON is a highly portable multi-functional stationery item with many more handy capabilities than a traditional compass. It doesn't poke holes through paper as it has no sharp point, and yet is still stable enough to not move around thanks to the specially designed rolling base. 
 
MAGCON is an innovative pocket-sized drawing tool tailor-made for designers, artists, architects, journal enthusiasts, mandalas lovers, illustrators, tattoo artists,  students and creative professionals.  We are blessed to have invited many talented artists from around the world to try MAGCON on their artworks. From what we have heard, they are all beyond pleased with the results. These creative souls come from a wide span of places — including the USA, France, Canada, Russia, the Philippines, Spain, Norway, Croatia, Ireland, UK, Taiwan, Australia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Indonesia, New Zealand, Malaysia... etc. Given MAGCON's unique additive design, new wings with exciting innovative features can be added in the future to suit a wide range of your needs.The multi-functional wings are the cornerstone to the functionality of this product. You will have the flexibility to use whichever wing that meets your needs, whether to draw straight or curved lines, or angles. In this project, we are providing two wings for a variety of functions. Both wings are suitable for US letter / A4-sized paper sheets. The first attachable wing is a reinvention of the traditional compass. It gives you the power to draw perfect circles, from radius 16mm to 80mm (holes are spaced at 4mm increments). It also doubles as a ruler, which enables you to draw straight lines, angles and beautiful arcs.  A longer version straight wing for drawing bigger circles, from radius 16mm to 140mm. The second wing gives designers the flexibility to draw beautiful curves and angles. Curved lines, arcs, ellipses, hexagons, and circles can be drawn from radius 18mm to 77mm.Designers can choose either, or both, of these wings for their creations. Most of them prefer a combo to support their limitless creativity.MAGCON is also a protractor for high-precision arcs.  MAGCON can be conveniently slotted into a notebook, making it the perfect little bookmark, which is also capable of drawing guide lines and circles. You can use the back side of the wing and book edge to assist faster drawing. MAGCON can hold pens of different sizes as long as the diameter is no bigger than 10.8mm. When placed on the desk, it can hold a pen as well as the wings.  The holes can accommodate various cartridges of pens, pencils and markers.  Here is a genuine leather pouch for everyday carry. It can carry up to two set of combo A.It doesn't long enough to carry longer version straight wing.   Here comes an interesting twist — did you know that MAGCON works wonderfully as a beer opener? To open beer bottles, we recommend using the aerospace aluminium or stainless steel wings since they are much sturdier than the aluminium ones.  The central cylinder is made of stainless steel, while the two accompanying wings are made of aluminium with anodized finishing.There are two other wing options for you to choose from if you want a more durable material, namely aerospace aluminium and stainless steel.Need help choosing? Stainless steel is the strongest, most durable material out of the three options. Meanwhile, the aerospace aluminium package offers the best value of all.Striving for the highest quality possible, we went through a meticulous, multi-stage prototyping phase.At the beginning, we crafted the first batch of prototypes via 3D printing. Next, we used CNC machines to create the metal prototypes. After months of prototyping and testing (and many in-person trips to the manufacturing facilities), we gained enough confidence to pre-release some samples to talented artists in order to gauge user experience and feedback.Both parts are CNC-machine made with high-precision measurements.  A laser created the marks on the ruler and protractor.

story:
Thank you to our donors so far!
Companies which can not afford it, and the environment,
need your support!

For every 1 € donated,
edinn will donate 1 € more
in work time and licenses!

All our users, without exception, have reported a minimum of a 10% increase in their total efficiency, after 1 year of using the edinn system. 

Can you imagine how much money that is for the user, and how many tons of CO2 we are avoiding to emit?

With your donations, we will provide these benefits for free, to small and medium companies which can not afford the edinn system, to help them save their jobs, improve their economical strength and the environment.

There will be an impartial selection process, where all donors will vote which company to help and will receive a document with the results and their "thank you".


What is edinn?

Edinn is a web based software that helps any organization to achieve its maximum efficiency. 

It is really effective because it:

  • Monitors every person and machine.
  • Shows 100% detail of their inefficiencies, with certainty, in an easy, powerful and robust way.
  • Includes the main tools to reduce inefficiencies.

Total efficiency includes energy efficiency, but it is from 3, 10 or more times more protifable and beneficial for the environment than energy efficiency alone. To understand this, think on how inefficient it is to produce a product or service that is discarded because of a quality problem.

           

edinn is Affiliate Partner of EU's Climate KIC organization, 
the official tool of the Valencian Ford Automobile Cluster 
and of the Chilean National Exporters Association.

Edinn has been chosen by SMEs and multinationals from different countries, after comparing it with other solutions, and all of our users withouth exception have reported from 10% to 40% increase in their total efficiency, after 1 year of use.

Can you imagine the positive impact on the world's economy and environment, if every organization could see its inefficiencies in real time, with certainty, and 100% detail?

For more information please visit: http://edinn.com

For a specific presentation, please see: http://edinn.com/dwn/en/edinn_M2-en.pdf

The edinn solution in iPAD


Who we are?

We are a team of software developers and engineers, committed on the project of making organizations more efficient. The managing team is:


David Tronchoni: serial entrepreneur, 7 years developing edinn, he has developed with success other big software projects. For more info please see: http://www.linkedin.com/in/davidtronchoni


Javier Mateo: 5 years as project manager of edinn, he has developed with success the majority of the edinn projects. For more info please see: http://es.linkedin.com/pub/javier-mateo-garcia/17/389/329



Bernardo Martín: 4 years as software developer in edinn, he is in charge of some of the technologies behind it. For more info please see: http://es.linkedin.com/pub/bernardo-martin-garcia/20/236/a22


"We love what we do, we know it is positive because we speak with our users and they confirm us their benefits, and we know that with your help, we will get much further in the direction of making this world a better place, through a global efficiency increase."



edinn can be used from PCs, smartphones and tablets (HTML5 technology)


What do we need?

Your money will be invested in:

  • For donations: we will provide the edinn solution for free, to small and medium companies which can not afford it, to help them save their jobs, improve their economical strength and their environment.
  • Other: 1st) increase the product's scalability on the internet, in order to receive thousands of new organizations; 2nd) create an Android and iOS version; 3nd) new developments to atract new organizations.

Supporting edinn is safe, as:

  • The solution is already being used by users.
  • We are yearly audited.

For more information, please visit: http://edinn.com

What do you obtain?

You can choose from: 

  • Providing the edinn solution for free, to small and medium companies which can not afford it, to help them save their jobs, improve their economical strength and their environment.
  • Your name in the application "Donors" section: if you want, we will put your name for 1 year in the "Donors" section in the About of the application (today we have more than 1.000 frequent users!).
  • T-shirts and caps: to help you spread the efficiency importance.
  • On-Line edinn Starter Kit: everything you need to start with edinn, at no additional cost, served on-line and in less than 24 hours:
  • A fully operative edinn solution: put your organization in shape!
  • A part of our company: and, if you want, to share with you time and to show you our great city Valencia (more information on this aerial video and on this page).

Don't forget that your contribution will make this world a better place in terms of economy and environment.


Increase the efficiency of organizations, and promote it!


The impact:
BETTER ECONOMY
AND ENVIRONMENT!

Today edinn is probably one of the best solutions to increase efficiency. Your contribution will help us to make the world more efficient, that is, higher quality of life and sustainability.

Please note that by 2030, efficiency is predicted to be the single-largest source of energy. More info here: http://edinn.com/en/news/latest/efficiency-source-of-energy-by-2030.html


Other ways to participate

The world needs to know that being in the "path" to maximum efficiency is possible, and that it is happening today to real users! So please share!

Choose other ways to participate:

  • Benefit your organization from donations: If you think your company deserves to receive the edinn solution for free, please apply here. If you are concerned about confidentiality or about the name of your organization appearing as receptor, we will keep all names confidential during all the process.
  • Become a partner: edinn is today a good periodical income for many people. You can also do it, we will help you: http://edinn.com/en/partners.html
  • Share this campaign: please tell everyone about this campaign.
Any doubt? Want to know more? Please contact us.

Choose other ways to participate:


Benefit your organization from donations: If you think your company deserves to receive the edinn solution for free, please apply here. If you are concerned about confidentiality or about the name of your organization appearing as receptor, we will keep all names confidential during all the process.


Become a partner: edinn is today a good periodical income for many people. You can also do it, we will help you: http://edinn.com/en/partners.html

Share this campaign: please tell everyone about this campaign.

Any doubt? Want to know more? Please contact us.

story:
We are a new company that specializes in the development of Software as a Service products. Our mission is to make email marketing and newsletters available to everyone at realistic and affordable price with guarantee of delivery to the targeted inboxes.

Rainbow in the Cloud

Rainbow Carrier is a simple, fast and reliable tool for your application and marketing needs. Designed as an SMTP relay for reliable delivery of one or more email messages with detailed statistics of receipt, opening, clicks and social network sharing.

Currently there are a few quality services similar to this one out there, but they are too expensive for small companies or startups who want to save money in order to direct it to its core business. With low prices and various discounts for startups or small companies we can help them maximize their earnings to ensure better economic growth and greater competitiveness in the market.

Given that you are a possible contributors to this project, in any way, you also have a need for cheaper yet equally good service for sending email campaigns. The problem arose in the calculation of consumption of the same campaigns reaching up to several hundred dollars a month. Another problem is that you are maybe not a web designer and would like to have professionally designed emails for your business or personal web page or app. Now you have the opportunity, using just a couple of clicks you can design a complete email campaign, put together images, text and so on. What’s going on with your emails and what people do with them? ROI? Don't worry! We handle that too :)

Why we need your help

Raspberry PI x 48 cloud build - Development of this project is almost fully done and we are ready to start with testing but we need your help in order to ensure that our users receive the best service at the best price.

We are running this indiegogo crowd founding campaign to enable us to bulk purchase parts for the server chassis and 48 raspberry pi's with all needed equipment inside to achieve 1200 emails per second. Also we will be able to pay for marketing needs and servers colocation.

Further info on perks

Platinum @ - you can start some small business in the near future or if you already have one you can stay in contact with your customers and ensure that all of these customers come back to you and make a purchase, again :)

Cloud @ - You will have the opportunity to visit Croatia, a beautiful country with many natural beauties, lots of sun and sea and beautiful women (great for singles :)). For you we will arrange 7 days accommodation in a 4 or 5 star hotel at a location of your choosing Croatian coast.

If you need to add more emails, do not worry! We will a big discount for you because you are our first supporter and we value that very much :)

Other Ways You Can Help

You can visit our current web site / landing page and share it on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google+ and / or become a fan of our Facebook page, Twitter page, Google+ page. Every like and every share counts! Also you can apply for testing purposes :)

Thanks!

story:
Never feel like you forgot to lock the door on the way out because Riley's got your back. With the best in smart robotics technology, Riley allows you to bring your home with you whether you're away on business or just running a brief errand. Our trusted companion uses Wi-Fi connectivity to be utilized from any smart phone and can transmit live HD video and audio while in use. Riley can monitor the house for hours whether during the day or during shut eye. With Riley, now you really do have eyes in the back of your head. 

See Your Home Away From Home


Play with Your Kids

Riley can be controlled using any smart device from tablet to smart phones. Connect Riley to your WiFi hotspot and you are ready to monitor your house from wherever you are. (App available on iOS and Android)


Play with Your Pets

No matter where you are you will receive a notification on your smart phone as to what is happening in your home when you step out. 


Automatic Recharging

Coming equipped with smart technology, Riley knows when it's running low on battery. As long as it's within 1 meter away, simply aim Riley toward the docking station and select the dock feature. Riley will automatically move towards the docking station and dock itself. 


Featured On

------------ GET EXTRA SAVINGS WHEN YOU CONTRIBUTE NOW -------------

“Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed” 

Climb Up

Climb Slopes

Stand Up



Riley Vision

Your eyes away from home. View your home in great details. Riley Vision comprises of powerful 5 megapixel camera to guarantee crisp high definition picture that can be transmitted via WiFi. It even has night vision for monitoring in the dark!


Listen In and Talk

Riley is equipped with a microphone that picks up even the drop of a pin. This microphone works as an intercom if you are trying to reach someone on the other side of the house or even from out of town.


Pimp My Riley

Riley's proprietary treads also come in multiple colors to catch the eye of just about anyone. You can really make your own Riley stand out and become your own customized personal companion. Riley comes with "grippy belts" that allows it to travel on any surface in the house from wood floors to thick, shaggy carpets. This ensures smooth movement and stability throughout any terrain without getting stuck.



There are no individual parts that come off so no choking hazards for the kids or any friendly pets. Riley comes in a strong plastic that has smooth surface and extremely durable so it can definitely take a beating.

------------ CLICK HERE TO SELECT A PERK - Save up to 40% off ------------



What Our Previous Customers Say

Appbot V1 was launched a year ago and is available on Amazon. We've received a lot of feedback from our customers and we've taken all of the comments to heart. With the feedback and ideas, we wanted to bring you Riley.

Some of the feedback we've received includes doubling the battery life, increasing the megapixels of the camera, a larger and more stable wheel base and more! We want you to become a part of this journey by supporting this campaign and making Riley come to life!



------------------ Ready to back our project now? CLICK HERE! ------------------

Product Questions

Q: Can Appbot Riley send message alerts when motion is detected?
A: Yes Appbot Riley will send a text message alert and can save the image with on board memory.  Appbot Riley uses image processing for motion detection.

Q: How does Appbot Riley store photos and recordings?
A: Appbot Riley can store photos and images through the app.  When Riley is in detect mode, it can store up to 5 videos of 10 seconds.  At this time Riley does not support cloud storage.

Q: Can I connect to multiple Appbot Rileys from the same smart device?
A: Yes, you can connect to an unlimited amount of Appbot Rileys, but not at the same time.

Q: Is Appbot Riley waterproof? 
A: At this time Riley is not waterproof.

Q: Is Appbot Riley safe for my family?
A:  Yes, Appbot is ROHS/FCC/CE/JPMIC compliant.

Q: How long is the battery life?
A: Typical use of Appbot Riley will result in 1.5 hours of battery life.

Q: How long does it take to fully charge? 
A: Appbot Riley will take 4 hours to charge.

Q: Can I zoom in/out with Appbot Riley camera?
A: Yes, Riley supports digital zoom capabilities.

Q: What are the network securities in place?
A: We require a two-step password and video data also encoded for security.

Q: What is the voltage rating for the charging dock?
A: The voltage is 100-240v support.

Q: Can Appbot Riley be programmed to navigate on its own?
A: At this time, Appbot Riley does not have this capability, but plan on adding that in the future.

Q: Can I operate Appbot Riley from my PC desktop?
A: Not at this time.

Shipping/Order Questions

Q: Where will you be shipping from?
A: We will ship from Korea

Q: When can I expect my Appbot Riley to ship? 
A: We're planning to start shipping for all Appbot Riley perks on July 2016, but the exact shipping delivery date may vary.

Q: What is the warranty?
A: Appbot Riley comes with a 1 year warranty.

Q: Will I get charged right away if I pledge right now?
A: Your credit card or PayPal account will be charged immediately upon completing the checkout process, not at the end of the campaign.

Q: Can I still cancel my order?
A: Please refer to Indiegogo's policy here.


Thank You!

Thank you for taking the time to get to know Riley. We hope that you're just as excited as we are in bringing Riley to life. Your support is extremely valuable to us. If you have any questions, comments or feedback, please let us know through the comment section here, or by emailing us at crowdfund@appbot-riley.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible. :)



Risks and Challenges

This is Appbot Riley's first product launch on Indiegogo, but not our first product launch. We've already developed, launched, and delivered a successful Appbot V1 through traditional eCommerce like Amazon. Based on the feedback from our existing customers - we believe that the Indiegogo platform is well suited to provide us with input and feedback for our next design. We've answered all the improvements in our Appbot Riley design from the first version, and are looking toward Indiegogo to help us create the perfect Riley. With that in mind, some specifications may still change later in the campaign.

We estimate deliveries to begin in July 2016 and we will do our best to meet this deadline. If we encounter any delays, we will always make sure that we share this news with you.

Q: Will I get charged right away if I pledge right now?A: Your credit card or PayPal account will be charged immediately upon completing the checkout process, not at the end of the campaign. 
Q: Can I still cancel my order? A: Please refer to Indiegogo's policy here. 



Thank You!

Thank you for taking the time to get to know Riley. We hope that you're just as excited as we are in bringing Riley to life. Your support is extremely valuable to us. If you have any questions, comments or feedback, please let us know through the comment section here, or by emailing us at crowdfund@appbot-riley.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible. :) 




Risks and Challenges


This is Appbot Riley's first product launch on Indiegogo, but not our first product launch. We've already developed, launched, and delivered a successful Appbot V1 through traditional eCommerce like Amazon. Based on the feedback from our existing customers - we believe that the Indiegogo platform is well suited to provide us with input and feedback for our next design. We've answered all the improvements in our Appbot Riley design from the first version, and are looking toward Indiegogo to help us create the perfect Riley. With that in mind, some specifications may still change later in the campaign. 

We estimate deliveries to begin in July 2016 and we will do our best to meet this deadline. If we encounter any delays, we will always make sure that we share this news with you.

story:
Read in English   



Ajuda-nos a divulgar a cultura!

Durante os últimos três anos e meio dedicámos as nossas vidas a apoiar gratuitamente a divulgação das artes e da cultura em Portugal: são mais de 10.000 locais e promotores em base de dados, mais de 250.000 eventos promovidos e mais de um milhão de visualizações de página mensais...

Hoje somos nós que precisamos do vosso apoio: contribuam para a nossa campanha de crowdfunding e ajudem-nos a acabar de desenvolver a nossa aplicação móvel e a continuar a oferecer um serviço gratuito e de qualidade.

 


Como contribuir

Escolhe um dos escalões disponíveis no lado direito desta página (cada um tem as suas recompensas específicas) e contribui através do Paypal. Se não tens Paypal ou cartão de credito, ou se por alguma razão não o queres usar, podes contribuir na mesma com transferência bancária através do seguinte IBAN: PT50 0010 0000 5232 0470 0010 8. Envia-nos o teu nome, email, o valor da tua contribuição e a recompensa desejada para viral@viralagenda.com, de modo a nós introduzirmos esses dados aqui no IndieGogo para ficar tudo bem registado!








A app da Viral Agenda

Baseada na nossa plataforma web premiada internacionalmente, uma versão beta da aplicação móvel da Viral Agenda está já disponível gratuitamente para Android.

Completamente integrada com a plataforma web, esta permite que cidadãos e visitantes descubram o que se passa à sua volta, a qualquer hora e em qualquer lugar. Para além das opções de pesquisa de eventos já presentes na plataforma web, os utilizadores poderão definir o raio geográfico da sua pesquisa de modo a apenas visualizarem eventos que estão a acontecer nas suas imediações.

No futuro próximo, pretendemos lançar uma versão mais avançada da aplicação, que permita aos utilizadores seguir os seus locais, promotores e artistas favoritos, definir os seus tipos preferidos de eventos, e receber notificações e ofertas baseadas na sua localização e preferências pessoais.
Tendo reunido parte dos recursos que necessitamos para desenvolver a app da Viral Agenda, precisamos agora do teu apoio para acabar de a implementar. Com a tua ajuda conseguiremos lançar, durante os próximos meses, uma versão mais estável e avançada da aplicação, também para Apple iOS e Windows Phone.



O que recebes em troca?




Não podes contribuir? Espalha a palavra!

De momento não tens cashflow para contribuir? Ajuda-nos a espalhar a palavra, partilhando esta campanha com os teus amigos! Post it, tweet it, blog it, pin it...

❤  Se achas a VIRAL uma plataforma útil, dá-nos uma mão! ❤





Mais informação sobre a VIRAL 










ENGLISH

What’s happening?

For the past three years, VIRAL AGENDA has helped over a million culture lovers to find out what’s going on around them, contributing to the promotion of both big and small events across cultural fields.

Without any funding or investment, we worked hard to build what is currently the most complete, up-to-date and organised events guide in Portugal. It was a tempestuous journey full of obstacles and sleep deprivation, but we grew very fond of what we achieved and kept determined to take it to the next level.

The recent participation in a technological acceleration program made it possible to finally introduce revolutionary concepts such as “equipment”, “salaries” and “office”. This allowed for the refurbishing of our web platform and for the introduction of long-awaited features such as the event submission form. It also empowered us to start projecting our highly demanded mobile app.


Help us build the VIRAL AGENDA mobile app!

Having gathered part of the resources we need to build the VIRAL AGENDA App, we now need your support in order to finish its development. With your help, we can hopefully release a more stable version of the app for Apple iOS, Android andWindows Phone before the end of May. It will, of course, be available for free just like our web platform is.

Awards, recognitions and users' feedback have made it very clear that VIRAL is a useful platform that provides an essential service: since the beginning we have continuously received felicitation messages from a fantastic community of culture lovers and event promoters. Well… now we need your help.


The VIRAL AGENDA app

Based on our internationally awarded web platform, the VIRAL AGENDA App will be available for free for both Android and iPhone platforms. Completely integrated with its web counterpart, it will allow citizens and visitors to find out what’s going on around them anytime and anywhere. Besides the other filtering options already present at our web platform, users will be able to define the geographic radius of their search in order to only visualize events that are happening close by.

In the near future, users will also be able to follow their favourite venues, artists and event promoters, choose their preferred types of events, and get notifications and special offers based on their location and personal preferences.


What is the 10.000€ funding for?

Having already released a beta version of the VIRAL AGENDA app for Android, we now need to concentrate on the development of a more stable version, and of the iOS and Windows Phone versions. In order to achieve this, we still need around 6000€ for development, 2500€ for servers and 1500€ for marketing and other expenses.


THE FUTURE (or) I don't live in Portugal. Why should I care?

Built taking scalability into deep account, the VIRAL platform is extraordinarily replicable, with the potential to become a leading events guide on a global scale. Recently, the successful implementation of the platform in Costa Rica was our first step towards international expansion. We now wish to take our work further by mapping the interactions between cultural agents and audiences at a global scale.

By providing detailed, organised and real-time information about cultural activities worldwide, VIRAL  can represent a great asset to both citizens and visitors. Our targeting capabilities will also empower event promoters with innovative tools to communicate with target audiences. Finally, the development of data analysis and visualisation instruments can provide invaluable insights about the complex network of interactions amongst cultural agents and between these and their audiences.

More then just an events guide or a tool kit for event promoters, VIRAL aims to be a context aware virtual organism where global cultural agents meet for communication, collaboration and insight, and where global culture consumers meet for accessing and sharing information: a Cultural Cartography ecosystem that will bring citizens, visitors and creative businesses closer to the cultural life of their cities.


Can't contribute? Spread the word!

Don't have the cashflow right now to make a contribution? Help us spread the word by sharing this campaign with your beloved ones! Post it, tweet it, blog it, pin it...

❤ Show us your love! ❤

story:
Update

The campaign has ended, even though we have not reached our goal will still produce them, if you want to order the Kabuto Focus we will be adding a webshop section to our website www.chungdha.com , where you can order the Kabuto Focus.

  • We have replaced the original laminated paper marker with a transparent marker which will be included to the sets and now added a new perk which is the Kabuto Focus no marker. The No Marker set will include the marker base and you will be able to DIY your own laminated paper marker and save a few bucks. And the Early Birds will include the new Transparent Marker.
  • We have now made the first batch for the Jump Start and posted them. However when all the Early Birds get sold out, we will make them too and send them as fast as possible even before ending this project. So help us by sharing the news of our Indiegogo campaign or contribute and get the Early Birds perk!
  • We have added a Thank You Backers page to our website. http://www.chungdha.com/2014/02/thank-you-indiegogo-backers.html We will be adding the names of the non anonymous backers and if you would like your names to be linked to your website or anywhere else please send us a message on contact@chungdha.com

Why use Kabuto Focus?

Kabuto Focus is a tool to extend your creativity adding extra abilities to you camera.

  • Rack Focus to change focus between several object with preset markers as guides.
  • Rack Zoom to change the framing of the shot with preset markers as guides.
  • Extending the reach of the focus enabling you to control the focus while using both hands to hold the camera steady.
  • Safe Time by preset markers before a Live shows, Concerts, Presentations and more. So when you film you don't have to search for focus or framing and able to swiftly change focus or zoom without having to miss your mark or important moments.

Kabuto Focus. Marking ease of Focus.

What is Kabuto Focus?

Kabuto Focus is a stand-alone follow focus lever and focus marker board that can be used on almost any camera lens, with its own unique features: 

  • Easy in use because of the concave top, enabling one finger control.
  • Visible markers from behind the camera.
  • Stealthy transparent design making it unnoticeable from a distance.
  • Fit any size lens from large Cine lenses to the smallest C-mount lenses.
  • Transparent design enabling using the marker board on both sides.
  • No extra rig required.
  • Super lightweight and will not rotate the focus or zoom ring due to its weight.
  • Customisable Sensu Marker as we will provide an online pdf template to make your own.
  • DIY fixing by making own laminated marker board  and rubber band are easily replaceable with household ones.

Perks

With your help we will be able to make the Kabuto Focus available for €20, making it affordable for the masses.


Kabuto Focus No Marker €15

  • Kabuto Focus Lever, made from 5mm thick Transparent Acrylic.
  • Sensu Marker Base, made from 5mm thick Transparent Acrylic.
  • Two Pairs of UV resistant 4mm black rubber bands in sizes 85mm & 130mm.
  • 2x Transparent Acrylic square loops for the rubber bands.
  • Link to download the Sensu Marker PDF to customise, print and make your own Paper Sensu Marker.
Why no Marker? Because we can show you how to make a laminated or out of thin transparent plastic and just cutting it with scissors. But you only have to spend €1 or €2 but you can make 9 of them with that budget, out of one A4 sheet. Plus if we would produce these the price be much higher almost double or triple cause of the manual labour and the die cut mould.

Kabuto Focus €20

  • Kabuto Focus Lever, made from 5mm thick Transparent Acrylic.
  • Sensu Marker Base, made from 5mm thick Transparent Acrylic.
  • Sensu marker, made from 1mm Transparent PETG.
  • Two Pairs of UV resistant 4mm black rubber bands in sizes 85mm & 130mm.
  • 2x Transparent Acrylic square loops for the rubber bands.
  • Link to download the Sensu Marker PDF to customise, print and make your own Paper Sensu Marker.

So why a PETG marker? Well as its a plastic with high tension that does not easily break, meaning you can throw it in your bag without it breaking. While diy laminated paper and plastic sheets might bend and fold, because its a thin material.

Special discount

The first 10 and the 35 after will have a larger discount on ordering each Kabuto Focus and the more you order the more discount you get. The first 10 of the jump start are now sold out and send. Also when Early birds are sold out they will be shipped directly. And the others will have to wait till after the project ends.

Tip

Ask friends if they want to buy together as it cost less per set when you choose the perks where you get 2 or 4 Kabuto Focus then just buying one. You might think why are these cheaper, mainly sending it all to one address the shipping cost will also be to one address, instead of multiple addresses in loose packages.


The Kabuto Focus also works great in combination with a top handle enable single hand control and holding the camera, so you can shoot very low angle shots and easily use one thumb to focus and its the only product which can do this.

Help & Share!

Even if you like the Kabuto Focus and see potential of it helping other filmmakers, but it doesn't fit your workflow, you can still help us and other filmmakers by sharing this Indiegogo. Please share this IndieGoGo project with the share tools above to Facebook, Twitter or Google+ and we greatly appreciate your help and share.

More detailed info

The name Kabuto Focus is actually derived from the Japanese Rhinoceros Beetle the Kabutomushi as their horn has a similar shape to our Kabuto Focus. And inspired by the beetle we were able to ad couple of features which overall improved the design. As the shape of the top now enable you to also control the Kabuto Focus using one finger and with certain rigs you can still hold the camera steady with both hands instead of freeing one to one use for focussing.

We made the Kabuto Focus to possible to mount almost any lens and even small C-mount lenses. The reason for this, is that M4/3 camera's like the Panasonic, Olympus, Black Magic Cinema Pocket and the Digital Bolex can use these small lenses, but there weren't any working follow focus that fits on these small lenses. To attach it on these small lenses, use the small rubber band and wrap it extra around the inner hooks to increase the tension to increase the grip.

The reason we have chosen for transparent instead of black or being colourful, is that the transparency gives it an additional function of able to use the Sensu focus marker on both sides. As we found out that on older lenses often there isn't enough space behind the focus ring, yet often have space in front of the ring.

The Sensu Marker is based on the Sensu Fan which is a foldable fan from Asia. And commonly have art drawn on them, however instead of art we draw marks on them. The Paper Sensu Marker is laminated so its possible to use a whiteboard or dry erase marker on the Sensu Marker and quickly erase and change it not the next shot.

We did extensive research trying out everything that is on the market, yet also looked into patent of designs that have not been produced. And have looked at mistakes and faults, but also at each functionality and searched for improvements and combining the best features to come to the design of the Kabuto Focus.

FAQ

Why did you choose to put this on Indiegogo?

As this will be our first product that we produce under our own company and not for another companies, we wanted to be safe than sorry. And to be honest we have spend already bit more than we wanted on the development of this product as we also had a Beta Run of the product which is the black acrylic version which we made 8 high quality versions of and asked people to come and test them and also gave a set to them as gift. And as feedback we were able to develop them even further, as we didn't only asked professionals but also start ups and students. And the reason we choose Indiegogo over other crow funding websites, is that we found it more reasonable feature and also make it more accessible for most people around the world as you can pay with Paypal.

You are using Flexible Funding will you be able to produce the products even when not reaching your goal?

We will still be able to produce when even when not hitting the goal, however we do feel that we will be able to hit our goal and go over it. To be honest our goal of €3000 is set so we have a continues running production, however at 1000 we can already do a break even production, this means we will be able to produce,send the products and pay VAT. But means we will not have money to continue the next run and produce more. So our first real goal is to at least reach over €1000, however when we hit €3000 we will directly start producing meaning they will be able send out the products much faster and much earlier, as the Flexible Funding makes this possible.

Are you taking orders internationally?

Yes, we are taking international orders, international shipping outside of Europe will cost €5 the perk of 4 sets and more. If you are outside of Europe, please add an additional €5 when ordering the Kabuto focus sets of 4 or more outside of Europe.

What is the 21% VAT?

Kabuto Focus is made in the Netherlands and sold from here, so we have to include 21% TAX or VAT to the products. These are the rules, we don't like it either as 21% of €20 is already €4.20 that goes directly to the VAT. However we included the VAT in the pricing so you directly know how much it is.

Will Kabuto Focus make it more stable for handheld use?

To be honest no, also claims from other Focus Levers on the market are bringing out false claims about this and we rather give you the truth. The main thing is that the Kabuto Focus is a focussing assist tool that help you with focussing and rack focussing. And we advice to get a more stable shot use a support like a rig, monopod or a tripod give you a more stable hold to your camera.


Can I replace the rubber bands?

Yes, if you ever misplaced or losing the original rubber band you can either replace them with any household rubber band or you can order the original black rubber bands from us for a small fee.

What is the best method in making the Paper Sensu Marker?

We recommend using a thicker paper of at least 150 or 200gram and print the design on them. Then use a laminating machine one its hottest temperature and to have a good adhesion put the paper with the lamination pouch several time through the laminating machine and also upside down as some design the heating element is only on one side. On a single a4 you can already make 8 Sensu Markers. Plus you can print it filled black so you people notice it even less or u can even add a logo like these below.

Will it fit the Canon 50mm f1.8 and

Yes, but for it to work you would need to get this adapter from Shapeways.

http://www.shapeways.com/model/1088077/nifty-fifty-canon-50mm-f1-8-follow-focus-adapter.html

Will it fit the 40mm f2.8?

No, as we have tested different methods and also including trying out different existing follow focus products, there seem to be no real product that actually works on them, due to the convex shape and the small size of the focus ring.

Will it fit on the older 18-55mm f3.5-5.6 kit lens?

Yes, however we recommend using a household thin 1.5mm rubber band which can hold it in place better. Or use it in combination with the lens hood.

Do you have hard stops on this design?

No, however we do recommend DIY creativity from our users using paperclips or other clips to hold onto the Sensu Marker and able to make hard stops.

Can we use this on large cinema lenses?

Yes but you have to use the  large rubber band and for larger focus rings where it feels that both the rubber bands are too short, you can interlock the rubber bands to extend them to fit.

Why us Kabuto Follow Focus when there is a $5 Follow Focus?

Because the Kabuto Follow Focus actually works and also you have visible markers that are really visible from behind your camera. To see the difference watch the video below.


Who Are We


Chung Dha is a Cinema and Design company from the Netherlands and have filmed videos for big companies like Red Bull, Pizza Express, Starbucks and more. But also have won awards at different short film competitions around the world and have films screened in Hong Kong, The Netherlands and San Francisco. Our company is adding a new direction of designing and producing film equipments, as we often build different grips and handle all kinds of professional equipments, but every so often we build something special that we think that everybody should use.

2x Transparent Acrylic square loops for the rubber bands.
Link to download the Sensu Marker PDF to customise, print and make your own Paper Sensu Marker.
So why a PETG marker? Well as its a plastic with high tension that does not easily break, meaning you can throw it in your bag without it breaking. While diy laminated paper and plastic sheets might bend and fold, because its a thin material.Special discountThe first 10 and the 35 after will have a larger discount on ordering each Kabuto Focus and the more you order the more discount you get. The first 10 of the jump start are now sold out and send. Also when Early birds are sold out they will be shipped directly. And the others will have to wait till after the project ends.TipAsk friends if they want to buy together as it cost less per set when you choose the perks where you get 2 or 4 Kabuto Focus then just buying one. You might think why are these cheaper, mainly sending it all to one address the shipping cost will also be to one address, instead of multiple addresses in loose packages.The Kabuto Focus also works great in combination with a top handle enable single hand control and holding the camera, so you can shoot very low angle shots and easily use one thumb to focus and its the only product which can do this.Help & Share!
Even if you like the Kabuto Focus and see potential of it helping other filmmakers, but it doesn't fit your workflow, you can still help us and other filmmakers by sharing this Indiegogo. Please share this IndieGoGo project with the share tools above to Facebook, Twitter or Google+ and we greatly appreciate your help and share.More detailed infoThe name Kabuto Focus is actually derived from the Japanese Rhinoceros Beetle the Kabutomushi as their horn has a similar shape to our Kabuto Focus. And inspired by the beetle we were able to ad couple of features which overall improved the design. As the shape of the top now enable you to also control the Kabuto Focus using one finger and with certain rigs you can still hold the camera steady with both hands instead of freeing one to one use for focussing.We made the Kabuto Focus to possible to mount almost any lens and even small C-mount lenses. The reason for this, is that M4/3 camera's like the Panasonic, Olympus, Black Magic Cinema Pocket and the Digital Bolex can use these small lenses, but there weren't any working follow focus that fits on these small lenses. To attach it on these small lenses, use the small rubber band and wrap it extra around the inner hooks to increase the tension to increase the grip.The reason we have chosen for transparent instead of black or being colourful, is that the transparency gives it an additional function of able to use the Sensu focus marker on both sides. As we found out that on older lenses often there isn't enough space behind the focus ring, yet often have space in front of the ring.The Sensu Marker is based on the Sensu Fan which is a foldable fan from Asia. And commonly have art drawn on them, however instead of art we draw marks on them. The Paper Sensu Marker is laminated so its possible to use a whiteboard or dry erase marker on the Sensu Marker and quickly erase and change it not the next shot.We did extensive research trying out everything that is on the market, yet also looked into patent of designs that have not been produced. And have looked at mistakes and faults, but also at each functionality and searched for improvements and combining the best features to come to the design of the Kabuto Focus.FAQWhy did you choose to put this on Indiegogo?As this will be our first product that we produce under our own company and not for another companies, we wanted to be safe than sorry. And to be honest we have spend already bit more than we wanted on the development of this product as we also had a Beta Run of the product which is the black acrylic version which we made 8 high quality versions of and asked people to come and test them and also gave a set to them as gift. And as feedback we were able to develop them even further, as we didn't only asked professionals but also start ups and students. And the reason we choose Indiegogo over other crow funding websites, is that we found it more reasonable feature and also make it more accessible for most people around the world as you can pay with Paypal.You are using Flexible Funding will you be able to produce the products even when not reaching your goal?We will still be able to produce when even when not hitting the goal, however we do feel that we will be able to hit our goal and go over it. To be honest our goal of €3000 is set so we have a continues running production, however at 1000 we can already do a break even production, this means we will be able to produce,send the products and pay VAT. But means we will not have money to continue the next run and produce more. So our first real goal is to at least reach over €1000, however when we hit €3000 we will directly start producing meaning they will be able send out the products much faster and much earlier, as the Flexible Funding makes this possible.Are you taking orders internationally?Yes, we are taking international orders, international shipping outside of Europe will cost €5 the perk of 4 sets and more. If you are outside of Europe, please add an additional €5 when ordering the Kabuto focus sets of 4 or more outside of Europe.What is the 21% VAT?Kabuto Focus is made in the Netherlands and sold from here, so we have to include 21% TAX or VAT to the products. These are the rules, we don't like it either as 21% of €20 is already €4.20 that goes directly to the VAT. However we included the VAT in the pricing so you directly know how much it is.Will Kabuto Focus make it more stable for handheld use?To be honest no, also claims from other Focus Levers on the market are bringing out false claims about this and we rather give you the truth. The main thing is that the Kabuto Focus is a focussing assist tool that help you with focussing and rack focussing. And we advice to get a more stable shot use a support like a rig, monopod or a tripod give you a more stable hold to your camera.Can I replace the rubber bands?Yes, if you ever misplaced or losing the original rubber band you can either replace them with any household rubber band or you can order the original black rubber bands from us for a small fee.What is the best method in making the Paper Sensu Marker?We recommend using a thicker paper of at least 150 or 200gram and print the design on them. Then use a laminating machine one its hottest temperature and to have a good adhesion put the paper with the lamination pouch several time through the laminating machine and also upside down as some design the heating element is only on one side. On a single a4 you can already make 8 Sensu Markers. Plus you can print it filled black so you people notice it even less or u can even add a logo like these below.Will it fit the Canon 50mm f1.8 andYes, but for it to work you would need to get this adapter from Shapeways.http://www.shapeways.com/model/1088077/nifty-fifty-canon-50mm-f1-8-follow-focus-adapter.htmlWill it fit the 40mm f2.8?No, as we have tested different methods and also including trying out different existing follow focus products, there seem to be no real product that actually works on them, due to the convex shape and the small size of the focus ring.Will it fit on the older 18-55mm f3.5-5.6 kit lens?Yes, however we recommend using a household thin 1.5mm rubber band which can hold it in place better. Or use it in combination with the lens hood.Do you have hard stops on this design?No, however we do recommend DIY creativity from our users using paperclips or other clips to hold onto the Sensu Marker and able to make hard stops.Can we use this on large cinema lenses?Yes but you have to use the  large rubber band and for larger focus rings where it feels that both the rubber bands are too short, you can interlock the rubber bands to extend them to fit.Why us Kabuto Follow Focus when there is a $5 Follow Focus?Because the Kabuto Follow Focus actually works and also you have visible markers that are really visible from behind your camera. To see the difference watch the video below.Who Are WeChung Dha is a Cinema and Design company from the Netherlands and have filmed videos for big companies like Red Bull, Pizza Express, Starbucks and more. But also have won awards at different short film competitions around the world and have films screened in Hong Kong, The Netherlands and San Francisco. Our company is adding a new direction of designing and producing film equipments, as we often build different grips and handle all kinds of professional equipments, but every so often we build something special that we think that everybody should use.

story:
BRIXO's electric bricks are normal sized building blocks that are anything but normal. It's like Lego® on steroids, if steroids also gave you superpowers and taught you new languages. 

Basically, they're bricks that safely conduct electricity and connect to your phone to enable you to do all sorts of cool things with your designs.  And no, you don't need to buy a whole new set, because they're used interchangeably with your favourite building blocks to add an element of interactive awesomeness. 

 BRIXO bricks include LED lights, motor blocks and even sound, light and proximity sensors. They’re powered by a low voltage Bluetooth controlled built-in battery brick and coated in chrome, a non-toxic metal, to ensure your safety.

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

With bricks that can be triggered by sound, light, touch and the entire world of IoT, there isn’t much you CAN’T do. You can set your phone's alarm clock to only shut off when you build a pyramid. Or you make a treat dispenser that gives your pup a treat every time he goes to his crate when there’s a knock at the door. Or help your kid build a nightlight that turns on when he says "heebeejeebee".  And that’s just what our crew did, you’ve probably got a few ideas of your own.

You can even use it to replace high end automated IoT processes, like setting your Nest profile and turning on all your smart home devices just by hanging up a BRIXO keychain on a BRIXO board by the door.  The possibilities are pretty much endless.

 

 There are 3 types of bricks:

 These blocks are chrome and connect the trigger blocks to the action blocks. So yes, your designs will be riding on chrome.

Trigger blocks are the ones that are set to respond with an action to sounds, lights, or having another brick in its proximity. Oh yeah, and with a bit of technical know-how, you can even set it to be triggered by pretty much anything using IoT and IFTTT.

 This is where the magic happens. As you can probably guess, these are the blocks that do stuff, really cool stuff. The go-getters. Set your action blocks to light up, spin, move, and take action.

 
 
 

Brixo isn't just a product, it's also a community made up of developers, amateur architects and full-time tinkerers.  We're exploring the possibilities together, and learning from each another. 

We have a range of stuff, from 3D building instructions to an online library of models and hacks. Join our community share your models and learn to build new ones.

Join a group of design loving tech explorers who are powered by curiosity.

BRIXO chrome-coated connector blocks conduct electricity. Their unique design enables adjacent bricks to conduct currents in any direction via patented small elastic arms.  

BRIXO’s smart internal 9V battery block powers your creations and constantly monitors their currents so you don’t have to worry about short circuits. A built-in Bluetooth controller will let you change the current’s direction and voltage levels via our mobile application. The smart battery will also detect when you're not using BRIXO and conserve power to extend battery life.

BRIXO trigger blocks are designed to control the action without additional wiring. Connected along the current path, they switch action blocks “on” and “off” using built-in light, sound and proximity sensors. The trigger blocks’ smart switching functionality operates the action blocks by controlling the current in the circuit.

 

It all began a couple of years ago with my son. He successfully wired an electric science kit and proudly showed it to me. I asked him where the circuit was and he looked at me puzzled. I quickly realized he couldn’t see it through the forest of tangled wires on his breadboard. Not a moment later, he went back to playing with his favorite toy, Lego®, and the idea for BRIXO revealed itself. At first we tried to embed wires into existing blocks, but quickly understood two important things: the blocks must be simple (no wires inside!) and fully compatible with standard building blocks. As physicists, we deal with thin films all day long, so the solution to use a conductive chrome coating was right in front of our eyes. Several trials & prototypes later, the idea formed into the fun and educational electricity-conducting building blocks they are today.     

Q: Do I need other building blocks to enjoy BRIXO?

A: No. You can build a structure with BRIXO blocks only, but it will be limited in size. 

Q: Is BRIXO safe?

A: Yes. The blocks are safe to use chemically, electrically and physically.

Q: Do I need to know how electronics work?

A: No. BRIXO is easy to use and educational for all ages. We’ll include a manual with several circuit example so you could get inspired and learn the basic of electricity on the same time. 

Q: Where can I find ideas for models I can build with BRIXO?

A: You can download our BRIXO Creations App, free on both iOS and Android.

Q: How is BRIXO different from electric Lego® and other competitors?

A: Unlike its competition, BRIXO blocks are wireless (no wires, literally), elegant and much more durable. 

Q: Is that all?

A: Definitely NOT. This is just the start! 

LEGO® is a trademark of the LEGO Group of companies which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse this site
